review: I have closed the housing loan with Allahabad Bank and the interest rate was floating based. Processing charges were nominal one and the loan amount got disbursed within thirty days of time. The money got disbursed on a single payment. I want them to improve the online services by the way so that it will be really helpful for customers.

I have a Home loan running with Allahabad Bank which I took recently. The documentation was very minimal and the processing was quite easy as the Branch manager was very helpful and friendly. I was offered an interest rate of 11.25% and the processing fee was waived off which was a nice gesture. The process took only about 12 hours.

ALLAHABAD BANK people were very cooperative. Just because of the interest rate I transferred my Home loan to SBI Bank. They use to provide every thing instantly. I was completed my 3 years loan but I never faced any issues with them. Their loan process and interaction with their customers every thing was good.

In 13 working days the Allahabad bank has sanctioned the home loan and the amount is about 17lakhs. However when I asked for a credit card they did not process. Allahabad bank is certainly very fast in sanctioning the home loan. Customer service, response and their services are more than expected level. Interest rate is good. I visited the bank post 4pm and still they helped me to pay the due.

I got the home loan with allahabad bank and the experience was very awesome like within a couple of day the loan was disbursed which was the bigger amount . The staffs of the bank are good. Interest rate charged was 9.70% without any processing fee.

It is a government bank and they are good in terms of interest rate. Allahabad bank is not good in customer service and in a paper works. The agents are not good. I was very frustrated at that time of process as every time they asked for new documents. They also asked papers from seller side to process the home loan.

The rate of interest offered by Allahabad for the housing loan is very good. Its very much beneficial for me .I am holding this housing loan from the month of June. They were asking for all the necessary documents. There is no issue or hassle with them while submitting the documents. Interest rate offered by them was floating rate processing is fine. Its a nationalized bank . I can check the part payment options on line.

I am holding this Allahabad housing loan for a period of 3 to 4 years. I am getting my certificate of interest on time. I am getting SMS for the payment on time. I am not happy with their service and it is not as good as CITI Bank. I would suggest Allahabad to follow CITI Bank.

Allahabad bank has given me a home at an interest rate of 9.4%. They did not ask me too much of documents. The very first day they gave me a checklist in which I mentioned about the papers which I had and alternatives were made for the one which I was not having. Within 10 days my loan got approved. Being a nationalized bank they have shown a good response.

The services was good when I applied for a home loan in Allahabad bank.The rate of interest was 10.15% which is floating and reasonable. The processing fees was Rs.1800 which was reasonable. The customer support was good. The total tenure of the loan is 20 years.

Surprisingly I got good response from allahabad bank for my home loan. I thought they are not upto the mark. Nowadays I do see the nationalized banks are pretty quick. They offered me the interest rate sufficiently fit it into my budget. Hence I have opted this bank for my home loan. Overall I am very much satisfied with them

Last month I had availed a home loan from Allahabad bank. I handed over the required documents to the bank executive who was handling my case and my loan was disbursed within a week at a rate of interest of 10.25%. The total loan amount was 34 lakhs.

Allahabad bank home loan is ok in the sense like the working environment is not very good its not good sense any type of loan they have to improve the customer support a lot of Nationalized banks are there maintain good reputation they are very slow in process as per the standard its a competitive environment as soon in case of home loan that is my feedback there is a lot of slow documentary work for home loan customer rhas to follow up with the bank so we are less interested to apply

I applied for the housing loan from Allahabad Bank the processing and the documentation is very quick and they processed within the promised time and the rate of interest is less when compared to other banks, the whole process got completed in one month, the overall service is good.

By first week of this month, my house loan got disbursed from Allahabad Bank. I approached Allahabad bank as the builder had tie-up with this bank and all the processing was quite simple and easier. My loan was also sanctioned within a week. Interest rate and processing charges were bit higher but it was quite OK as I got my loan disbursed within a short time.

Andhra bank follows a conventional way of banking. They are not up when it comes to technology, technology wise they have to improve a lot. The charges are quite similar to other banks. Also they dont provide upcoming offers, they just stick to their old offers, where as other banks come up with attractive schemes at regular intervals for instance SBI, as SBI does that.

The service provided was average with andhra bank related to the home loan process since its a government bank.They have got good technology but they do have a legacy mindset.The rate applied was around 10.25% which was on the higher side and I may not recommend the service as well.

Andhra Bank executives collected minimal documents as per the bank norms. Interest rate offered for the home loan was diminishing and it was 10.25% per annum. Home loan was processed within a month's time and they have provided the loan on the exact time of requirement.

I have taken a home loan through the Andhra bank. This bank was recommended by one of my colleague. Rate of interest availed was quite high and it could be negotiated. The processing of loan was very fast as it got credited in my account within 3 days.

Interest rate will be regulated according to the RBI norms. The customer can blindly rely on them regarding the interest rate. Verification was done thrice by the executives. I felt very secured in taking the home loan with Andhra bank. Process was very much smooth with them.

Andhra bank is very cooperative but the rate of interest is very high. 9.75% of rate is somewhat high for the home loan. In all the aspects they are also good but rate seems high. Andhra bank has taken 40 thousand as charge for the home loan amount of 26 lakhs.

I did not face any issue with the andhra bank while taking the home loan.I easily approach with the bank manager. When i took the loan before five year the interest rate was high but now it has come down . The verification of the property was fine but i feel that the sbi bank is better. .

The only best part about Andhra bank with regards to home loan is that they have the option of part payment immediately after taking up the loan and they provided me a very nominal rate of interest. Also I was very happy that my loan amount got disbursed within 5 days of applying for the home loan. They need to improve the web portal which I feel they are very much behind all the other banks.

I took the home loan with andhra bank they approved the loan within 20 days the delay was only because there was some deviation in the property. Interest rate charged was 10.5% when i took before five years and now it has been reduced to 9.75%The processing fee was 0%.

ANDHRA Bank housing loan is fine . It would be great if they improvise on their customer service. I have called their customer service I we have to hold the line for a long time and their IVRS states that its under maintenance always. However they have to do maintenance during the night time or during the week end.

Its a quick process to get the Home loan with Andhra bank.They have taken around a weeks time to process the loan.They have required very simple document in the loan process.The interest rate offered was around 10.25%.SBI have offers better rate compared with Andhra Bank.

My property dealer has tie up with Andhra Bank and via my dealer I have applied for Home Loan to Andhra Bank. Documents were collected on time from me and application is under process. Bank offered me loan as per my requirement and even the interest rate applicable is at par with the market.

My Home Loan was taken from Andhra bank. I will call it as a Golden bank to me because they processed my application with in 4 day to me. Basically I am from Andhra pradesh so I always preferred this bank. Rate of interest is very less with them when compared with other banks.

My home loan is in the process with Andra Bank. The documentation and evaluation was done. It is in the final stage now. I am joint account with my parents. I deal with the bank manager, he was very helpful till now and already few of my family members have taken loan through him. As per the discussion I found the interest rate what they offer is normal. The pre closure is done without any charges. It going on smoothly with Andra Bank.

I had a very poor experience with Andhra bank based on the home loan.They said I will be getting a top pop loan for the other two floor built but they havení¢??t provide the same.Their executives are rude towards the customer and the charges applied is quite high.

Andhra Bank provided me a Home Loan of Rs 15 Lakhs with an interest rate of 10.25%. The processing fee was also nominal. The customer service is excellent as they processed my loan in just 1 day. My builder took care of everything. I just prepared my documents and remaining things my builder had a follow up with the bank.

Actually the builder has a tie up with Andra bank. Everything was settled in one day. Initially they have asked me for some documents and I have sent that through mail. The whole process was completed within a days time. I have sent all my documents through mail to their mail id

A month ago I have applied for home loan with Andhra bank and still it is under progress where yet to receive the amount. Infact, when I approached the bank manger for inquiry she does not know the actual rate of interest, processing charge and the limit, which disappointed me. Interest rate on home loan is very high than other nationalized banks as I did not have second option thus I went for it. I guess, processing charge 0.25% is same like other banks.

Andra Bank housing loan is good. Interest rate offered by them was really good. Interest amount is calculated on a diminishing balance. As and when we deposit the money the balance will get reduced and they will calculate interest on the diminishing balance. I am a regular customer of Andra bank and they have offered that based on my track records.

I have taken a housing loan with Andra bank. The Bank has verified all the legal documents pertaining to this property and Bank has given the certification confirming its verified so I have chosen this one. I am very much happy with the interest rate and processing fee . Offcourse, I am allowed to make partial payment in between.

I personally went to Andhra bank and got the home loan. I got it based on the salary norms and the property documents as well. As the bank was nearby to the property, it was easier to avail home loan. Interest rate is 10.25% and I would say there is no discrepancies in terms of charges. Andhra bank branch manager is pretty much cooperative.

My co-brother is working in Andhra bank who helped me to avail a home loan three years ago. He himself completed the documentation process very fast and ensured my loan sanctioning within 3 days of time at a rate of interest of 11.75%. I recently transfer the loan with the same bank at a rate of interest of just 10.25%.

Last month I had opted for a home loan from Andhra bank. They were kind enough to give me the loan. They saw all the papers and suggested their own layers. People from the bank has visited the site and enquired everything & ready to give me the loan. Everything happened very quickly and the documentation process was completed in just 2 days. Finally they sanctioned my loan within a week at a rate of interest of 10.25%.

Couple of months ago I have received my housing loan from Andhra Bank. I directly walked into the bank and requested the housing loan. The bank executives were very friendly and supportive hence the loan process was smooth. Documentation was less however the processing time almost took around 20 days which was quite long.

ANDRA Bank home loan is good, it all depends on loan amount is more than 15 lakhs the interest rate is less and if the loan amount is less than 15 lakhs the interest rate will be high, and they explained to me about fixed and floating rate and about the prepayments also.

There are no specific reason to choose the Axis bank for my housing loan. Interest rate is good one while compare with market rates. Loan amount got credited to my account within three months of time and the inspection other procedures are really good with them. Documentation process is nominal one with Axis bank.

Special thanks to Vishal, as he was the concerned person who was looking after my housing loan with Axis. He was my ad visor too he was actually guiding me regarding the procedure of the process. Axis bank is the only bank which has fulfilled all my requirements where the bank was able to fund up to 90% of the property value and they are basically co-operative in nature.

My dislike about Axis bank was time and again the bank was asking for the receipt for my house down payment which I made initially . I had made the payments in parts, to what I know, they have failed to record my previous down payment which I made and they were asking for the same multiple times. My likes about Axis bank was, they were offering a higher loan amount, prepayment facilities were there and the processing fee charged was around rs 2500.

Interest rate is a better one with the Axis bank when it comes to home loan. Loan amount got disbursed to my account at a specified time and the processing charges were nil with them. Documentation procedure was very simple with them. I dint find any issues with them till now.

Axis Bank was very good in their services. I had a home loan taken from them earlier. The process was too good. It was quick and easy. The rate of interest was of 9.85%. Then I had to pay twice to reduce the rate as the offer I got was that. The processing charges was average too.

Apart from the rate of interest, the services are very good at Axis bank. I had my home loan earlier with them. The rate of interest was of 10.75%. The processing charges was average. But they were very fast in their processing. They came over collected my documents and it was a smooth process. I can also contact the customer care at any time and they would be supportive in responding.

Axis bank has done a very good job when it comes to housing loan. The process was very simple and fast. It was completed as per my requirement. I was also comfortable with the rate of interest they offered me. The processing charges also seemed to be normal. Overall I can say it was a pleasant experience and hassle free.

It was lengthy procedure to get the housing loan with Axis bank and the interest rate is around 9.45%. Customer service has to be improved and the processing charges was around 7000 Rupees for my housing loan. I would like to suggest that Axis bank need to more proactive with their executives.

Within a month of time the loan amount got successfully disbursed to my account from the Axis bank. Interest rate for the housing loan with them was around 9.35% with some negotiation. Due to the offers was on that time, there was no processing charges. I would like to suggest that Axis bank have to be more pro-active while collecting original documents.

The lender Axis bank provided very good service as my housing loan was disbursed by them . The entire process was completed on time. The response that I received from them was good throughout the process. The rate of interest charged was very normal. The processing charges were reasonable too. To summarize, it was a hassle free process.

It is yet another dis satisfactory experience with Axis Bank, next to my car loan. I was given an offer of 1 year waiving of EMI on my housing loan . But they took 40 days to let me if the process could be done or not until I finally called them to know this status. I would never wish to recommend this bank to others.

The main highlight of Axis bank housing loan is, there is no preclosure charges which is applicable here. The schemes which they provide for their customers is really good and attractive too. I will definitely recommend their service to prospect customers.

NICE JOBReally good service, to check your eligibility from home... just few clicks and you're done... sit back relax... bank representative will call you... I will definitely recommend bank bazaar .. even if you go to the bank they will make you run 200 times... here they do all the running.

The very first step of AXIS Bank home loan would be, their agents called me and confirmed with me that they would come and collect my documents from my home. My property was a flat. I am not sure that the bank provides special offers to women or not and I am very much happy with the service offered by AXIS bank .

Interesting to work with AXIS Bank for my home loan. As the service offered by them was really good. The process which they had followed was completed on time. From the collection of documents till the end of the process. The rate of interest was normal. The processing charges were also normal.

Apparently, the service offered by AXIS Bank for the housing loan is really good . One of the DSA agent was very helpful during the entire process. He was the only communication between the bank and customer. Door step facilities were provided. Only once I approached the bank for the disbursement. They have offered 20 years tenure period for the home loan and also I was given happy ending EMI option.

The service offered by Axis Bank was better compared with HDFC LTD related to home loan.They are updating customer about the rates change and other updates in a loan process.The process time taken was also very less from Axis Bank.The customer support offered was best with Axis Bank,

I had successfully taken a home loan from Axis bank. During the process their representatives came to the scheduled place and picked up the documents from me. The EMI for this loan is fixed for 15 years and I did not inquire with the bank that I could extend the EMI duration. I got this loan in 10 days.

No misses, on my Axis bank housing loan process as, everything was executed in a very good way . They came over and collected the documents. The process was completed on time. The rate of interest was an average rate. The processing charges were high when compared. Overall, it was a good experience.

Having a banking relationship with AXIS Bank for more than 12 years also I have taken a home loan from them . It has always been a good experience with the bank. Their services and response has always been good. The rate provided for the loan was very much satisfactory. The processing charges were also very nominal.

I am very grateful to Axis bank for providing the home loan and the interest rate was around 10.25%, which was floating based. I would like to suggest that if repo rate of RBI changes, it has an immediate impact on my loan and on my EMI. I am happy with Axis bank because Mr. Rahul khanna has helped me a lot to get my housing loan, also he is very prompt in collecting the documents.

My home loan process was very simple, I like it as the service offered by them was good. The documents were collected at one stretch and it was a smooth process. The rate of interest was also reasonable to me. The processing charges were good too. Overall satisfactory.

The process was very simple with Axis Bank related to the home loan process.The agents have come for document collection made it easy for the customer.It was a good experience with Axis Bank.It will be good if they provide the best response each time a customer reach them.

Whenever there is a need or if I am in need of any assistance the representative from Axis bank who was ready to help me , who took the initiate to complete the home loan process. I was happy with the response given by the executive.There was change in the interest rate from the initially offer which was reflected immediately on the loan process.Security was high in the loan. The process they follow gives an assurance. Maximum time taken to disburse the amount was ten days.

The coordination was very good from Axis bank customer service for the home loan. The documentation was till tough as they collected the maximum pares because of which I have to visit the bank 2-3 times. Rate of interest and processing fee was the market rate. Duration time to disburse the loan was nearly about one month.

Interest rate for the housing loan with the Axis bank is around 9.5% and the customer service is bit delay from their end. Finally, I got the loan from them, also I would like to suggest that they need to complete the process as fast as possible.

The home loan I had applied with Axis bank was a very lukewarm affair as their processing was too slow for some reason and took almost 5-6 months as the file had to be re-logged in as the technical assessment sanction period had expired. I was also given an insurance policy. It was when things took a serious turn that it got processed. The rate of interest was quoted 9.55% which is now reduced to 9.50% floating for 20 years. The processing fee was Rs.6k.

Axis bank is capable of providing better service for the home loan. It took about 3 months time, to the complete process which included the documentation, verification of the legal documents etc. The rate of interest was 9.5% which was on floating basis with a processing fee of Rs.11k. The executive needs to be proactive and do not wait for the customer to follow up.

There were many disputes and AXIS bank executives were not confident. My loan got disbursed only couple of days back and I am yet to receive any documents about the rate of interest and other details. I would suggest that a customer should first check which branch is the best and then move ahead for the loan, because it is the executives who represent the bank and when their services are not satisfactory. It reflects on the bank as well.I have taken my home loan with Axis bank

Hardly, four days of time were taken by Axis bank to disburse the amount in to my AXIS bank housing loan account. Customer service is an excellent one with Axis bank and the interest rate is around 9.35%, which is floating based. The paper works asked by AXIS bank was very normal.

Rate of interest was relatively high with the Axis bank for the home loan, also the amount which they have proposed to me as capital was not okay. Customer service was fine with them and the response was an immediate one with them. I dont have any suggestion for them.

There is no particular reason why I dint go ahead with the Axis bank for the home loan. I have seen the interest rate for the home loan with Axis bank was fine for me and the customer service is also good with them. In the mean time I got a loan from State bank of India.

Bankbazaar application is a designed good application. It was nice experience to fill out all the items. I didnt get struct anywhere while providing the details. Whole journey through the application was so nice. Expecting good reply from the banks.

I got a fair deal from Axis Bank for my home loan. They collected my documents and processed the loan on time. They also offered the lowest rate of interest. It was of 9.45%. The processing charges was of 0.5%. It was a good experience with the bank for this loan process.

I do have home loan with Axis bank and the interest rate is pretty high while compare with nationalized bank but its on lesser end while compare with private sector bank. The loan amount got disbursed to my account within fifteen days to twenty days of time. Response is good with them.

Home loan was processed within 15 working days by the Axis bank executives. They quoted 9.65 % as the interest rate , which is fixed for the tenure of 10 years. I paid a minimal amount as initial payment and the remaining amount was provided by Axis as the loan amount.

I have got the home loan with the Axis bank and the interest rate was not very good. I don't think so, whatever RBI applies will not reflect to the customer account on time. I suppose, partial payment facilities is not applicable. Processing charges are nominal one and they are really poor in the documentation process.

It was good to go with axis bank in taking a home loan. It was a fine experience that I had with them. The loan disbursement took almost 10 days. Few details that are mentioned earlier on the mobile application are not reflecting now. It is difficult to take commercial vehicles through this bank.

My home loan experience with axis bank was good in term of interest rate but they took long time to disburse the amount. Verification process was smooth . They required less documents. It would be good if they disburse the amount in the short period.

My home loan is with Axis Bank. The services are good. The process was done fast. I got the loan within one week. The document process was easy and not much. I got a rate of interest around 9%. They waived off the processing fees and charges.

It was very much easy to take a home loan from axis bank. The approach of their staffs was better. The interest rate informed to me was according to the market rate. My loan was disbursed to me on the promised time. Overall it was a happy experience.

Axis bank gave me the best offer on the home loan. They offered me a very low rate of interest. It was lower than a nationalized bank rate. The process was excellent. They moved my file within 48 hours. And the process was completed very much fast. Overall a very good experience.

I have taken a home loan from Axis Bank few years back. The processing and documentation was pretty easy and minimal since it was just a top up on the previous loan from another bank. The rate of interest offered was around 10.1% with a processing fee of around 0.65%.

Axis bank is giving the good interest rate and processing fee for home loan. I approached them for the top up loan but the processing is very high were as other bank are offering 90% less processing fee for the balance transfer. It would be nice if the give all the detailed information in written to the customer.

Axis bank gives a good service for the home loan. The rate of interest is reasonable compared to other banks. They took one month time for the disbursement due heavy documentation process. The builder recommended the bank so the property verification was very simple. .

Axis bank n executives are not responsive in time, the property which i hv negotiated hv taken time fr about 20 days fr docs collection, many tim complaint has bn given but no response, hence I lost d prop to competitor, many banksbr giving prelim e app but axis failed, hence not satisfied.

The service provided was not good with Axis bank related to the home loan process.They are not responding customer for the mail sent from the customer end.It will be good if they look towards customer query and attend customer in proper way.

I had taken Home Loan from Axis (PHR064700732771) from its Goregaon loan centre. Post taking loan I came to know that you cannot loan centre again. For any detail you need to call center and you will get to hear a new voice everytime. I asked for a statement and they took more than 20 days to give it. I was forced to take leave and visit loan center multiple times. The people at loan center are not helpful and are not interested to understand pain of the customer. I am shifting my loan now to another bank for sure.

Axis bank is very prompt and professional. They approached very easily for the home loan. The paper work were completed efficiently . Interest rate charged was 9.5% as i have given my spouse name as co applicant.The processing fee was very minimal. The executive was very responsive.

I have a home loan from Axis Bank. They offered me 9.5% interest rate and a processing fee of 2%. Their customer service and responsiveness is great as they regularly keep in touch. The processing and documentation is hassle free and quite smooth. The staff are very co-operative and always happy to help.

Since Ií¢??m already an Axis bank customer, the home loan process was also pretty much hassle free. I was offered an interest rate of 10.25% which I feel is slightly higher than that offered by other banks. The customer service and responsiveness from the executives was good and the loan got disbursed in a very short span of time.

The service provided was very nice with Axis Bank related to the home loan process.I like the door step service provided for the customer related to home loan.The process was quite good and they have collected only the required documents to process the home loan.

At the first the Axis bank executive had accepted for home loan for amount of 16 to 17 lakhs but later I received one call from one of the executives where he told that I can get only 12 to 13 lakhs. There was a discrepancy in sharing information. Got call on time for home loan from the bank.

Overall process from axis bank was good for my home loan requirement but the interest rate was high as they were offering above 9.6% were as sbi bank is offering 9.45% .On the processing fee they were giving some offers. The requirement was not there so not able to continue the service.

They have not provided the entire loan amount for the home loan taken through the Axis Bank.They have started taking EMI for the whole amount but still I have not got the pending amount.They have not applied any additional charges in the loan with Axis Bank.

I got the immediate response from axis bank for my home loan application. The executive gave all the information about the process. But the property was not finalized from my side so the application was not forwarded for further process.

Response was good from axis bank for my home loan application. Compared to other bank they offered the best interest rate of 12.5% and the processing fee was also nominal. The plan was postponed to six months so the application was closed but the service of good.

The loan process was not well organized by Axis Bank related to the home loan process.I have to make a follow up in submitting the application for the home loan.They have taken around 5months to complete the home loan process.The charges applied was reasonable with Axis bank

Once i applied for the home loan with axis bank next day morning i received the call and they shared all the information in which i find that the interest rate is very high. The property was not finalized within a given the limit so the application was closed it would be better if they extend the period.

The process of axis bank is very easy for the home loan and the employees are very coordinating.They offered the 11% interest rate and the processing fee offered was high which can be reduce. As the amount was arranged from other sources so not availed the loan.

When i approached axis bank for home loan. I got the quick reply and the executive visited the place to collect the documents but i was not able to give the sufficient document so the process was postponed . But the overall service was good . Interest rate offers was little high compare to hdfc ltd

The overall process was good with axis bank when i applied for the home loan but the processing fee was very high so i took the loan with other bank. Interest rate offered was competitive. They can lower the processing fee it would be better.

In the initial stage the process was good with axis bank for the home loan but later there was delay int he response because of which i could not make the mind and then the application was canceled.Interest rate and processing fee offered was good.

The process of home loan was very fast from axis bank ans the response was also given very quick. Compared to the nationalized bank the interest rate was high but similar to the private bank . My plan was to do the construction on the plot as there delay so plan of taking the loan was postponed.

The experience was not good from axis bank . They did not respond to the customer on time and not given complete detail about the home loan process. The rates are competitive. It would be good if they follow the customer on time and follow till the loan gets completed.

When I applied for the home loan from Axis bank, I was not satisfied as the executive took too long to respond and when he did come to collect my details, he took his own time for collecting the documents and processing it. I was satisfied with their interest rate and processing fees but decided to go elsewhere because of the service and responsiveness.

I have the housing loan with the Axis bank and the interest rate is around 9.85% and the processing charges were around 10000 Rupees. The loan amount got disbursed within fifteen days of time. Documentation procedures are good with them.

I applied for a home loan with Axis Bank and wasní¢??t too happy with the response as the executive didní¢??t follow up regarding the loan. I got contacted after almost 10-15 days and it didní¢??t seem right to me. I was comfortable with the interest rate and processing fee offered though.

There was no reply from axis bank for my home loan as i waited for the week after applying through online. The representative came and collected the documents but after that there was no follow up. It would be better if they reply to the customers with any feedback so that they can go for any other choice.

I had approached Axis Bank to check my eligibility for home loans. The executive from the bank turned out to be very knowledgeable and was very resourceful which helped clarify my doubts. The interest rate offered was manageable but the processing fee was way too much and I kept the idea of a home loan on hold.

When i applied for the home loan through online with axis bank within two hours i got call and the customer service shared all the information about the process. Interest rate offered was nearly 17% as the property document was not ready on the time so the not able to continue the process.

Axis bank response was on time for my application and they were ready to offer the home loan for the required amount but the down payment was not arranged on time so the plan was dropped. Rate of interest offered was nearly 11% for the approved loan.

I find the executives from Axis bank offered a good service when I approached for the home loan. The only point of concern was that I found them a bit pushy to close the deal than giving me enough time. The rates and processing charges were on par with most banks. I have postponed as we have not decided yet on the property.

When I applied for a home loan from Axis Bank, the customer service was very good.However it was not feasible as they gave me a higher rate of interest from the one shown on the web portal.I later applied in a different bank.I think they should be clear about what they can offer.

Feedback is good from axis bank as they keep up following me for the home loan process. Due to some personal reason i was not able to submit the documents so the plan was dropped but I am satisfied with the overall service provided by them.

It was good experience with axis bank as they approached on time when i applied for the home loan . Interest rate offered was 9.50%. The processing fee offered was high comparing with the hdfc bank. The property was not finalized so the application was closed.

Axis bank executives were not ready to collected the documents for the home loan. When ever i call them they use to give a reason like they are busy because of which i lost my interest taking the loan. They were not ready to give any info also. The service is very slow compared to other banks and finance institute .

There was immediate response from axis bank for the home loan application. Interest rate offered above 11% which is high compare to the market rate and the processing fee was similar tot other banks. The plan was postponed so i did not avail the loan.

The process of home loan was good with axis bank but the interest rate is high so i dropped the plan and took the loan with nationalized bank . Response time was good but the executive did to gave detailed information. It they reduce the interest rate and documentation process it will be great.

There is no on line portal , I am unable to check my housing loan information online I am unable to down load the certificate of interest on line however with other banks I can down load that from online.

Axis is a good bank. Over all it was good with Axis bank. Interest rate was good,it is same as the other banks and there is no any major difference. Processing fee is nominal. Within 1 month they processed my home loan so it is good.

I have taken my Home Loan from AXIS bank in the month of September 2012. Since my salary account with them they have processed my application within four days. Mr. Prabhakaran, is the bank person who was helping me in processing my application. Actually the rate of interest is 10.70% for the home loan but they have offered me 10.20% which is really good.

I had applied for Home Loan online to Axis Bank. Response was good from Bank towards my loan application. The executives were regularly following up with me but the loan amount offered to me by Axis Bank as per my income was sufficing my requirement and they suggested to add my spouse as a co-applicant in the loan, where as DHFL offered me loan as per my requirement without any co-applicant so I availed loan from DHFL.

There was a delay from my end in finalizing the property so the home loan application that I had sent to Axis bank was closed by me pro-actively. But the response was good from Axis Bank. They were regularly following up with me regarding my application. I did not have any detailed discussion about the interest rate and other charges.

My Home Loan application was responded well by Axis Bank. I got call from sales team within 24 hours and I was explained every detail about the loan offer. Interest rate offered by Axis Bank was okay, but the other charges like processing fees and other additional charges are very high. Although due documents issue I could not avail loan from Axis Bank but I expect bank to charge lower processing fees.

I availed home loan with Axis bank, it was good. We can very easily reach the customer service it was good with Axis bank. Customer service of Axis was good. In regular time they processed me loan. Processing fee was okay, it would be much better if they reduce the interest rate.

I have taken my home loan with Axis bank. It was good with Axis, they were very responsive. Within 1 month my loan got disbursed. Interest rate and processing fee what they offered me was was reasonable one compared to the other banks.

Axis bank is good. I am happy about the facility they gave, the promptness is marvelous. An executive came to collect the documents, he was well qualified. I liked the way they taken the matter, I am very much impressed with Axis bank while processing my home loan with them. But one thing is about the interest rate on the website it was displayed as 9.85% and later they charged me 9.9% in which I am not happy about. It should be the same what ever is agreed initially and should be informed properly to the customers. Axis has to improve in their responsiveness.

I have taken my home loan with Axis bank. I had a very good support from them. Their service was good. Paper work was okay. Within 45 days they have processed my loan. Interest rate charges and everything was good compared to the other banks. I would like to suggest that what ever is committed initially they should offer the same.

I availed my home loan with Axis bank. It was not that good with Axis bank. The customer service is above average. They gave a good interest and charges for my home loan I am fine with that.. The only thing is Axis should reduce their documentation process, only the relevant documents should be collected one at a time.

Home loan is taken from Axis bank. It is a very good bank for home loan. Customer service was good with Axis bank. Interest rate what they offered me was around 9.95% it is fine. Processing fee is very good and in weeks time they processed my home loan.

I applied for a home loan in axis bank. Immediately I got a call from them, the executive called me and inquired about the property which I have selected, I gave the information. They said that they provide finance only for specific location and specif property and canceled my loan application. It will be good if they can provide loan for all types of properties.

I had taken a Home loan with Axis bank. I normally bank with Axis and I used to reminder message SMS regarding EMI and this was taken before 3 years. Interest rate offered by them was 10.10%. I am very much satisfied with the service. They took around 4 months of time to process the loan .It would be great if they expedite the process. It would be great if they provide equal importance to all the customers who is applying through online and the Customers who is approaching the bank for the loan.

Axis bank is best in communication. They did a speedy work and offered me a home loan within 1 month. Customer service is good. Rate of interest is nominal. It will be better if they can update the telephone numbers of all their branches in their website.

An executive from axis bank spoke to me seeing my home loan application. He collected all my details, I had a doubt and asked clarification he said that he will get back. But he did not call me. When I tried calling him, he was not reachable. Then I got a message saying that my application was canceled. But I doní¢??t know the reason. I did not get a proper response.

The response which I received from axis bank was immediate when I applied for a home loan. They did not inform me in prior that I have to pay processing fee. At the end of the process they came up with this information so I canceled the application with them. If there is any information which involves money, they have to disclose it to the customers in the beginning.

I am not satisfied with axis bank. I applied for a home loan since the rate of interest they were ready to give was good. They called me once and enquired about my requirement. Then there was no response from them. They did not inform anything. It will be good if they can provide proper feedback for the customer and let them know the exact reason for cancellation o9f the loan application.

I applied for a home loan and an executive from axis bank called me next day. He discussed with me the process of taking a loan. He asked me whether to proceed the application, I denied. I did not identify the property so I informed them that I cannot go ahead and canceled the application. Otherwise the services offered was good.

I applied for a home loan in axis bank, I got a call from them after 2 or 3 days. They gave information about the process. But I was convinced with the interest rate offered, it was high compared to the one offered by SBI. So I canceled my application and switched to SBI. It will be really good if axis bank can reduce the charges.

From axis bank I got a good response when I applied for a home loan. They had a good follow up. I was just inquiring about the interest rate and everything. Since I got a good offer from icici bank, I canceled the application with axis bank. It will be good if they can give complete information to the customers in the beginning itself.

Customer service provided by axis bank was really good. When I applied for a home loan, they called me within 48 hours. They gave all the required information. Since the I postponed the plan of buying a house, I dropped the plan of taking a loan from them. They are doing good.

I had a great experience with axis bank when I applied for a home loan. They responded well. The executive explained each and everything over a call. But my property dealer wanted me to go with DHFL, so I canceled the application with axis bank. In future I am sure that I will contact them for any financial help.

The interest rate which axis bank was ready to offer was really good. I applied for a home loan. Until I got a letter from them I did not know that my application has been canceled. I went to the bank directly and asked for the reason, then they explained me. Since the executives informed me that they will provide the loan, I gave advance to the builder as well as I gave a cheque to he bank. Still I did not get the cheque back. It will be good if they can inform whether they can provide a loan or not.

Axis was doing good. Interest rate was normal as per the market. Charges are very less. They collected the required documents. Within the short period is time my home loan got disbursed. Customer service was good. Compared to the few other banks it would be better if Axis reduces the interest.

I have not interacted much with axis bank. I got 2 calls from them, the response was quite good. They even had a good follow up. The interest rate offered by them for my home loan was too high compared to the one offered by hdfc. Hence I canceled the application and switched to hdfc. It will be good if axis can work on the rate of interest and give more options to the customers.

I am having the home loan with the Axis bank and the rate of interest is 10.2% as floating. I need to pay the emi for 25 years with the payment as 16542 Rupees. The services are good with them and the processing charges are nominal. I got the loan within 15 days of time. There are no pre closure charges.

After my application was sent to Axis Bank for Home Loan the sales team called me and confirmed about my application. But I was disappointed when my queries were reverted well. I would like to suggest Axis bank that they should train their employees thoroughly before they handle applications of the customers.

My Home Loan application did not proceed further as I could not produce the necessary documents. I got a very good loan offer from Axis Bank online. The interest rate offered to me was also okay. Sales team gave me very good response for my application. I would reapply in Axis bank for Home Loan.

I applied for Home Loan online to Axis Bank. They called me at scheduled time and the executives were regularly following up with me. Interest rate offered by Axis bank was okay. I did not avail the loan from Axis Bank as the property that I had selected; loan was pre approved for that property from State Bank of India.

Axis Bank showed worst service when I applied for Home Loan. They contacted me basis on my application only after 5-6 days and was communicated that my application will be forwarded to the concerned local team. Post that there was no response, later i was asked about documents. No co-ordination between the bank executives which is not at all expected.

I did not avail Home Loan from Axis Bank as I postponed my plan of purchasing the property. I got very good offer online. Good interest rate and even the loan amount offered to me was as per my expectation. My experience with the response from Axis bank is also good, the executive was regularly following up and gave all detailed informations to me.

Axis Bank gave me very good offer for Home Loan. The offer that I got online was as per my expectation. Interest rate was competitive in the market but as per me the processing that was applicable was little high. Although I could not avail the Home Loan from axis bank as my plan was postponed, I would definitely reapply for Home Loan in Axis Bank.

I applied for a home loan in axis bank. The response was really goo, they were calling me often. The issue was from my end, the property which I though of buying was on hold. So I canceled the application. Service wise there was no issue with them.

The property which I was trying to purchase was not confirmed and the plan of taking a home loan was postponed. Axis bank responded well when I applied. They had a good follow. From bank side I did not face any issue.

I had a good experience with axis bank when I applied for a home loan. They called me immediately. Unfortunately I canceled the property which I chose the buy hence I had to canceled the application. In future I will approach them for the same. The services provided are good.

My Home Loan application was closed unfortunately because of document issues. Axis Bank expected some set of property documents which was not available with me. I applied online for Home Loan and got immediate response after my application was forwarded. Interest rate offered to me was also okay.

Axis Bank gave no response towards my application. After I sent my application to the Bank online, they called me up once had a discussion about the loan offer. Post which not a single call was made from Axis Bank. This kind of response is not expected from Axis Bank.

I could not avail Home Loan from Axis Bank in spite of the fact that I got good interest rate offer online. I got good response towards my loan application online. But the loan amount that Bank offered me was much lesser than what I required. Axis Bank should have options for lower income people as well.

Axis Bank sales team response was pretty late. My documents were collected and no acknowledgement was sent. Even after submitting documents the executive gave no response towards my application. Bank executives should be much more responsible in handling applications.

Response that I got from Axis Bank towards my Home Loan application was good. Communication was good. I could even negotiate with them regarding the interest rate that was offered to me. I did not avail the Home Loan from axis Bank as my plan to purchase the property was postponed.

Home Loan offer from Axis Bank was good. Interest rate was competitive. The property that I had selected had some document issues so I canceled the loan application. The experience during the application processing was good. The sales team was following up on regular basis. I recommend Axis Bank for Home Loan.

I applied for Home loan in Axis Bank online. Response was not good. They called me just once and then I got a email saying that my application has been closed, this not expected. No clear information was shared from Bank. I think the concerned team should be more responsible in order to handle applications of the customers.

I have a housing loan from axis bank. They said the processing will be deducted from the loan amount but the executives who came to collect the documents asked me to give some money. Even they did not come on time to get the documents. So I canceled the application. Because of them, I lost a property and then I was checking for some other one. The executives are very bad. Axis Bank sales executive who contacted me for my Home Loan application was not at all impressive. No information was clearly communicated so I was disappointed with the service and I decided to apply loan in ICICI Bank. I know Axis Bank for speedy loan disbursal so I applied for Axis Bank.

Axis Bank gave very good response towards my Home Loan application. My experience was absolutely fine. The called me multiple times and were regularly following up with me. Unfortunately the plan to purchase property was postponed so I had to close the application. I am very much satisfied with the offer that I got from Axis Bank.

I got good offer from Axis Bank online for Home Loan. I sent my application to Bank and they responded back to application the very next day. Interest rate offered to me from Bank was okay. I applied for home loan to Axis Bank online. They contacted me the very next day after I sent my application. The sales team of Axis Bank did very good job, they responded very well on my Home Loan application. I am happy with the executive who was handling my application. Axis Bank sales team contacted me soon after I applied online for Home loan. I received a very good offer from Axis bank online for Home Loan. I sent my application online ans as a response to my application the sales executive called me just once. My Home Loan application was not followed up well by Axis Bank sales team. I got very good offer from Axis Bank for Home Loan. The loan amount and the interest charge offered to me was also as per my requirement. The sales team was regularly following up with me regarding my application. I had to stop the processing as I had postponed my property purchase plan.

I applied for Home Loan in Axis Bank online. The sales team contacted me the same day. The executive shared all the detailed informations regarding the Home Loan. Bank offered me loan amount and interest rate as per my expectation. I am satisfied with the service from Axis Bank.

My Home Loan application was responded well by Axis Bank sales team. But unfortunate the property that I had selected was sold off so I had to cancel my loan application. Later I was even communicated that Axis Bank does not fund for the properties which are under Gram Panchayat.

I applied for Home Loan in axis Bank online but later that contacted me and informed that the property that I have finalized cannot be funded from Axis Bank. I have an existing Home Loan with HDFC Ltd. In order to get better interest rate I applied to Axis Bank for a transfer. But the interest rate had no difference, so I decided to close my application. After I applied for Home Loan in Axis Bank online the sales team contacted fro further processing. The sales team of Axis Bank gave a little delayed response towards my Home Loan application. The executive who contacted me clearly informed that there is no possibility of any negotiation. In response to my Home loan application to Axis bank the sales team contacted me and fixed an appointment. They visited my office and inquired the details from end. I got a very good option from Axis Bank online to have my Home Loan transfered. My application was sent and the concerned team called me for further processing. The executive later communicated that B katha properties are not funded by Axis Bank. Its my suggestion to Axis Bank that they should be little flexible in these scenarios to have better business.

Response from the sales team of Axis Bank towards my Home Loan application was good. The executive gave me clear information about the required documents. There was proper communication done from Bank and I appreciate the same, The loan amount offered to me online along with the interest rate was also okay.

I had applied for Home Loan to axis Bank. The Bank executive contacted me soon after I submitted my application online. The conversation with the Bank executive was satisfactory. My expected loan amount was much higher than what bank was offering me. So I canceled my application to Axis Bank.

Axis Bank gave very good response towards my Home Loan application. They communicated well in regards to my application. Bank informed me that my application cannot be processed further due to this.

Axis Bank contacted me soon after I applied for Home Loan online. The sales executive was in contact with me on regular basis. I got a very disappointing response from Axis Bank towards my Home loan application online. The sales executive called me up and inquired about the property and within a minute or two he declared on the call that the property that I have selected cannot be funded by Axis Bank. I applied for Home Loan in Axis Bank online as I had selected a property and had finalized to proceed further with the deal. I got good response from the sales team of Axis Bank. I got Axis Bank Home loan offer online so I filled up the online form sent it. I got a good response from the sales team. Unfortunately the property that i had selected was not doable by Axis Bank as per their internal norms. The executive informed the same to me very clearly. I appreciate the services offered from Axis bank.

I applied for Home Loan online to Axis Bank. The loan amount offered to me was much less than what I expected. Even the interest rate was higher when compared to other Banks and financial organizations. They closed my application saying that the property that I have selected is not doable. No flexibility is there.

I applied for Home Loan online to Axis Bank. The executive came and collected my documents, the attitude of the executive was not at all pleasing. My application was closed from basis on some internal norms but Bank took no initiative to keep me informed about the same. This was not at all acceptable.

My home loan was taken from AXIS bank. They were very good in processing. I never faced any problems with them. They have offered me 10% rate of interest in floating type. My documentation process went smoothly. Bank took just 15 days to complete my processing.

I applied for Home Loan online to Axis Bank and the very next morning the sales team contacted me. Property was not finalized still so I thought I will postponed the loan application as well. Bank offered good interest rate and the loan amount that was offered to me was also sufficient as per my requirement.

I applied for Home loan online to Axis Bank. The sales team was regularly following up with me. The interest rate offered to me was compatible in the market. I got my home loan approved from LIC Housing Finance during a short span so I did not proceed further with Axis Bank.

My experience with Axis Bank during my Home Loan application was good. They were regularly following up with me in regards to my Loan application. They called me and informed the necessary documents. Interest rate offered to me was competitive in the market. Due to my personal reasons I did not avail loan from Axis Bank.

It was a very transparent process for my home loan with Axis Bank. Services was at my door. I did not have to go to the bank. They clearly told me about everything and they also collected separate cheque for the processing charge. It was not deducted from my loan. The process took 20 days. Disadvantage is they do not have a phone banking or online facility for the home loan team alone. I need to drive down 20Kms to the bank and physically fill up the form at the bank and submit my request.

It was good with Axis while processing my home loan with Axis bank. The service they rendered was good. Interest rate and processing fee was reasonable one. So within a week my home loan got disbursed. Paper work was good. Over all it was good I have no comments as of now.

I availed my home loan with Axis bank. The process was very slow. They were demanding for more documents. Interest rate offered was around 11.5% floating which is very high. They do not intimate when the interest rate is reduced in the market. It would say that Axis bank should be more transparent, fast in their processing. Interest rate what they try to charge should be as per the market.

I am not happy with the service of Axis bank as they made move around more than one year for th home loan after collecting all the document by not giving any response. They not even response us back as we have to visit the branch and do the follow up.

I took a home loan from Axis bank it was good in the period of 2013.The interest rate and processing fee charged were as per the market rate. Documentation process was easy . They disbursed the loan within 15 days.

I took a home loan from Axis bank they disbursed the loan within 15 days.They collected only the regular documents for the process. Interest rate offered was 10.15% and processing fee charged was was very normal. I have already recommended axis bank for the people as the bank give proper explanation with regards to the process.

It was good experience with Axis bank. When my home loan was in process I got a good support. Within a week my loan disbursed. Customer service was good. Actually there was a technical problem,but I spoke to the manager sorted the things. Mr Ravi Kumar an executive of axis bank he was very supportive till date. interest rate was floating one 9.95%, it would be better if they reduce it. They charged very less processing fee.

It was good with Axis while processing my home. I had no issues with the bank. It took around 50 days to get my home loan amount but it is okay. Service is satisfactory, they were very cooperative. Satisfied with the interest rate and charges.. I have no concern with the bank it is good.

I took a home loan from Axis bank. The processing time was fine it was upto the mark. interest rate was reasonable and charges are good very low compared to the other banks. The only thing is I am not happy with the post loan experience. There was no single communication or email from the bank regarding my loan disbursement , Emi statement etc. The communication with the customer should be in a proper manner. I am not happy with Axis hence they have to improve their customer service and response.

I transfered my Home Loan from DCB Bank to Axis bank in 2013 as they offered me comparatively better interest rate. The loan is in floating interest rate, currently I am paying interest at 9.85%. Service from Axis Bank is good. Whenever any revision is done in interest rates by RBI; Axis bank keeps me informed about the same and implements same rate immediately.

I had a very good loan experience with Axis Bank based on the Home loan process.I havení¢??t faced any difficulties with the documentation process because they required nominal documents.The interest rate offered was a floating rate as 10% but later they have changed it to 9.5%.

I took a home loan from Axis bank have 2-3 policies to avail the loan as they give the loan based on the land. After submitting the proper documents within 15 days loan will be disbursed.Interest rate offered was 10.5% with the processing fee of Rs. 14,000 . The documentation charges was Rs.1200. They have communication gap with regards to the charges and it takes to loan if we visit the branch.

I have got a Home loan with Axis Bank before 6years and the service and response provided was quick.I havení¢??t faced any issue in the overall process.The customer service provided was really good.The interest rate offered was around 7.7% which is good but being a floating rate it was changed to 11% so I transfered the loan.

Interest rate offered by Axis bank for my home loan 10.52% and the processing fee was 0%. They disbursed the loan within 5-10 days after submitting the documents. The documentation part was also very easy and the representative came to collect the documents. The bank is good as they provided the loan on time.

It was fine with Axis bank.At time when I applied for my home loan interest rate was floating. , it was around 10.25% which was fine as the other banks. When there is an increase in the interest rate by the Rbi they used to intimate me at the same time when there is decrees in the interest rate no one intimate the customers. It would be much better if they inform their customers when there is decline in the interest rate.

I have not finalized the property yet and that was the major reason for not taking the Axis bank housing loan. I have not taken loan with any other bank. Interest rate offered by Axis bank was good and processing fee was also good.

The thing is that I have done a balance transfer loan with Axis bank and they gave very less interest rate of 9.85% and not sure how it is going to be in future. Process fee charge is not so high because it is 0.5%. Axis bank asked for an insurance for this home loan but I asked them to not process.

It is an old took, I took this before 5 years. I approached axis bank directly to get this home loan. I got a good offer from them. The service offered was pathetic at the time of processing a loan. After the loan got through it was really nice.

Compared to other banks and financial organizations Axis Bank is much more flexible in terms of rate of interest and other internal norms as well. I availed Home Loan from Axis Bank at floating interest rate. I am glad that bank gave me loan cheques as per the property value and the registration value.

It was Average experience with Axis Bank based on the home loan application.The interest rate offered was very less compared to others and there charges were also less.I transfers the loan to other finance because they are not ready to offer a top up loan from Axis Bank.

I am completely satisfied with axis bank. I took a home loan from them. Within 15 days I got the loan. The processing was easy and the agent approached me for processing the application. They can improve on customer account details. It is very difficult for a customer to track the details online.

I have taken my mortgage home loan from Axis Bank. The services has been very good from them. The loan process took around 15 days. The rate of interest was of 11.25%. The processing charges was good too. Satisfactory with the services of the bank.

I took Home loan from Axis Bank at 11% fixed rate of interest in 2009. The officer who handled my case was very helpful and processed my loan in just 4 working days. Documentation process was also so simple. I have recently completed my loan and received no objection certificate as well.

I had expected my Home Loan only for 10 years but as per bank norms I was offered loan for 17 years. The loan is in floating interest rate, as soon as there is any revision in RBI norms Axis Bank brings the same into practice without any delay. Bank is so good that they gave me a top up loan recently on my existing Home loan. I am overall satisfied with Axis Bank.

Axis bank service is very good as within 6-7 days they sanctioned my home loan and disbursed 15 days after completing the documentation. Interest rate offered was 10.1% which is little high comparing with sbi bank and processing fee charged was .5% on the loan amount .The other charges are very minimal. Documentation process was normal.

It was not a good experience with Axis Bank while I got a Home loan.They have lost all my file which I have submitted for document submission.They made me to resubmit the same documents once again.They have taken around 3months to process my loan application.

Not satisfied with the bank as there was mismatch in the loan amount and that amount was disbursed to the dealer which is wrong as per the customer point of view. DD was done before the given time for which i paid the extra charge. Interest rate charged was 9.95% when i took a loan and then it got reduced .Processing fee charged was 0% they only charged stamp duty charge of Rs. 3000. I would suggest to the bank that the employees should response to the customer.

My experience with the Axis bank was very good for the home loan. It was a very good service offered by this bank. The executive had come and got all my documents from my place. It took only a week time for the loan amount to get disbursed from this bank. Overall everything went on smooth and so no issues.

I have a home loan from axis bank which I got by approaching them directly. They were supportive. I had an executive from the sales team who helps me. If I raise any queries they raise it to bank and it will be resolved in just 2 to 3 hours. It was a corporate offer which I got, it was a competitive one.

Easy home loan i got from Axis bank the bank helped me a lot and the process was smooth. There was some mismatch in the interest rate because the loan amount got differ during the disbursement. After approaching the bank it was been solved.Axis bank was very helpful in the providing the statement as per our requirement. I pre closured the loan without any extra charges.Interest rate stated with 11 and ended with 12.5% . They disbursed the loan in a month by inspecting the property.

Interest rate offered by Axis bank for the housing loan is 9.5%. Their Internet banking is very good, I normally make the payment online. I am also allowed to make partial payments online. I do have the option of downloading statements and certificate of interest online. The total tenure of the loan is 30 years.

I have taken my home loan from Axis Bank. There are benefits for staff of the bank. So I got a very low fixed rate of interest and there was no processing fee. The total tenure of the loan is for 20 years. The services has been good. It was a smooth process for the loan.

I did not compare the rate of interest with other banks so glad in what I got for a home loan. Axis bank is good and also I would appreciate an executive as he collected all papers on time. Total tenure period is of 25 years and at any time I can go for pre closure where the charge is nil.

My experience with Axis bank is very good for the home loan. It took only 2 days for the loan to get disbursed to my account. The documentation process was quite normal as it was not difficult. The processing fee charges was very less by this bank.

It was good with Axis bank, the representatives came up on time to collect my documents. They coordinated very well. Interest rate compared to the few other banks is higher side. The fee and charges was nill, I was not charged. So In 10 days I got my home loan amount credited to my account. I suggest the bank to match up with other bank for lower interest rate.

It is actually good with Axis bank compared to the other bank and financial institution while processing my home loan. Once I finalized the property it took around 3 to 4 month to complete the process. They were demanding of more documents but then also it was okay. This bank allows single applicant for loan, I feel this as an advantage. Interest rate and processing fee is based on the norms of the bank so it is good.

Axis bank is really good. I got a good offer from them when I applied through this portal. From the beginning they were responsive. I availed home loan with Axis bank recently. I had a very good experience with them. I availed my home loan with Axis bank. Basically the representative is not that good. They took 20 days to process my home loan with Axis bank. Axis bank is very prompt to give response to the customers. I have taken my home loan with them which was disbursed in 1 month . Documentation process was little complicated. Interest rate and processing fee charged were nominal. I would suggest the axis bank to continue the same service.

Axis bank housing loan process is fine. They have provided the maximum loan amount which is 90% overall its good. Its satisfactory. I have taken a housing loan with Axis Bank. The interest rate offered by them is the lowest in the market. Infact they have reduced the rate twice and the rate change happened instantly. Axis bank housing loan process is fine. I got a very good response from them on time. No hassle with them. They have offered the loan within 15 days of time. I got a Home Loan from Axis bank. It was nearly Rs 34 Lakhs with 20 years tenure. The interest rate was good but the processing fee was high compared to other banks. I took a home loan from Axis bank and the experience was good as they disbursed the loan within less time. Interest rate and processing fee charged was the same as per market rate. I have taken my home loan with Axis Bank. The process was not smooth with the bank. The legal process had a delay, as they did not ask for the documents at one stretch. I have taken a housing loan with Axis Bank. They are sending SMS just in case if the rate decreases. Even if the documents were less they would be able to process the loan still . They also help people in funding amount additionally in some way or the other.

While I applied for the Home loan with Axis Bank a person came for document collection and I have submitted the required documents for which I got a verification call as well.The loan process was about to complete but no response was provided by the Bank after the verification call.There interest rate is also on the higher side and I would suggest it will be good if Axis Bank work on each application and give a update about the application status.

Home loan process was very fast and the processing fee s comparatively less. I like banking with with Axis bank. Insurance on home loan was mentioned where I did not prefer as it is optional. Rate of interest is of 10.15% and this is floating from first year. Service charge that deducted for home loan was 5k. Fund was released within the time period of 15 days. Entire loan process was smooth and good with Axis bank. Background verification was smooth and paper works were simple.
