In the year 2010, I have taken a home loan disbursed from CITI bank. Relevant documents were collected as per the bank norms. It took maximum of 3 weeks for them to disburse the loan amount. They quoted a high interest rate for the home loan process.

I have closed the home loan with the CITI bank and the rate of interest was around 8.25%. I would like to say its an excellent one because they have given me the fixed rate of interest and it was the lowest on time. I dint faced any issues with them till now.

They are taking too much of time to process the loan.The interest rate applied was also good and it was a competitive rate in the market.The customer service provided was really good with CITI Bank based on the home loan application being submitted.

I have taken this Home loan with CITI Bank before 10-11years and I havenÌ¢??t faced any difficulties in the loan process.I get the best service from CITI Bank based on the application being submitted.The complete process was smooth and after completion also I received the documents on time.

The rate of interest is around 10.1% for the home loan with the Citi bank which is okay but other banks are giving the low rate of interest rather than this. It took around a month of time to disburse the loan. Due to the verification it got some time.

I had a loan with LIC and I wanted it to be transferred to any other bank with Overdraft facility. SBI, SCB, IDBI and Citibank offers the same facility. When I approached Citibank for the balance transfer, They have given all the information clearly and it was quite convincing deal but at last they said, the bank generally gives you the interest benefit for amount maintained over and above 1Lac. Now, this is something they are making fool to there customer. Other banks, don't have such conditions. So, I would request everyone to kindly double check before opting for the loan.

I had a loan with LIC and I wanted it to be transferred to any other bank with Overdraft facility. SBI, SCB, IDBI and Citibank offers the same facility. When I approached Citibank for the balance transfer, They have given all the information clearly and it was quite convincing deal but at last they said, the bank generally gives you the interest benefit for amount maintained over and above 1Lac. Now, this is something they are making fool to there customer. Other banks, don't have such conditions. So, I would request everyone to kindly double check before opting for the loan.

I took the loan with citi bank for the rate of interest as 7.25%.It was very long so the rate of interest was a bit cheaper.The service , process are really fine.Only end of the part took more time because they took so much of time to release my documents from them because they sent it to mumbai head office and released my documents.

I hope you all know SBI Maxgain facility. I had a loan with LIC and when my ROI was increased I contacted CITI bank official as I have salary account with them. They are very good w.r.t giving you clear information. Home Credit, similar to SBI Maxgain is a service offered by CITIBank but there is a catch, when I negotiated with the official, he informed me that the HOME Credit facility comes with a bit higher rate of interest and you will get benefit for amount deposited which is more than 1 lakh. So for example, if have parked 3 lakhs in the overdraft account you will get only 2 lakh benefit.

Response from Citibank was amazing and they gave me good feeling. Citibank is standing in the market due to their service as they are wonderful. Executives came my place to explain the details and also they gave written statements regarding the same, which made me happy. It took three day to make ready the documents for home loan but overall the loan got delivered in 15 days. Citibank have much filters to take home loan and they are sanctioning loan only for A - Khatta property.

Actually the tenure of home loan with Citibank is 10 years but still I am paying same interest rate which is 14% however they suppose to reduce the interest rate. The interest rate is floating. I was disappointed with the interest rate thus Citibank should normalize the rate as per industry. The automated service like alerts, reminders are very good and regular no doubts on that. EMI date is 1st of every month but it is not convenient as my account is with different bank so before 1st I need to transfer the amount for EMI. Wonderful if Citibank change the EMI date in first ten working days.

I HAD TAKEN HOME LOAN IN CITIBANK AT 10.1%(FIXED FOR 2 YEARS) WITH NO OTHER CHARGES EXCEPT BOOKING FEE WHICH IS LESS THAN OTHER BANKS.THE SERVICE THEY OFFER WAS EXCELLENT.EVERY THING WAS DONE AT YOUR DOOR STEP.I VISITED THE BANK ONLY ONCE AT THE TIME OF AGREEMENT SIGNING.THE EXECUTIVE WAS SO COOPERATIVE,HE WILL EXPLAIN YOU EVERY THING ON PAPER LIKE HE WAS EXPLAINING TO A KID.I AM SO HAPPY TO GET A LOAN FROM CITIBANK.I WOULD RECOMMEND CITIBANK IF YOU WANT TO SAVE TIME AND MONEY ALSO.I THINK IT IS CHEAPER THAN SBI.FOR MORE INFO CONTACT BHARATH (8125813534)

The processing with Citi bank Home loan was convenient. As i have my salary account with this bank for more than 7 years, it was easier and i got my loan with no processing charges, rate of interest was too good on negotiation and there was no documentation too. The pre payment option was available so i feel its good.

I am happy with the service of CITI Bank in applying the housing loan the processing and the documentation was very good and its easy the customer service executive took the initiative in completing the process and the EMI was affordable and the whole process got completed in 60 days.The Bank Bazaar web site is the good site for all financial services where i can see all types of loan and their rate of interest and to know the eligibility this web site is very helpful.

I am a happy customer of Citibank.They are provide a good service and i have been using Citibank credit card for last 6 years. When ever am in need i call Citibank customer care and they come up with a solution for the issue am facing. Citibank has a best feature in which if the Citibank accounts/ credit card are linked ,we can just call up Citibank customer care and do a balance transfer over the phone itself. It will be better if Citibank opens lot of branches in all cities otherwise their services are excellent.

CITIBANK's services are ok.I have earned lot of reward points by using the card for most of the purchases and it was very useful for me to redeem the bonus point in fuel stations.Till now i have not faced any problem with Citibank with regard to credit card.Also they have a offer on annual fees where if the spends crosses above 30,000 rs in a year then the annual fees that was charged would get waived off.

CitiBank is very good in terms of Salary account. Their net banking facility is awesome and I use online banking a lot for almost all transactions. I like the fund transfer facility they have provided in net banking.Citibank has good reward plans and in which i was able to earn 2500 rs bonus points on my credit card.

Citibank has a very easy payment mechanisms like NEFT.Doing payments for Citibank is quite convenient. My suggestion is they should come up with new features like Card to card payment like other banks.This Card is very useful for doing fuel based transactions.Also they have a wonderful scheme call referral program,where we will be rewarded with 2500 bonus point if a person is referred and that person gets qualified for citibank credit card.

Citibank's online portal is really awesome and they are giving good offers on credit card which are entirely different from the reward plans given by other banks. Points earned on citibank credit cards can be redeemed on air tickets which is a very useful scheme which citi has.One dis -advantage with Citibank is, doing transactions at branch is not hazzle free as there will be lot of rush all the time.

Corporation bank is a good bank and this is a bank one could depend upon. I availed a home loan from this bank. Interest rate offered to me was according to the market rate. Whereas they asked for more documents unlike the private banks. It was within a week duration my loan got credited to my account.

Rate of interest offered by Co operation bank for the housing loan is 10.25%. They have not revised the interest rate as per RBI guidelines. I wonder why they are not in line with RBI instructions. I am holding this housing loan for the past 4 years. Installments are much affordable. They were able to process the loan within the stipulated time and the funds were realized on time.

Within fifteen days my home loan was disbursed by the corporation bank . The property verification was smooth .Interest rate and processing fee charged were the best. . Paper works were fine. Response and service provided was great

My home loan is from Corporation bank. The services are good form them. The process was very easy. I got my loan on time. They also offered a good rate of interest and also a good processing charges. It was a very satisfactory experience.

Bank is good and at that time I did not have any option with other bank sand took it with Corporation bank. First year the rate was too good. The manger called me and explained me about the home loan rate split ups. Then I came to know the real fact.

This home loan is transferred from one person to me as no much interaction with Corporation bank. However the manager use to call me for any kind of problem and he took initiative. During the process they assisted well. Rate is 9.25% for home loan and this is floating.

The service provided by the corporation bank was very good based on the home loan.They are quite slow in processing the loan to the customer.They are not providing any intimation or alerts about the loan process which is a drawback of corporation banks

Corporation bank housing loan is good, I am very much happy with them . They were very fast and they helped in processing the request. I am getting a waiver on the processing fee and that the most promising feature of this particular loan. Overall the customer satisfaction was there. They were doing it very fast. I am holding this loan for a few days only. Frankly speaking I did not expect this sort of service from this bank.

The manger and staffs of the corporation bank are good in responsive . Within 2 weeks the home loan was disbursed . Interest rate was 9.65%. They require the simple and legal document only . There is no need of any security. The only condition to take the loan is that we have to open the account with their bank.

Corporation bank is a government banks so satisfied with the rate as that is very less for the home loan. Normally we can trust on nationalized banks as they will not cheat. I am getting good response but personally have to visit. Interest is floating and that is good for me.

Corporation bank is a typical Government bank, everything goes on it own pace. I have availed my home loan with them, I found their interest rate and charges are less they have given a good deal since my builder had a tie up with this bank. Apart from this there was no transparency, no customer service I had to do manually. They took 2 months for the disbursal. I feel Corporation bank should improve in all the aspects and should be more transparent.

As a government bank the Corporation bank is little back in services. Other than the service they are fine with all the things. They have taken atleast two and half months to clear the home loan as the service was too slow. Rate is quite similar with SBI so no issue in interest.

CORPORATION bank branch is located near to my property so I have taken this home loan from them. I liked their services very much. I do not find any difficulties with them. Since I am an account holder they assisted me very well. My papers were clear because I am filling ITR regularly. It was helped them to process it quickly.

I have the home loan with the corporation bank. Initially it was 10.15% and after that it got reduced. The services are good with them. After I submitted the papers I got the sanction letter after that I got the loan on the registration date with them.

No proper customer service was provided by Corporation bank housing loan. I cannot expect much service from them as it is a Government bank. Rate of interest offered by them was very less the reason why I am taken a housing loan from Corporation bank is because. I am holding an account with them. thereby, I had planned to move from Corporation bank to ICICI Bank

My opinion about Corporation bank Home loan is, the processing time was quick and I got the loan amount disbursed within 5 days. I have taken a home loan from corporation bank as it is the nationalized bank so it has lots of work . They took more time for the approval but I am happy with the service. From Corporation Bank I availed my home loan. It was good with them. Everything was nice. Interest rate is 13% which is very less. Charges was zero percent hence satisfied with this bank. I had a very good experience with Corporation Bank based on the Home loan process.I am really satisfied with the service and their staffs are very friendly with customer.They have taken around 15days to process the loan application.Being a government bank they provide good service.

I took the home loan with the Corporation bank before 2 years. The rate of interest is 10.25% as fixed. The processing charges are around 8000 Rupees and the services are good. Within 10 days of time that I got the loan. Documentation process are smooth and there is nothing to complain.

Two years back I availed a home loan from Corporation bank. It was a good experience with them. Very comfortable interest rate and charges. Minimal paper work. In ten days my home loan got credited to my account. Service was good . No draw back as such.

I availed home loan with Corporation bank. As it is a Gov bank, I have not expected more the service was very good, the bank manager was good. Interest rate is low, I was not charged for the fee and charges. I got the loan in 25 days. I have no feed back back as such they are good.

From coperation bank i have taken Home loan the loan which was approved within 10-15 days but i delayed to take the disbursement so it took 1 month. Corporation bank is pretty customer friendly as i took a home loan from them. The service offered by the corporation bank was very good. It took only 15 days for the loan to get disbursed and also the paper work was very easy. Interest rate was 10.25% and the processing fee was Rs 6000 is normal in as other banks.Other than this it was a very bad experience with the customer service of corporation banks. Even the bank manager should be more professional and well educated. It took 20 to 25 days for disbursement, even this can be done little more faster.

I took a housing loan from Corporation bank and they took 25 days for the disbursement. Documentation was easy being a housing loan. Interest rate charged was 10.15% with zero processing fee which was provided on basic of the offer. No customer service is given and i directly went to the bank and done formalists. Comparatively to all other national bank s corporation bank is th best.

Before five years i took a housing loan from cooperation bank the disbursement took long time process for 3 months. Co operation bank Bank housing loan is really good. The best part about this loan is there is no processing fee charged for this loan. Interest rate offered by them was very attractive. The service offered by the Corporation Bank for my home loan was not upto the mark. It took 10 days of the loan to get disbursed. The documentation process was of paper work and it took some time for the loan to get processed.

If you think private banks are those who change colors from sales to after-sales experience, this bank is one you could better keep away. I had used their services since 1990. Off late, they are showing signs of mistrust. I had taken a home loan in 2004 at a floating rate of interest. Till around 2010, they used to intimate the change of rates promptly. Thereafter, they seem to have got into some kind of problem. I have been experiencing a slew of issues with this bank and they do not seem to take any feedback at all, blaming it on 'instructions from top' . Interest rate hikes are not informed to customers, fail to revise rates when interest rates fall in market (even after 3 years), make mistakes in EMI calculations, charge you when switching schemes (as against RBI instructions), never respond to e-mails (apparently, head office has instructed branches to discourage e-mails from customers!!) etc. So, keep away from corporation bank.....

From my personnel experience corporation bank is good for Home Loan as they provide all assistance and support for applying the home loan. The bank itself is doing the verification process, hence 99% chance to get approve if the documents is okay. They will take the legal\verification charges only after final approval of the loans.

Even though iam working for this great hitech savy bank , my customer friends all over the country remember me for the responsiveness and service rendering by the dedicate staff iwillget immense happiness, satisfaction and proudto be a member of corp bank family.

I think Corporation bank has offered competitive rate and they disbursed the home loan amount within 15 days. All the benefits like pre closure and part payment are available in Corporation bank. It was a good experience with Corporation bank in availing home loan. This bank offered the loan for the joined account which is been linked with my brother's account. Interest rate is 11.75% with 1% as the processing fees. Pre payment option is available where there is no charges.

AM quite ok with this Corporation bank in terms of home loan however interest rate is quite higher so I am in a plan of loan transfer. Customer service was quite good and sufficient in corporation bank. They offered me 11.75% for my home loan as interest rates which was quite good. My account is in corporation bank so it was easier to get the home loan. Interest rate was the same like HDFC ltd, it was 10.25% and no processing fees. Only legal charges was there for verification. Customer service was good in corporation bank. My home loan was approved within 15 days. Basically all the banks charging the same interest rate. Payment not an issues. Online banking was feasible. Last 15 years I am dealing with no issues .No suggestions

For corporation bank, the process was all done. Documentation is everything i went to corporation bank manager, helped me throughout. On a base rate, interest rate is 10.25%. Though its a government bank, i want to do documentation by myself, there is no trouble as the Manager is helpful.

Corporation Bank HL best thing was there service and prompt response, if they reduced there interest rate little bit will be great, with in 1 month i got approval for my home loan, and there was no extra charges and hidden charges and processing fee was good, there response was good they guided me well i am very much satisfied.

I availed house loan from corporation bank and i feel everything is fine about it. But only thing is there is a delay in processing time but everything is quite transparent. Corporation Bank HL Overall satisfied with service approval process took in 10 days and no extra charges i have no suggestion it was perfect service satisfied with interest rate also best thing is the response and customer service was very good overall i am fully satisfied with the service.

Corporation Bank provided a good response for my home loan compared to other banks.Whatever loan amount was required they gave me in a very short time. The main advantage of Dena Bank is that their home loan processing procedures are very simple and neat. They are taking a month time to disburse the loan amount and I am very glad about that. One of my friend has suggested me to avail my Home loan from DENA bank. This is the bank I approached and also got this loan from them. This bank is comparatively very good with other nationalized banks. When I was taking this loan there was some special offers was given to me.

I have taken a loan from dena bank in oct 2010. Every thing went on well so long. Aftet 5years i have a tough time with the bank. Pathetic service. In conclusion do not go by the smiles of the manager, understand what is the basic policy of the bank as that normaly does not change over years. Especially nationalised banks.
I got the housing loan with the Dena bank.Its the rate of interest as around 10.5%.The services are really better with them.The relationship is really good with me and the bank.
I got the housing loan with the Dena bank.Its the rate of interest as around 10.5%.The services are really better with them.The relationship is really good with me and the bank.

Dena bank is more customer friendly and charges are minimal for home loan thus I chosen them. Interest rate and tenure is good. In addition to that they have good EMI options. I would say DENA bank is well versed nationalized bank where their policies, terms and conditions are quite transparent. Follow up was awesome from Dena bank and everything was proper. Dena bank is new generation bank so they are very good in all the aspects. Services are quite good with DENA bank. Since my property was into their norms, i did get the home loan. Interest is 10.25% with 1500 as processing fees. It was really a good experience of availing a home loan from Dena bank. One of my friend has opted for the loan and he recommended the bank to me. Customer service was like government sector in DENA bank. They dont follow the rules. Earlier documents unfortunately I have to go another home loan with them. There is no trouble . Deena Bank HL Overall i am fully satisfied with service i felt so happy the approval process took just 1 day for processing my home loan approval there customer service and response was excellent i have no queries perfect service i am fully satisfied.

By April, I availed home loan from Dena bank. Processing time and documentation, verification was all done within 3-4 days. DENA BANK was quite good in terms of their customer service and i have my account with them, for past 15years i haven't faced any problem with them. Even if i go to the branch they responded me well and rate of interest was quite ok with DENA Bank.

Took a home loan with DHFL a month back and i must say that they understood my needs and helped me with a dedicated RM who helped me throughout the process. They not only considered the complications that i had in my file but also gave me best rate of intrest. If you have any issues with cibil then talk to these guys and they will definately help you.

Even with DHFL, I had faced some issues where I had to travel a lot to reach the branch. I had to spend a lot of time to get my issue resolved. At the time of closure I had been to the branch and they took nearly 22 days to close my loan account .

Too much of issues I faced, Same like marvadi finance. Any time they can change their system. They say something and do other some thing. Very poor. I will not refer any one. True, a while back I had taken my home loan from DHFL. The process was completed on time, as per my requirement. The documents were collected on time the charges were really high. For a loan amount of five lakhs. There were charges of 40K in total and the rate of interest charged was of 14%.

It is very convenient to transact with DHFL. On the contrary, The executives who are collecting the documents are not giving proper response. They are not giving accurate information. It would be good, if they provide the list of documents required in the initial stage itself rather than asking at a later stage.

My home loan is with the DHFL, I have disbursed 15 lakhs from them for an EMI of 20 years. DHFL do not offer facility to increase the tenured period and no exciting offers like last year EMI waiver. Being a private finance institution they offer loans with high interest rate.

First of all, let me start by saying that the service offered by DHFL for the home loan was not up to the mark. The rates are revised as per government norms, but being a floating rate they have not decreased it yet. I mailed them several times for the update but no response from DHFL related to the home loan.They also have charged more hidden charges which was deducted during the later stages of loan.

My top up for the home loan was from DHFL again. The process was very much delayed. They been below average in their services. The rate of interest was of 11.25 % initially and later it went on to 10.75%. The processing charges was normal. I would not wish to recommend this institution.

I have initially taken my home loan from DHFL. They are not satisfactory in their services. They take a lot of time to respond. But they offered me a very good rate of interest of 8%. The processing charges was the same as others. Overall I was not very happy with the process.

Such a quick and painless loan process. DHFL helped me sanction the loan in few days. Being NRI in USA, it was very very smooth process. No hassle sending documents back and forth to India. . It was amazing. DHFL made my dream come true.. Interest rate offered was 9.65% which is little higher than others and processing fees 23K. But, they need minimal documentation and very fast approval. I called executive, they said, there are no extra charges on top of that. So, there is no question why we shouldnt go ahead with DHFL.

I have not faced any drawbacks because my previous office mates are working their.The process was simple with DHFL including the documentation.The rate offered were good with DHFL for getting a home loan and I am impressed by their services.

My housing loan is with DHFL and the interest rate was good one like it was around 9.55%. The loan amount got disbursed to my account immediately and I got it before six months of time. I really can say that the documentation process was very good with DHFL

DHFL has been very transparent in the home loan process. They informed me all the details clearly. The tenure is for 20 years. The rate of interest was of 10.25%. The processing charges was normal. The whole process was smooth and easy.

I availed a Composite loan for Rs.20 Lakhs which is a type of Home loan from DHFL at an interest rate of 11.75%. The first 3 years it follows the fixed rate and later on a floating basis. My housing loan is with DHFL and the interest rate was around 10.15% . Tenure is around twenty years and the customer service is good, also the response too. Getting a home loan through DHFL was quite faster, when compared with other banks. It was a hassle free process throughout, and my loan got sanctioned in 15 days of time. I am also satisfied that DHFL approved the loan amount that I was expecting .

I had taken a home loan about 4 years back with DHFL for an interest rate of 11%. Its a 12 year loan and was arranged through an agent. The amount which I asked for was provided to me by DHFL when I processed a home loan. I was pretty satisfied with their services. I am very much happy about the rate of interest offered was according and it was line with the market rate. Within a week I got my loan approved..

I got the amount that I asked for from the DHFL for my home loan. Services are pretty nice with them as the entire process was completed in a short duration of time. I had a better experience as the interest rate was moderate and the loan disbursement took 10 days.

The service provided was good with DHFL related to the Home loan.They have processed within 15days of time.They give more than the required loan amount.They have given a loan in very less rate.They have not applied any additional charges for the loan.

I had taken a home loan from DHFL financing company. The interest rate offered at the time was 9.55% which was affordable and on par with most banks. DHFL is good organization that provides the customer with the loan amount they ask for.I took a home loan from them on 2014. I was availed with the market interest rate of 10.50%. The process of disbursement took almost 15 days. According to me the customer services of the bank has to improve. And also DHFL should be more transparent.

DFHL home loan process is good but they take much time to disburse the car loan.Rate of interest is very high comparing with other banks in the market but other charges are normal . I took the home loan from dhfl with the interest rate of 10.15% and the processing fee charged was Rs.7000. I had all the documents clear so the process went on smooth.They took one month to disbursement. The executive of the bank did not follow up as i was following up them for the process.

The experience with dfhl is not got as they offering the interest rate is very high for home loan and processing fee they charged was 1% on the loan amount. Basically they took one month for the disbursement which is long time. Due to the higher interest i am planning to transfer the loan with other banks.

I have the housing loan with the DHFL. The rate of interest is around 9% to 9.5% as floating. It took around 3 months of time to get the loan because I am working in offshore, so its hardly to connect with them. Customer service and the responsiveness are good with them. The loan got transferred from the ICICI bank.

Approval was done in 4 days and I have submitted all related papers for the home loan where yet to receive the loan amount. Interest rate is 12% if we select the property on panchayat and it get reduced for other lands. From the time of my application, the very next day they started processing. DHFL met all my expectations.

Dhfl have a floating interest rate, their interest rate is pretty high. I am not informed about the interest when it is reduced. Dhfl has to work on reducing the interest rate part compared to the other nationalized bank.Interest rate for home loan should be more competitive. There is no default is done. I have no comments for Dhfl as of now.

From DHFL i took the housing loan but they delay in the process as i was in the emergency . There was no follow up till 28 days after my approach and in between there was no conversation. I put more effort to process the application. In the initial stage they offered the rate of interest as 9.9% and later it was changed to 10.25%. Processing fee charged was Rs. 5500 charge without any information.

The best part about DFHL housing loan process is fine. They kept me posted about the list of documents which is required in advance before 2 or 3 days of time. There is no challenges as such and they are taking a lot of time to process the request and they took around a months time to provide the housing loan.

Dhfl they are bit higher in their interest rates. Otherwise their service was good. Interest rate at the time was good. They are doing good job. They are very liberal in providing loan. Process was good with Dhfl. Interest rate is high, dhfl has to have a look into it the interest rate ans there cane be some deduction in their interest rate for existing customers.

Till now it was good with Dhfl in terms of home loan. I have no complaint with them. Interest rate was around 9.9% which is same. Service was good with Dhfl, the representative came to collect the documents and in a week I got my loan amount credited. Best part is service and good response, they were in touch with me till now.

I done all the procedures and waiting for the loan amount as it would be delivered in couple of days. Interest rate in DHFL for home loan is 10.15%. Customer service is not that good. The sales executive mentioned that the life insurance and term insurance is mandatory as they cannot do the home loan without these. When I inquired to the customer support, they mentioned that as optional. For life insurance I paid 17k and amount collected for term insurance as well. Documentation charge was 2500 as overall the charges were high.

Experience with DHFL was not good. I applied for Home Loan for the 1st time, documentation was done even processing fees was charged but loan approval letter and the agreement was not signed. Long time passed off so I took aid of grievance cell of RBI and after lot of harassment they returned my fees amount saying the loan is not processed. Later again I applied to DHFL as I got a offer online basis on the property that I had selected but this time also it went in vein as they did not agree to offer loan in flexi-pay option.

I got an offer from DHFl for a home loan at an interest rate of nearly 10%. I applied for the same but there was delay from their end in responding so I did not want to continue with them hence I canceled my application and switched to icici. DHFL had to clear the queries of the customer if they are applying for the first time. Customer service must be improved.

I am not happy with the service provided by DHFL based on the home loan application.They have finalized the property and I have contacted them twice through the toll free number provided but there is no response.The interest rate applied was quite high which was around 10.5% for the home loan.They made me to apply insurance for 1Lakh for this home loan with which I am disappointed.

In the year of 2007 I had availed the home loan from DHFL and I was a co-applicant. When I availed the loan the rate was 12.2% but later it increased to 16% because that was floating range. I fore closed the loan where they charged me 2% of principal outstanding amount. Around 4 to 5k was collected for processing charge.

My opinion about DHFL Home loan is the process is very simple with them. They are ready to provide me the expected loan amount. Since my property is under construction, they disbursed me only 40% of the loan amount. Due to the interest rate I am looking for a balance transfer.

For me the interest rate 10.5% is more for the home loan and this was offered by DHFL. The rate should be less for the home loan. DHFL is not maintaining records properly as I asked them to contact after one month but they called me back in three days. I just postponed the plan for six months.

Previously I applied for a home loan but somehow unable to take due to some credit score. DHFL was good and there was no communication gap as the executive cleared everything exactly. Interest rate should be between 10 to 11%. On the whole great experience it was.

At the start DHFL was prompt but later they did not give any response. First my home loan was handled by Mumbai executive and that was great but later itÌ¢??s been transfered to Pune executive where response was not good thus I switched over to other bank. No issues in interest rate because 9.85% is par with the market. Regional executive was not prompt.

Received call from DHFL followed to my application of home loan but I mentioned that not required at present. In future if I have requirement surely would call them as they were good. Confirmation was done over phone and the officers explained features and benefits of the loan clearly. I think DHFL is very high in processing charge for the home loan. They mentioned like 11k of processing fee for the principal amount of 12 lakhs.

Before coming to DHFL I applied for a home loan in some other company where they processed in meanwhile so went with them for a loan. Interaction with DHFL was limited but it was fine. 10.8% of interest rate in DHFL is high for professionals as in market others are offering 9.8%. Processing is very fast in DHFL than other companies and documentation is minimal.

DHFL gave me all the quotations about the home loan but that havenÌ¢??t fulfilled my requirements. Response was fine when I approached for a home loan. I found it would be easy to take home loan via dealer and I took it from nationalized sector. Overall satisfied with DHFL as customer support was fine.

Over the phone my home loan got approved by dhfl. But I was getting calls continuously regarding the same subject. Once I got a call from an executive from dhfl who spoke to me about the insurance, I agreed for that as well. Even after that she kept calling me continuously. I got irritated and reacted after that within 30minutes I got a message saying that as per my request they canceled my application. I thought I can go for some other option. My sincere suggestion for them is to reduce the follow up calls.

DHFL has assigned one person to look after my home loan and that person kept updating entire things timely. Interest rate is 9.9% in floating range and that is par with the market. Processing charge is also similar to the market. Before going for home loan people need to compare the rate because DHFL is NBFC.

I just inquired about the product, the executive who spoke to me was informative. For further discussion about the home loan offer they said that they will send an executive to my home but no one from DHFL came so I had to go with some other options. If they commit anything, they have do that.

I did not get proper suggestions to finalize my property so DHFL was not able to provide me a home loan. The rate of interest was nearly 9.8%, it is less. Suggest them not to charge any processing fee since it is real loss for the customers.

Directly I got an approach from DHFL based on my home loan. Staff was guided me, especially Sales manager Mr. Balamurugan he helped me so well. 10.2% fixed rate of interest they offered and processing charges 1% its high. Best thing is they allowed part payment before 6 months

DHFL is providing a good service. I applied for a home loan but they rejected it saying that my property in a place which is not covered by them. But it was actually approved my the government and the authorities. It will be good if they can consider that and provide a loan.

Once I got a call from dhfl when I applied for a home loan. The executive said that he will call me back and inform about the documents part. Then I did not get any response. When a customer applies for a loan, they have to check with him about the documents he has and must inform what else they need.They have to fulfill their commitments.

The executive from the service team was very supportive, they collected my documents on time. Post that they came up for discussion, details were clearly explained to me and the loan amount that was approved was as per my expectation. I availed the loan for 27 years tenure period. The processing was done pretty quick, within 2-3 days.

It was a good experience with dhfl. I applied for a home loan and got a call after 2 or 3 days from them. They said that my profile is not applicable for a loan and explained me the reason. So I had to cancel the loan application.

DHFL coordinated well and guided me well when I applied for a home loan. They collected all my documents and did verification and proper reply had come whenever I called them.. I have never faced any issues. I appreciate Bank Baazar services and their user friendly website.

DHFL was slow in responding. They said that they will come and collect the documents when I applied for a home loan then I did not get any call from them. After 15 days they again called me to speak about this but I denied to take up this loan. The interest rate they were ready offer was only 9.5%. They have to improve their customer service and keep up their promises.

When I required an home loan I approached DHFL. They responded in a proper way. They did not ask for more documents. The service offered by the people was fine. When cooperative bank was offering 11%, dhfl gave me a loan at just 10.25%. They can even reduce it to 10% for a salaried individual.

It was very good experience with dhfl. They responded quickly and interacted well. They asked me few details and informed about the relevant documents. It was a few minutes interaction but due to some reason I had to put that on hold so I could not avail that loan.

I received a call from dhfl, I informed them that I have not chose a land so asked them not to proceed my home loan application. But they said that they can arrange for a pre sanctioning application. I did not accept later they called me and said that my application is rejected. The call center executives must be updated with the status of the application, always I see a difference in the information provided by them and the executives who approve me directly.

My experience with dhfl was average. They were not ready to provide the loan amount which was promised initially and it was based on some eligibility criteria they said. With the same details I have got a good offer for my home loan from PNB. Suggest DHFL to look into their own criteria before sanctioning the amount.

I got a call from an executive from DHFL when I applied foe a home loan. He informed me that he will send a representative to collect my documents. But after that there was no response from them. They canceled the application without informing the reason. As a customer I needed a proper response, if they were not able to process the application they should have informed so that I would have switched to alternate option.

Very good in rate of interest and customer support is fine in DHFL. I am happy with the entire process. Fee and other charges are fine and reasonable. I am very satisfied with the home loan procedures of the DHFL. My father arranged the funds and I postponed the plan of loan.

Service and response of the DHFL was good for my home loan application. I like the service of DHFL as the employees were very cooperative and they called me over phone and shared required details. The property that I have selected is not approved by DHFL as unable to move further.

DHFL executive called me and mentioned the needed documents for the home loan and he asked me to arrange everything. I arranged everything and still waiting but he did not come back. Now I have submitted all the papers to some other bank. In DHFL the rate of interest was 10%.

Still I am waiting for the disbursement of the home loan. DHFL collected all my papers but till now I never received any feedback from them. Entirely I am not at all satisfied. Rate of interest is also somewhat high than government sectors. Whatever it might be they have to atleast update the status to the customers.

I donÌ¢??t have requirement of home loan and postponed for five months. DHFL is very good in terms of service and they were accurate in providing information to the people. Contacted time was convenient and everything was fine with DHFL. During the time of process, never faced anything like inconvenient.

It was fine overall but the interest rate is high for home loan. Nothing special about DHFL as everyone is similar in rate. My requirement of the loan amount was 85% and DHFL was ready to approve only 80% as availed loan outside. There was no communication as in the first conversation itself I dropped the plan after listening the loan amount.

That time DHFL mentioned that the home loan is not doable as the eligibility for that is customer should earn more than 35k. DHFL need to be more flexible in their rules and regulations. My suggestion is that they have to process the loan even for low salaried customers.

The service provided by DHFL was not that good based on the Home loan.The interest rate applied was really high.They make sudden changes in interest rate.They apply high interest rate as floating rate for the loan.They decrease the interest rate for new customer.They tried to get some bribe in the middle of the loan process.

Customer service was good from DHFL and they give quick response for nay requirement of Home loan but the interest rate offered was .7%is high comparing with other banks which is affordable depend upon their service and the processing fee was also not costly. The service provided by DHFL based on the Home loan process was very good.Its a long process to take the loan.They have taken around 4months to process the application.They have taken this time in the verification process.The interest rate applied was around 10.5%.They do provide good eligibility amount to the customer based on the salary norms.

Dewan Housing Finance Corporation Limited provides me home loan with lowest interest rate 10.15. Now it comes to 9.90. Special thanks to their representatives who behaved just like a friend. They assist me so well that now I am feeling that I have purchased right property.Thanks to DHFL team.

I am having the housing loan with the DHFL. The rate of interest is around 10.65% and am happy with that. Processing charges are around 1% of the capital. Services are not so good with them because they are giving the false commitments to me.

I give my home loan application to DHFL because My housing project was approved by DHFL. After sanction of my loan application, I start reading their term & condition. Their term & condition are like black mailers. Once your loan application sanctioned, they will not refund your processing fee. DHFL Terms & conditions are so harsh that you can not accept also if you read. My suggestion any body must not go with DHFL.

I applied for Home Loan in DHFL online. I got a good offer from them. DHFL was very quick in processing my Home Loan application. My loan was processed in 6 working days. I got loan amount as per my expectation at 9.99% floating interest rate. Customer service is pretty good from DHFL. Processing fees was partially charged during documentation and partially post loan amount disbursal. I am quite happy with DHFL.

DHFL is providing awesome services and disbursement has happened within 74 hours. Interest rate is pretty good as comparing to private sectors. DHFL has provided me an online services to check the reports of the home loan. Moreover DHFL is following rules and regulations of RBI.

Plot loan is taken from Dhfl. With them everything was fine. Initially they promised me for high loan amount and later it was less around 1 lakh difference. So what ever they promise they have to deliver. Their service was good. Precessing fee and charges can be reduced.

The rate if interest is around 10.15% as the floating for the home loan with the DHFL. Services are very much professional and very excellent. Dhfl is pretty wonderful while processing my home loan. Their work was very fast. I got a good response from them. Interest rate was normal as the other banks. The charges was also bit low. I am not happy with the service provided by DHFL based on the home loan process.I have taken this loan without any option available regarding the loan process.The interest rate applied for the loan was quite average but they require too many set of documents and once I submitted they made me to resubmit the same.I will recommend others about DHFL for getting a loan.

I can say that I had no issues with DHFL. Compared to axis bank, the interest rate charged in DHFL for my home loan is really high. Customer service is good. Within a week they gave me the loan. I am okay with EMI date. It will be good if they can reduce the interest rate.

I tried applying home loan with Dhfl. I was told about the interest rate and the processing fee which is normal as the other banks. When I approached Dhfl for home loan, I have not even a single call from the customer service. I do not get any response I would like to suggest the bank, they should inform their customer about thee status of the application trough email or message it would be very helpful.

It was good with Dhfl when enquiring about my home loan with them. I found their service was good. Executives were very polite and courtesy. But because of the bank norms my application has been declined. I suggest the it should be mentioned on the website about their terms and conditions.

With Dhfl my experience was satisfactory.I just received a single call . Discussed about the interest rate and everything it was normal as the other banks. Dhfl did not approve my property hence the declined my home loan with them.
I approached Dhfl for my home loan with them. When ever I approach I see that their service is good. But actually because of some personal reason I just dropped the plan with Dhfl in taking loan.

My experience with DHFL is fantastic. They were regularly following with me on weekly basis for my Home Loan application. I am happy with the loan amount that was offered to me and the interest rate that DHFL offered. I would definitely recommend DHFL to other for their Home Loan requirements.

I applied for Home Loan online to DHFL. The sales team contacted me soon in response to my loan application . I received a call from Dhfl for my home loan. The initial call was quick and got a good response. And later I did not get proper response from the bank. So they did not call me back at the promised time. Due to this reason I just dropped the plan with Dhfl. I suggest Dhfl, they should call on the particular time not as per your convenient.

I applied for Home Loan to DHFL online. I found that the interest rate offered by them was high compared to other organizations in the market. No one came to visit me for the home loan process from DHFL. Only once i received the call and they told that the representative will come but nothing happens were as in the market many banks are ready to do the process soon.They told to provide Rs.10,000 cheque before the loan get processed which is not refundable also.It is not at all acceptable.

I applied for Home Loan in DHFL. As a response to my application the sales team called me up and explained all details. Th executive was polite and had good communication skills. The interest rate offered by DHFL is little high , it would be even better if they can offer loan at lower interest rate. I could not avail Home Loan from DHFL as I postponed my plan of property purchase.

DHFL is one of the good private finance company. I applied for Home Loan to DHFL online and I got good response from the sales team. ÌøåÈåÀI tried to apply for a home loan with Dhfl. They rendered a good service. Because of a good interest rate I went with dhfl. But unfortunately my property is outside the permissible area so the bank was unable to provide me a home loan. I suggest that they should have some branches near by the city so that it will be more helpful for other customers as well. Otherwise I am fine with Dhfl.

My Home Loan application was processed and the loan sanction letter was handed over to me within 2 weeks by DHFL. I had all the documents ready so the processing was fast. One of the managers was taking care of my loan application. Rate of interest offered to me is 9.9% and the loan amount offered is also as per my requirement.

It was okay with Dhfl while processing my home loan. It was not that good. Your guys followed up very well with me. They were demanding for more documents. I suggest that the executives should be more knowledgeable in terms of documents and must inform their customer on prior itself. Interest rate was around 9.85% I am fine with this. It took 2 month to finalize my loan. I took an insurance along with the loan.. Apart from this insurance they forced me to take another life insurance... This is annoying. They were asking for more document that was not needed. Hence I would like to say that Dhfl should focus on their customer service, it is an important aspect. Interest rate was normal as the other banks. Definitely I will switch over to other bank because of the poor service.

It was not a good experience with Dhfl. They executive are not so customer friendly. Some of the executive are not that knowledgeable and professional. I would like to suggest that the executive should be more knowledgeable , professional. Executive should be trained properly. Processing fee is bit high. Over all Dhfl has to be improved in all the aspects.

DHFL housing loan is fine, it would be great, if they reduce the processing fee. Interest rate offered by them was one and the same. Response provided by them was good. My experience with the DHFL for the housing loan was good. It took around 12 to 15 days for my loan amount to get disbursed. The paper work was tough as they had asked for too many documents. The interest rates charged was also too high.

I have taken my home loan from DHFL. The process was very good. The customer services and response was very good from them. The whole process was completed in 15 days. I also has to pay a fee of 50K for the home insurance which is valid for 20 years that is the tenure of the loan.

When i applied the home loan from online i was not able to get the 100% loan amount so the builder of my property suggested to go with DHFL through his tie up and he completed the process by approving with 100% loan amount with 30 years tenure but took Rs.2000 as the brokerage charge which is unacceptable. While taking the home loan the interest rate offered was 10.15%, now it has been reduced as per rbi but DHFL has not made the changes. They also charge 7000for the processing fee.The only thing is that DHFL provides loan for the lower salary person where as other banks need 15,000 as the minimum salary.

What ever Dhfl promised me I was given a better interest rate and processing fee. My only concern is the insurance part.. I would like to suggest the bank to improve their customer satisfaction, must improve the response.

What ever the process is it went on good with Dhfl in terms of home loan. Their service was good. Interest rate was around 10.1% which is satisfied. processing fee was the best and reasonable. Documentation was good, they considered each and everything while processing home loan. My loan got disbursed in few days once after the submission of the papers.

I took a housing loan from DHFL. The offer which they gave was not satisfactory hence I contacted the higher officials and negotiated by sending mails. That was not a good experience. They even gave extra Rs 1.65l and later informed that it is an insurance. I was disappointed.

I have taken a housing loan from DHFL. The customer service was good. One of my friend was working there and he suggested to take a loan. The process to get a loan is and within 7 days I got a loan. The documentation part was easy, they asked only limited documents. The offer was good, but the processing fee was a bit high.

Had a very nice experience with Dhfl Ltd in terms of my Home loan. I am comfortable Dhfl. Interest rate and charges what they offered me was normal . Within 15 days my personal loan got disbursed. I am very much happy with the service as well....

They were very accommodating I am happy with their service of Dhfl in terms of my home loan. Interest rates and charges are normal as the other banks. I short I would say that they win over the deal. Within a weeks time my home loan got disbursed. Paper work was also good.

The process was fast with Dhfl. The only thing is the interest rate ia too much but I had no options I had go with them. I suggest Dhfl to reduce their interest rates, it should as similar as other banks. apart from that the service is good with Dhfl. Approximately I got my loan disbursed within a week time.

It was good experience with Dhfl but not up to the mark. Still I dint not get any hard copies of loan application. Its a nice process with Dhfl. They have not hardly taken any time. They took around 15 days to complete the process. The documentation part was faster. Charges are lower comparatively.

I applied for a Home loan with DHFL in the month of January and they are processing my loan application till date.They are really slow in the process.The customer service attempt to response me but they say some excuse and getting the process delayed.After 7months they have said I do have some correction required in the documents which was submitted now I should process from my side.The interest rate was not discussed yet but the processing fee collected was quite less which was around 2000rs.

I tried to transfer the loan which I had previously with HDFC LTD to DHFL but I dropped the plan because the interest rate offered was same like others.The customer service provided was really good and they are informative about the loan process in a very clear manner.

I applied for a Home loan with DHFL from the agent and he was helpful for me in the process.There is no service provided by the customer service.There is no response from them as well.The interest rate offered by government bank are less but I donÌ¢??t want that to compare with a private company rates.They have approved this loan but I didnÌ¢??t get any sanction letter from them regarding the same.

I require for a home loan in the amount of 2-3Lakh but they offer the minimum amount of 5Lakh in DHFL so I dropped the plan of getting this loan.The customer service provided was good.I didnÌ¢??t inquire about the interest rate since I was not requiring for that huge amount. I require for a home loan in the amount of 2-3Lakh but they offer the minimum amount of 5Lakh in DHFL so I dropped the plan of getting this loan.The customer service provided was good.I didnÌ¢??t inquire about the interest rate since I was not requiring for that huge amount. I will recommend DHFL to others for getting loan.

I take home loan about an year ago.Before taking loan they said the processing charges are 5000 but at the time of loan they charged about the 24000 so be aware of hidden charges. They deduct pre emi of two month in one month saying we forgot to put the cheques on time.So be aware if your payment not happen last month you get big shock on this month. My Home loan application with DHFL was rejected stating property is in rural area.The customer service provided was not that responsive because they are not proactive in response.I called them around 5-6times later they responded.Interest rate offered for this loan was really good which was around 10.15% and the processing fee was around 1%.I would suggest it will be good if they offer loan for rural area as well.

The loan application with DHFL was rejected stating I am not eligible for getting this loan.The response provided by them was in the average scale.The interest rate offered was around 10.15% whereas in other banks they offer lesser interest rate around 9.75%.I am not sure about their charges since my application was rejected in the starting stage itself.

I have closed this Home loan application with DHFL since I get very good offer provided by HDFC LTD.The customer service provided by DHFL was not that good.Their taking long time to complete the documentation process.The interest rate they apply was also very high with high charges billed.

I am unable to get this Home loan with DHFL due to some personal reasons but they have provided detail information about the loan process.The response provided was really good.The interest rate offered was also good and I will recommend DHFL to others for getting a loan.

After applying for this Home loan with DHFL I was not in chennai so I am unable to communicate with them regarding the loan process.They were in continuous follow up with me and they said the processing fee will be around 5000Rs.I am not sure about the interest rate they apply for this loan as well.

I was in the plan of transferring my previous Home loan which I had with HFDC Ltd to DHFL but I dropped the plan because there interest rates are same.I felt its no use to transfer the loan for little difference in interest rate.The service provided was good and the charges were also average.

I have a housing loan from DHFL. The response was good. I got my loan from DHFL within 7 to 8 days. The loan amount was nearly Rs 12.5 Lakhs and the interest rate is 10.15%, the processing fee 0.5% of the loan amount, its quite reasonable. Pre-closure can be done after 6 months.

I dropped the plan of getting this Home loan with DHFL because the property was not yet finalized.The interest rate offered was a average rate which is around 9%.The customer service provided was good and the documents which are required for the loan process was simple as well

From DHFL i took a home loan which was disbursed in 3 months. Interest rate offered was 12.5% which was high and the processing fee charged was also high. The services are over all good with DHFL. The customer service was good and the response was nice. They are completly dedicated to home loans services. The Rate of interest was normal as per the market. I did not take my home loan with them is because I am still not finalised on the property.

DHFL was unable to provide a housing loan , as the property which I have chosen is less than 700 square feet. I have taken a housing loan from Axis Bank. The rate of interest provided by DHFL was quite reasonable and the customer service offered by them is the best.

First and foremost reason, why I was unable to a housing loan with DHFL is because, Property which have chosen is out of coverage area. Adding up to that, rate of interest offered by them was 10.15% which is very high that was also another reason why I have not taken a loan from them.

I have postponed my plan of taking housing loan with DHFL . I have planned to reapply after 1 or 2 months. Rate of interest offered by them is really high. DHFL housing loan is good. Actually the service offered by them is really good. I have not finalized the property yet. I have applied for a housing loan with DHFL. Its almost done I will be availing the loan by next month most probably, . The rate of interest offered by them was 10.25%. The best part is they took hardly 15days time to process the request and it was not complicated at all. Big thanks to them.

I wish that I should take a loan with DHFL. I am not satisfied with them, intially they called me for verification they took all my details they said they will get back to me after checking all the details. However I did not revert back to me. I have approached DHFL housing loan is good. Owing to certain personal commitments . I am not in a situation to take the loan. However, I have planned to reapply shortly. Documentation process was very simple and customer service offered by them was the best.

DHFL Housing loan is good. I have dropped the idea of taking this loan. Customer service offered by them was really good. The area which I have chosen is not eligible for the housing loan. Rate of interest and processing fee offered by them is ok. Good to do business with them.

I have planned to take a housing loan with DHFL during the first half of the following year. The reason why because, I have post ponded the plan of taking this loan. They require very less documents to process the loan and I would say its a hassle free process.

I have applied for a housing loan at DHFL. To start off first time when they called me I was not out in station I have asked them to callback later. DHFL housing loan is very good that is why I have opted for it . The amount what they have provided is very less. I guess its not negotiable. I got my home loan from dhfl with 10.15% as standard interest rate what other banks are providing. However they kept on asking the documents repeatedly which they may avoid . Apart from which service was quite good

DHFL Housing loan is the best loan provider. I had certain issues initially the same was sorted out easily with the help of DHFL. They will clearly guide us how to rectify and they will provide us certain guide lines as well. They provide legal advise and when we submit the property details they will do a in depth verification about the property and confirm whether its worth taking it. They will invest a lot of time on that. Further, they will come for property valuation also. Finally , I got the housing loan successfully and all credit goes to DHFL good work!

Its good in taking home loan from DHFL. Everything was at door step and I feel great about them. The executive Praveen and Manager Rakesh was coordinating with me throughout the entire processing. Interest rate is 10.15% as there was an offer

DHFL charged 10.25% as the interest rate with 7000 as processing fees for home loan. There was a good response provided by customer service team. Documentation process could be simpler and clear and it must be done within one shot. It would have been better if the processing time could be faster.

I had apply the home loan. Before applying the Bank people given assurance and took the money.later login of the application they asking unnecessary documents which is not related to loan. And kept the condition to submit or etherwise we reject. So I m my vewis and experience Applying bank.loan is waste of time and money.

Rate of interest was not negotiated from the initial point of home loan processing with DHFL. For 23 lakhs loan amount, it was 21000 as processing fees which is at higher end. Even provided insurance policy for this loan which is offered as mandate which could be avoided. Added to it, premium amount is 93000 for 20 years. I tried for getting waived off the insurance charges, however I was not able to. Overall insurance is not beneficial and the greatest thing that DHFL offered me the home loan at right time.

DHFL services is been good and I didn't face any hiccups. Sanction of the home loan happened quickly and as the builder had a tie up with DHFL, it speeded up the process. Compared with others, the interest rate is quite higher and also no penalty charges for pre closure after 6 months of availing home loan. Even the number of times the pre closure could happen and transparent overall.

The home loan with DHFL is quite ok. As there was some issues with the documentation it took around 3 months to avail the loan. But I feel that the rate of interest and processing fees is little high which should be reduced.

The home loan with DHFL is very good which I took it recently. The processing was a little slow which took around a month to process the loan. I would say that the processing fees is pretty high which can be reduced. Other than that the overall services was good. The interest rate is also only 10.15% which quite ok.

My personal experience form DHFL was good. The local branch executive Mr.Santosh was too helpful and within a short time, entire processing was done and even the disbursement too. The charges are quite the same like others. More over, there was a scheme for rural areas where for the minorities and for women borrowers, the rate of interest is 9.6% fixed for 7 years and later on its floating. Its the best offer at the current market trend. One thing the processing charges can be bit lower as it is 1% of the loan amount.

Earlier I had one home loan from DHFL where I faced lot of hassles from them . They are showing some hidden charges like insurance with no proper clarification .Processing time was very slow. Actually they have ben charged more than what they have promised. Hence I closed my loan earlier

Initially, for home loan inquiry, I had applied with DHFL where ultimate processing was all done. However, documentation process was too long and even the interest rate is not a reasonable one. They choose the interest rate as per the client's income where it was 10.50% charged. I would suggest if Standard interest rate provided, it would be fine.

I am thinking to transfer my home loan from DHFL to some other bank. Each and every service was very prompt apart from interest rate. Initially they offered me 12.75% as interest rate. Documentation process was very good. I am not satisfied only on their interest rate. Even they are showing some hidden charges of Rs.50 every month. If I inquire them in customer care they confirmed that it was the maintenance charges . However it was not properly transparent. It would be nice if they improve on their charges part

While application for loan rate of interest was 10.15% three years back. while disbursing the same int rate 11% now they are charging 12.35%. This is some kind of profits they are making from us. Now for new loan they are offering 10.15% and charging me 12.35% . Why ?

It was very nice experience when I availed home loan from DHFL. Pretty good. They are having only simple documentation.Their customer service was very cooperative. Within 20 days I have got my home loan from them. Overall they are very good

Worst service customer servicei have got a call from mumbai branch, they are not providing my sufficient information on of sudden cutting the call and went..please dont take home loan over there ..sure will get in to trouble . go for other bank

I would rate DHFL home loan as 4, as they are charging more interest rate I have planned to move Banks . Rate of interest offered by them is quite nominal. DHFL services was extremely good in availing home loan. The processing and getting approval was quite faster. 10.25% is the interest rate with partial payment option provided. Even no pre closure charges which is great option provided.

Other banks will not provide home loan for land purchasing but DHFL is giving loan to purchase loan. Till date I never faced any issues with DHFL and the rate of interest 10.5% is competitive. As on me the rate of interest is marginally high in DHFL but not much high. I am satisfied with DHFL in overall.

Its a speedy processing done by DHFL in terms of availing home loan. Within 15 days of time, loan got disbursed and its appreciable. The loan amount provided is up to my expectations however the rate of interest offered was 10.50% which is quite higher. Overall quite ok experience with DHFL.

The rate of interest offered by DHFL is too lower than others. 10.25% is the interest rate offered with 3000 as processing fees fixed. Within 10 days, home loan processing, verification process got completed.I liked the faster processing done by DHFL.

The processing time was very quick when applied for the housing loan from DHFL. The customer service executive Mr Shyamlal who took initiative from day one in updating the status of the loan application till the loan amount got disbursed. I got the loan amount disbursed with in 15 days.

Actually through the builder of my property I had availed a home loan from DHFL Last month. It was quite easier for me to avail the loan comparatively to other banks. I feel the interest rate & processing fee are quite higher than the nationalized banks and there are some hidden charges as well. DHFL is recommendable only for an easy & instant loan approval.

The processing and the documentation was very simple and transparent when i applied for the housing loan from DHFL. Customer service and response was quite good . When I started searching for home loan DHFL provided the best offer compared with other banks. Whereas the other bank was slightly more than dhfl . They asked only the relevant documents. Overall good. Need to explore more

My experience of availing a home loan from DHFL in the year 2009 was good. I was very much interested to take the loan for a short term period. Initially, I took the home loan from the bank of DHFL-First Bloom home finance and later on merged with DHFL. I have recently availed a home loan from DHFL and my experience was good. I personally contacted the agent of DHFL and submitted my documents for a home loan. Long back I took one home loan from DHFL . Service was quite good. Whenever if I am having any queries the response was very good. Quite good interest rates . DHFL home loan it was nice service, after submitting all the documents i got loan approved in weeks time. Interest rate was less when compared to other banks. They charged rs20800/- including processing fee. Overall it was smooth process.

It was nice service done by DHFL in terms of home loan. I got loan approval in 4 days. Interest rate is comparatively high when compare to other banks and charges is nominal. They offered loan amount as per their committed time. Best part is formalities and paper work is less to get loan approved.

Earlier I applied one home loan from DHFL whereas the rate of interest was pretty high at that time. I choosed AADHAR HOUSING FINANCE subsidiary of DHFL. The way the customer service approach was quite good. Quite satisfactory. Pretty high interest rates. I took one home loan before 3 years in DHFL whereas they are quite good in customer service. Prompt response . The interest rate was bit high compare to other banks. They offered me 11.5% in which I am looking for a change now. They should really concentrate on their interest rates

DHFL Home loan since my brother is working with DHFL i got home loan easily, interest rate was 10.50% it was normal in all places, they said after 6 months i can transfer the loan to any bank, process was very fast, the agent did everything in terms of collecting documents, arranging call backs. DHFL cannot be compared with ICICI bank services as it is slower. The processing time is too long with DHFL. They are giving me 11.25% interest rate with less processing fees. I liked the fact of deviation in terms of home loan which was taken in DHFL.

I felt DHFL processing in terms of home loan is customer friendly. The processing time was around 10 days and that too it was delayed by me. The interest rate is 10.50% which is lower. There is a very good response from legal, technical, credit departments executive instantly whenever I call them.

I have taken a home loan from DHFL last month. DHFL was initially ready to offer me the expected loan amount however the loan amount was very less at the time of disbursement. DHFL Home Loan the rate of interest was 13% i don't know it was good or bad, charges and processing was normal after giving all documents and after verification they processed very smoothly, the staff came and did all the formalities it took almost 1 month to get credit, till now it was good they deal with only housing loan so it was good.

DHFL Home Loan their was not much special, i wish to transfer, interest rate was 10.25% it high, after completing 6 months i like to transfer, process was good, i got loan amount quickly with minimum documentation i got on required time, overall i am satisfied, i fight and got this interest rate with regional manger and other people .25% they reduce.

I had taken the home loan from DHFL last month. Its good, they have one of the person was taking care of everything. It went very fast and quick processing. DHFL Home loan its good overall all the documents and hassle free very convenient no far so good am very happy with them loan disbursement its very convenient not much documents quick sanction and quick disbursement none of friends are interested with DHFL.

My home loan application is currently in the final stage of processing with DHFL and I hopefully expect the loan very soon. Overall experience was good and I have no issues. Basic documentation and the processing time was around a month. Rate of interest & processing fee are good.

I applied for the housing loan from DHFL the processing and the documentation was very quick and the customer service executive name Anil Sable who was helping me out in completing the process from day one till my loan amount got approved and little disappointing was that the rate of interest is little high when compared with other financial institution.

DHFL Home Loan is good, the interest rate is high , their overall service is good, they have given me a interest rate of10.75% they have given me information about fixed and floating interest rate. the best part is I am allowed to make a per-payment .

DHFL Home Loan is good, they are offering a prompt service their response is good, their documentation procedure is simple though their interest are slightly higher than other bank they are very quick in processing their request to conclude their service is excellent.
