Rate of interest is 11.15% and 14.5% for top up loan. If the interest rate for top up loan can be reduced, it would be helpful and I would like to continue the services.

When I was looking for home loan, my friend guided me to go Federal bank and the procedures are quiet good for home loan as they being new in market and no much verification process. According to my experience they have to be well organized and they have to inform the customers if there any changes in RBI guidelines in prior. Also they have to give proper solution for customer queries. Since 2009 I availed home loan and I closed it.

I have taken a home loan from Federal bank 3 years ago. I think through bank agent I was able to avail the loan. They have sanctioned my loan in 3 to 4 days after collecting all the documents. On that time it was around 10.25% of interest and there was no processing fee at all.

I applied for the Housing loan with Federal bank the processing and the documentation was fine and the customer service executive Mr Murali Krishna who took the initiative in completing the whole process and the EMI was affordable and the whole process got completed in four days.

Federal Bank HL best thing is processing fee and approval is done in quick time overall customer service is better only thing i feel is interest rate need to reduced apart from that no suggestion everything is fine i am fully satisfied with there service and response.

I have applied and got home loan on Feb-2014. Property got registered on June-2015.I am yet to get the certificate for list of original doc they are holding. I am continuously following up for more than 6 months no result.And most sad thing is, they are yet to take out the Sale deed from Registration office its more than 1 year!! I can check it from govt website. Just few days ego I got the doc for insurance, after I don't have any idea what is the status of loan, no monthly statement. No IT advantage! People are very lazy.....

My home loan was taken from GIC housing finance Ltd. The rate of interest was 10.25% which I felt was pretty much on the higher side. They charged me a processing fees of Rs.25K. The loan amount I applied and availed was Rs.10Lakhs. The overall home loan process took about a month and I did face quite a bit of difficulties while the processing.

The service provided was fabulous with GIC housing finance.The processing time is very less.They communicate with the customer in a fast manner.They are very transparent and no unnecessary charges are applied in the account.In case of urgency customer can process the loan through GIC housing finance.

I thought to make balance transfer from GIC Housing finance because their rate of interest is high. As here at the GIC housing finance the rate is 10.95% but in market 9.5%. They do not have web portal for existing customers so it is tough to follow the loan tracks. For any communication I have to call their branch or need to write a mail.

I have taken the housing loan with the GIC housing finance limited. The response is good with them and the customer service is okay for me like they dont have the generic customer care number. The loan amount got disbursed within thirty days of time.

GIC housing finance has been good in their services. I have taken my home loan from them. The response was very good. The rate of interest was normal too. The processing charges was reasonable. Overall a good experience.

GIC housing finance has the minimum process for the home loan. The interest rate is little high comparing with the nationalized and cooperative banks. The paper work are as per rules. My disbursement was done maximum in 15 days after the legal process.

Initially I have applied for the home with HDFC limited but it got rejected. Later applied with GIC HOUSING FINANCE LTD and with in 25 days they have completed the processing and disbursed the loan amount to me. My relative has suggested to avail this loan from them. But I want to transfer this loan to some other bank only because of the higher rate of interest.

I got the home loan with the GIC housing finance limited and the loan amount got disbursed within thirty days of time. The services are not that much good and the rate of interest was around 10.25%. They are having the huge documentation , also they are not visiting the site after some extent.

I got closed the housing loan with the GIC housing finance limited for the rate of interest as 8%. The services are good with them . There are no drawbacks as such with them. I got the NOC documents from them after 21 days of time from when I closed the loan.

I got the housing loan with the GIC housing finance limited for the rate of interest as 14% which is fixed. Services are nominal with them because they have not started with the ECS date till now after the loan amount got disbursed them . I already informed to them but they have not responded me till now. Processing charges are nominal with them and am fine with them. The loan amount got disbursed within 3 months of time.

GIC housing finance disbursed the home loan with 20 day. The interest rate was high initially they give 10.5% and after 6 month they charged 12.5%. They included the policy without any information along with the loan.. I provided required document on time so there was no issue.

They have approved the loan within 15days and the interest offered was also good.The documentation process was simple like others with GC housing finance based on the home loan.The best part of them is their service.They have came to my place and processed the loan very soon.

My home loan got disbursed with Gic Housing Finance. My experience was really good with them I havenÌ¢??t faced any issues with them. Interest rate was floating one I am happy with that. Charges are very nominal. Service was not that good enough, it can be improved still.

GIC housing finance limited is very good. Interest rate offered by them was 12.5%. I am holding this housing loan for a period of 3.5 years. GIC norms were quite flexible and they were ready to provide housing loans easily. On the contrary other bank norms were not flexible.

My builder has recommended me to avail my home loan from GIC HOUSING FINANCE LIMITED. They have taken just eight days to complete my processing. I complete paying four months of EMI now. I got some discounts in my processing fees. All my EMIs paid through cheque only.

It was very difficult to get a home loan from the private banks. So, i took the loan from GIC housing finance ltd. Interest rate charged was nominal. I pay the monthly EMI of Rs.18,000.They took 1month for the disbursement. They required many documents for the process . An interview was also held and many question were asked regards to my work.

I have taken a Home Loan from GIC. The offer was good and the interest rate was nominal. Their customer service is not bad and they respond well. I am very much satisfied with their service. I can say that GIC is the best compared to any other private banks in serving their customers.

All People be careful before u apply for a Home Loan in GIC its a money making company where the agents demand 3% commssion on the loan amount which is taken by the agent,and forwaded to senior officers in GIC, as GIC never entertains people directly,everything is done thru an agent ,i will say to all the people do not go for Any type of loan at GIC .

The processing was fast from HDFC LTD in case of home loan application being submitted.They have given convenient offers to the customers on loan.The entire process was hassle free.I am happy with the response provided to the customer on the application being submitted.

The fact is HDFC LTD took more than 3 months of time to process the housing loan though I was promised that the loan would get processed within 15 days. I guess there was no proper co ordination. Intially I was proposed an interest rate of 9.5% finally towards the end at the time of disbursing the loan they have charged around 11%.

I enjoyed doing business with HDFC LTD, infact this is my very first dealing with them. The cusotmer service executive was very cordial. Everything was sorted out within the time scale. Even my ECS instructions was successful and it is falling on 20th of every month,

The executive of HDFC Ltd was cooperative for my home loan. I got the loan within two months. But the after loan services is not satisfactory. When ever RBI reduces the rate of interest, they do not apply it immediately. They take two months or so to reduce the rate.

Little disappointing with HDFC LTD as they took around 4 months of time to sanction the home loan. They were coming up with different issues everytime when I contact them. Even at the end when my loan was sanctioned they were asking for some clarifications, this should have been done at the first instance. Another element which bothered me was the processing fee which was actualy rs 7500 but towards the end they have charged another rs 2500 on top of that.

Couple of pitfalls with HDFC LTD with respect to documents. To the best of my knowledge I had produced all the relevant documents but HDFC LTD was in short of some documents therefore I had to produce some additional documents to complete it. HDFC Ltd took around 3 to 4 weeks of time to complete the process.

When there is a fall in rate, HDFC Ltd does not apply the new rate automatically. A written request has to given only then they would apply the new rate to the loan. To top it off, they would also charge a processing fee to apply the rate which is another downfall. One thing which needs to be appreciated is, HDFC LTD has offered me the loan at the time of requirement,

The process for my home loan took only 15 working days. I have taken it from HDFC LTD. I have taken the rate of interest on floating. The current rate in the market is of 9.5% and they are providing me 10.5%. When I inquired about the same they told me that they have offered me some discount initially and if I want the current rate I would have to pay them 2K for it. Since it was their own wish of giving a discount without me asking for it I felt it was not needed to pay the 2K.

The process was not that smooth with HDFC LTD home loan. The executive who was appointed for this particular application was not based in Karnataka.He was unable to explain the process benefits clearly. Apart from this, the entire process was quick and short.

I am really excited with HDFC LTD with the way they work. The executives of HDFC LTD were able to guide me appropriately, they provide very good service over the phone and through online. If I am in need of an email statement I would just mail them and they will provide the statement in 2 days and the service offered by them is really good.

My experience with HDFC LTD was not that great , It was just an average experience with HDFC Ltd. I have taken my home loan from them. The branch which I was in communication with has a lack of knowledge of the documents needed. The rate of interest was of 9.14%. The processing charges was very high. The services and response was also not on time as I had to keep calling them to get a status updated. They were also not very professional in answering back.

HDFCLTD cooperated very well with the customers.They are giving 9.4% for the home loan as the interest rate.The legal process took a long time for the completion.I can say the service offered can be recommended one to future customers as well.

HDFC LTD can try and provide more competitive rates to the customer, as the rates are much higher than other banks. It was a kind of customized rate where I was offered about 9.25% initially, later at the time of signing the documents they mentioned that the rate was revised and they offered around 9.65%. On the same lines, the other banks were able to offer 9.50% as the interest rate for the same personal loan.

I was getting a fair deal with SBI for zero processing fee with a good interest rate which I return made to take the housing loan from them. As far as HDFC LTD is concerned, I was getting a Corporate discounts as I hold a Corporate account with them. They were also offering some goddies on top of that which was 50% off on the processing fee and the legal charges was quite similar to others.

What happened in my case was, the agent who was assigned to me, as changed his job I was completely unaware of this. I was waiting to hear from them, after which I had got only a mail from them . Finally I had to escalate this to the next level to get the information which could have been avoided. On the other side, the rate of interest offered by them is in par with other Banks.

Between my two credit cards, I would like to mention HDFC bank credit card is the best one because of my long journey with them. Credit enhancement process works really good with them , now I do have the limit of 2.5 lakh Rupees from 50000 Rupees. Benefits are good with them and I used to get some points with them, which can be redeemed.

Rate of interest is a lesser one and I do have good relationship with HDFC, so these are the things which made me to go ahead with HDFC limited for housing loan. Response is good with the HDFC limited and every process used to completed on time. Initially there was little hiccups but it was resolved finally.

I have been associated with HDFC before also , then eventually I got the chance to dealt with HDFC limited for housing loan again. While it comes to matter of charges, I hope I got the flat one, which was around 9.45%,also I can say its the best one. Within four to five days of time loan amount got disbursed. I would like to congratulate HDFC limited for the way, how they dealt with customers.

Interest rate with the HDFC limited for the housing loan was around 9.45% and the customer service is good with them. The loan amount got disbursed on the specified time itself. Customer service and responsiveness are really works fine with them.

My experience with HDFC limited was fine for the housing loan and the executive was really good and there were no issues with them till now. Interest rate was good like it was lesser one on that time. The first disbursement got happens around a month of time. I got the benefits as what I expected, so there are not much highlighted things.

This is not the first time I am dealing with HDFC LTD , infact this is my second best experience with HDFC LTD. Earlier when I took the housing loan from them I was very much comfortable as they were very much proactive this in turn made me to approach them again. Simultaneously, I had also approached SBI for the same I was told that it might a longer time to process therefore I decided to stay with HDFC LTD.

Completely happy with the service offered by HDFC LTD. My home loan was from HDFC Ltd. They completed the loan process within three weeks. The rate of interest was a good offer. I got a rate of 9.55%. The processing charges seemed to be pretty nominal too. I would suggest that there should not be any communication gap internally as I get calls from two executives about the same process.

My home loan is from HDFC Ltd. The services are good from them. The collection of my documents was done on time. The process was also done as per my requirement. Till the sanction of the loan it was a smooth process. The after loan services needs improvement as they need to be responsive even at that moment.

I am happy with the services of HDFC Ltd. It was a easy process for the home loan. The response was good. Everything was completed on time. The rate of interest was normal for me. I was comfortable with it. The processing charges was also reasonable.

I would say that it was a simple process and no hassles with HDFC Ltd. I have taken my home loan from them. The rate of interest was of normal but it was a high when compared to other banks. They charged me around 9.55%. The processing charges was also the average. Am happy that they completed the process at the right time.

Processing fee charged by HDFC LTD was slightly on the higher side as they have charged around 11k. On the same lines, when it comes to other banks they are charging around 5k as ICICI charged the same. I dont wish to switch over because the process was almost completed. I have no clue about the process as the property valuation, inspection and review was completed earlier.

Happy to leave a note about My home loan which I had taken HDFC Ltd. The service offered by them was good. As they had informed me all the details that I needed in the very first meeting that I had with them. After submitting my documents they verified it and processed it very quickly. I got the loan within 20 days. The rate of interest was also reasonable and I have taken it on my spouse name. For a Women they have charged a lesser rate and I got it for 9.4%. The processing charges also seemed to be lesser when compared with others.

I had an on-going housing loan with HDFC Ltd. The best I like about this institution is the processing time was more quicker. The other best thing was their transparency in their charges at the initial stage. The rate was good because of RBI policies at that moment. The rate was of 9.5% The processing charges was normal.

Whole experience is quite good with the HDFC limited for the housing loan, also they have provided me with the good response. Loan amount got credited after forty five days of time because of my the previous bankers concern. Charges and everything is a kind of okay for me.

The initial part of the process was slow from HDFC Ltd for my home loan. Follow up calls had to be done to get them on track. Once the process started, it was good. As they offered a good rate of interest of 9.4%. They also have good schemes and privileges for women. They understand the needs of the customer where these benefits are concerned.

HDFC limited have provided me the good experience like they have done the process in quick time. The loan amount got disbursed to my account within two to three weeks of time. Interest rate is as per my expectation for the housing loan, so there are no negotiation. There are no suggestion to HDFC limited.

HDFC limited is so flexible as they always try to match with the customers need, for example in my case they have provided me funds for getting the home in different location from where I am working, also the documentation process is really fine, even I can say that they are not rigid. It was quite quick process for sanctioning the loan.

Topup facility is available with the HDFC limited and the interest rate is also very good, so only I have go ahead with HDFC limited. Customer service is a kind of okay because they made me to roam here and there. Every issues to be resolved from customer end, also I would like to suggest that bankers should do everything on behalf of customer end.

Overall it was a good experience with HDFC Ltd for my home loan. It was also very quick. After the submission of my documents, I got the loan within seven days. The only drawback is they have not informed me clearly about the charges in detail. There were a lot of hidden charges than was taken at the end which was surprising for me. They have also not informed me about insurance too. Since this is first home loan, am new to the terms and conditions. These charges taken was also not mentioned there.

HDFC Ltd has not been consistent in their details for my home loan. They have taken very long to process the loan. It was more than 45 days. Even after 45 days they were like the legal reports not received. They they told me that the whole amount has been approved. When i went to their office the manager was not willing to meet me as well. Later I was told that the valuation was not completed and the amount is not sanctioned fully. They were not standard in their information, which led to a lot of inconveniences for me. I would not recommend them as I do want any one else to go through this process.

I would state that HDFC LTD is equivalent to other banks. Everything was fine with HDFC LTD. For the loan disbursement they took around 8 days of time. There was no issues . Interest rate and processing fees were really good. I have already finalized the property after which HDFC LTD contacted me . Further, I have recommend 2 of my friends for the same.

I dislike the rates offered by HDFC LTD and also I did not get to hear good about them as my vision was not good about HDFC LTD. I decided to drop the plan. Along side, they are not attaching any importance to their old customers rather they are providing attractive schemes for new customers which is unfair. But, when it comes to response and followup they are very good as they want to acquire some new business.

Parallel y, I had approached HDFC LTD for my housing loan. When I approached them I was asked to submit the required documents. After submitting the documents the person from HDFC LTD came and confirmed that they were unable to provide the amount that I was looking out therefore I dropped the idea of proceeding with them. As, I had not got the required amount I did not converse much about their interest rate and processing fee.

To begin with, I was looking out for a bank which offers the least rate of interest. Fortunately, I was able to get that with HDFC LTD. Another interesting part was that there was absolute perfection and there were no complaints rather. The only downside would be, the documentation part, as there were asking too many documents for security purpose and this home loan was basically a balance transfer done from LIC to HDFC LTD.

My home loan was with HDFC Ltd. Intially there were a few faults with my documentation, nevertheless they helped me to get it sorted out, later they started with the process. Plus, there were also delays pertaining to their internal system. Being a mortgage loan. The rate of interest charged was 10.78%. The processing charges was normal as it is charged all over.

My home loan is from HDFC Ltd. The home loan process was carried out on time. But post - loan services has been kind of average. They are yet to take the EMI from me though it has been two months now. They have not contacted me after the loan got disbursed. The rate of interest was of 9.45%. The processing charges was normal.

My home loan is from HDFC Ltd. Though it was not a good experience, it was not bad as well. I would suggest that the documents when asked, could be to the point and they need to be thorough with it. They also need to be more aggressive even after the loan is disbursed. The rate of interest was a good deal, that was the main reason I took my loan from them. It was of 9.45%. The processing charges was average.

The home loan process was very easy and simple with HDFC Ltd. The services was offered to me on time when I needed it. The response was also good from them. I expect the same level of service and response to continue in the near future as well. The rate of interest was of 9.45%. It was a bit higher when compared with other banks. The processing charges were nominal too.

This review is regarding my home loan with HDFC LTD. As, I have taken my home loan from them. I am yet to get a clarification about the charges and the EMI options from them the details mentioned there is not very clear. The rate of interest charged was of 9.45% (floating). The processing charges were nominal.

The level of service offered by HDFC LTD in case of home loan was really good. I had an issue in the documentation initially.They took long time for completing the process.There was no agent who assisted me completely. There was an attractive interest rate given to the customer which is most important feature of the loan.

HDFC Ltd managed to release 60 lakhs as the home loan amount to me and the entire process was so smooth. My documentation process was completed on time. The process was also completed at the required time. They also offered a good offer on the rate of interest. The processing charges were also nominal too.

The home loan process was absolutely good from HDFC LTD. The process was completed within 3days time.The overall process was simple. I think they have got well trained man-power to assist the customer in every possible way they can assist the customer with respect to home loan. Well done team!

The lending rate offered by HDFC LTD for the housing loan is very reasonable. I was offered a rate of 9.4%. The process was completed in a month's time. There are institutions who do not charge a processing fee. But I had to pay a fee for this loan.

As an extension of service, HDFC LTD makes courtesy call to its customer to reminder them about the EMI dates. Its easy to track and get the details .The rate offered is very good, but when it comes to offers they are not intimating their customers about it. The service offered was pretty good with respect to HDFC LTD on its housing loan.

The lender HDFC LTD offered a very good service when it comes to housing loan. It was a smooth process right from the collection of documents to the verification and till the end of process. The rate was a fixed one, I rather prefer floating rate and I was requesting the institution for the same. To sumup, it was a nice experience.

HDFC LTD is too quick in processing my home loan request. Without any struggle, I received my cheque for 40lakhs from HDFC LTD within 4days. They have applied current market rate to process the home loan application to process my home loan..

I am happy with the way HDFC LTD executed the home loan process. They had completed it on time and provided the funds when needed. The rate of interest they have offered was reasonable to me. So was the processing charges. It has always been a good process and good experience.

I took NRI loan from HDFC in London. Their staff are pretty rude and unresponsive. They are worst than SBI. They have hidden quite a number of things - e.g., whenever i gave a cheque in London office for prepayment, they send the cheque to India and only the date when they receive the cheque in India is considered as payment date. For one of my prepayment, they took almost 10 days against their SLA of 5 days. And the worst part is that they charged simple interest for that. One time, they calculated wrong EMI and sent to the bank for processing. It bounced because of lack of funds and several charges were levied. I am chasing bank for 3 months for their mistakes but I am not getting enough response. Worst experience. Overall, I feel that they hide a lot of facts and try to take as much money as possible from thecustomers.

I have switched over from HDFC LTD housing loan, to other bank for which they have applied around 2.5% as charges which is unfair. Further, in case of floating rate when RBI slashes the rate, a customer has to pay about 1% for activating the rate.The service offered was not transparent by HDFC LTD in case of home loan application being submitted.

I have switched over to another bank from HDFC LTD for which they have charged around 2.5% as charges. As RBI has slashed down the rate as is was a floating rate, for which the customer has to pay an interest of 1% for activating the rate. Therefore, I want HDFC LTD to be more transparent with the charges.,

I didnt expect this from them. Usually, Pre EMI is not charged for resale property where the disbursement of the loan is usually in 1 full installment. Loan was disbursed on 6th of august and they charged me August month Pre EMI and started the EMI from month of September. I informed them, that I am ready to make EMI from month of August but they denied me. This is not fair. Cheating

Guess HDFC LTD took around a month's time to complete the process .Basic KYC details and documents were required for the process. I can call its a best experience with HDFC LTD on the home loan. Its a very good service offered by HDFC LTD for getting the home loan.

I took NRI loan. It's a big mistake. I should never have taken. The staff are rude. There are many hidden charges. They hide simple interest charges of prepayment. They accept prepayment cheques in London on a certain date (X) and they take 10 days to send the cheques to Delhi. So, you will get charged 10 days of extra simple interest. The communication of the staff is extremely poor. They won't say any details of hidden charges. If they overcharge by mistake, they take ages(even months) to even start acknowledging the problem. I wouldn't recommend thinking of HDFC when you avail NRI loans. Highly fraudulent institution. I had SBI loan in the past. I think they are much better.

HDFC LTD has been well in their services. I have taken a home loan from them. They initially offered a rate of 8.25% for the first two years. Then the rate was of 9.5% for the third year. After which the rates has been on a floating mode. The process of the loan has been good and easy.

I have taken my home loan from HDFC Ltd. They were very fast in responding. The documents was collected on time and the loan was completed on the said time. The rate of interest was also reasonable. The processing fee was good too. It has been two years that I have taken this loan, the after loan services has been hassle free too.

HDFC LTD will be my second choice for a home loan offer.They are not having direct online facility to assist customer on the loan process.The intercommunication mode available for a home loan was also not clear with HDFC LTD which is a drawback for the home loan.

I have borrowed funds from HDFC LTD to build my house. They have given the loan on time and that was the best part. Statement were sent to my mail and I can find that on my inbox on time. Messaging system and follow up calls made was good from their end. On the whole, it was a smooth experience.

This experience of mine is pretty old, my experience with HDFC LTD was average in case of home loan.They have taken too much of documents and time to complete the process.It would be great, if they reduce the time scales and minimize the documentation part and provide a better support.

I received an excellent support from HDFC LTD related to the home loan process.Their executives are proactive in assisting the customer.I am getting faster response from their end.They give the list of documents required in the initial stage itself which was very much comfortable.

It was a smooth and transparent experience with HDFC LTD related to the home loan process.I need to visit their office once for getting the information and later it was simple.The rate offered was around 9.4% for the home loan.I felt the approval process can be much faster with HDFC LTD.

It was not a very good experience from HDFC LTD in case of home loan process.There was no customer support and the rates applied was also on the higher side.The explanation given about the process was not so clear and it was confusing for the customer.

HDFC LTD has dealt with the builder and that was the reason for choosing them.The process was simple and easy. My application was processed within 7days of time which was good. Mr.Deepak assisted me in a very good manner for home loan procedure.The rate applied by HDFC LTD was the least in market.

It was not a pleasant experience from HDFC LTD home loan process.They take long time for the documentation and the response offered to customer on loan application was not good.I would suggest it will be good if they work on the customer support which is offered to the customer.

I received a call from Prajakta from, HDFC housing loan department. She was so confident that it made me confident about the financial institution. She asked for the paper of the property and within a day, I am expecting a confirmation call or the sanction letter. The whole process was so transparent and it took just a day's time for me.

After 1st interaction with the HDFC bank executive, the application got closed without informing me the reason however, I got positive response for same type of interaction from the executive of Bankbazaar.com. As per the interaction with Bankbazaar, I'm well eligible for my applied loan and the available documents are perfectly fine.

My likes and dislikes about HDFC LTD is as follows, my likes would be when compared with others, HDFC limited has provided me a better interest rate it was around 9.4%. Dislikes, customer service was not good with them and I would like to suggest that executive of HDFCLTD should aim at delivering good service.

My home loan is from HDFC Ltd. The services was good from them. They came over to my place and collected my documents. The documents required is very minimal. The institution is not very high on the rate of interest and charges. The process was also completed on time.

I am not happy about the service provided by HDFC LTD related to the home loan process.They initially provided the loan for less rates but later they have increased the rate without updating customer.I came to know this changes through a statement after 1.5years and I was shocked seeing the difference.When I enquired it was informed,they dont have a policy of updating customer related to rates change.

I took the home loan from HDFC ltd which was a quite good. They added the co applicant asking the standard documents with them also.The loan taken my name so they offered 0.5% lesser interest rate under women category. They have offer 20 years but there is no possibilities of extending the tenure.They also required the guarantor for the loan process..

It was fantastic experience with HDFC ltd for the home loan. The maximum tenure period offered is for 20 years and they also gave the option of extending the tenure for 30 years . The registration and verification of the property was very quick. In terms of rates they are reasonable and similar to the market.

From the start to the finish , everything was appropriate. The process followed by HDFC LTD was very simple and it was also completed on time. I did not face any inconvenience with regards to the documentation or with their services,. The rate of interest and charges was very much affordable and my home loan was taken from HDFC LTD.

Few years back I had a very nice experience of availing a home loan from HDFC Ltd. I remember the overall processing to be very smooth and hassle free experience. I had zeroed in on a property and the builder had a tie up with them which made the process quite seamless. In 30 days the loan was sanctioned. The rate of interest was on fixed basis and they took an affordable processing fee.

Availing the home loan with HDFC ltd is tedious. They have different types of verification which leads to a very long time to disburse the amount.Rate of interest charged was 9.40% which was the good thing, as I took it the loan from online. They should be simplified the home loan process.

In 2011, I had taken a home loan from HDFC Ltd. The loan process was very smooth and very quick too. The rate of interest offered was 10.36% on a fixed basis. The loan tenure was 20-32 years approximately. As I had my salary account with HDFC bank, the process was very much simplified and the loan was processed in just a week.

I am completely happy with the way HDFC LTD processed my home loan. Interest rate was floating for a period of 28 years. 20 lakhs was the loan I applied for and the institution disbursed the same to me. Facilities like happy ending was not offered to me by HDFC Ltd.

It was average service offered by HDFC LTD related to the home loan application being submitted.They have taken around 2.5months time for processing the loan.The guidelines related to the documents where not informed to the customer clearly in initial time.

I was very happy to own my dream house and my experience with HDFC LTD was very good. My property was a constructed house and I did not add any co-applicants to it. My loan is for a total EMI of 20 years which is fixed and cannot be extended. Facilities like happy ending and others were not offered to me.

I have had taken my home loan from HDFC Ltd. The process was very good from them. They gave me a good offer on the rate of interest. The charges was also nominal. The response was good all through the process. Overall it was a satisfactory experience.

Roughly, HDFC LTD took around 1.5 months to complete the entire home loan process. I will suggest that it will be good, if there is a proper communication made with the customer to complete the process in a hassle free manner.The rates and charges applied by HDFC LTD was also average on my home loan.

HDFC ltd was too good in the processing the home loan but the interest rate, processing fee and insurance charges were on the higher side. I took the loan before seven years back felt the process very simple.After closing the loan the NOC documents were sent on time. The terms an conditions are more flexible comparing with the nationalized banks

My home loan was taken from HDFC LTD and I would state the process was simple. They are very prompt in processing the application.The customer support offered was best.They are not requiring more documents for processing the home loan through HDFC LTD.

The service provided was good related to the home loan process.The rates were decreased as per the market value but they are asking around 2000Rs to implement the changes applied. HDFC LTD has to improve their service related to the home loan application.

The process was overall easy while disbursing my home loan from HDFC Ltd. The institution provided me calls at regular intervals of time and offered the interest rate according to my convenience. Their representatives asked only for standard documents and nothing extra and I disbursed my loan in 2 weeks.

Little disappointing with the service offered by HDFC LTD for the housing loan. The process was lengthy and also it involved lot of paper works. Interest rate and processing charges were common as other banks, but the legal fee was high. It took about 10-15 days to sanction my loan.

They were also good and fast in the service.They are transparent in the service offered.They are very quick in responding customers related to the home loan application.The rates applied and terms related to this was not properly explained from HDFC LTD.

The person who handled the initial stage of my home loan application was not transparent about the process from HDFC LTD.My property is in nasik and I am situated in mumbai city.They missed to give all the details related to the documents in one point.

The overall experience of taking a home loan was about average when I applied to HDFC limited. The rate of interest charged was 9.5% and the processing fee charged was Rs.16k and on enquiring about this I was told registry fees was included. They have to inform about the service tax as well as the amount or percentage that is sanctioned upfront.I got to know these details a bit delayed. I would say they need to increase their clarity.

It was a very nice experience of availing the home loan from HDFC Limited. The rate of interest was 9.55% and though they had told me a processing fee of Rs.8k and later this was refunded which was a nice gesture. They took about 15-20 days to process the loan. The customer service on the part of the executive was quite good and he was co-operative enough.

I took the home loan with HDFC ltd. They processed the loan within one month time after completing the documentation and verification. Rate of interest charged was 10.25 % before six years. Only standard paper was collected for the process. The loan details paper was sent on time.

HDFC limited have provided me the good rate of interest for my housing loan. Customer service is also very good like they have contacted me many times, also the responsiveness too. The loan amount got disbursed to my account within two months of time.

I have taken my home loan from HDFC Ltd. The services was good. The response was also good. But they delayed by a month for disbursement. The rate of interest was of 9.55%. I was initially informed that there would be a zero processing fee. Later I was charged. I do not wish to rate for it as I assume that the fee could be returned. I had a co applicant option as well.

Exactly, before 2.5 years back, I took my second home loan from HDFC LTD. This time the rate of interest was 10.5% and they again took about 2 months. The processing fee was Rs.7-8k and they also charged 0.5% as tax which they said had to levied as per the Telengana government. The executive was not too co-operative with the process and i think its because the home loan ws not of that great a value. They need to give importance to every customer regardless of the loan amount.

Apart from the earlier one, this is another experience of availing the housing loan from HDFC LTD. When we bought a property, it was approved by HDFC LTD and upon suggestion from neighbours we decided to go ahead with them for the home loan. At the time the rate of interest was 10.7% for a tenure of 5 years. The processing fee charged was approximately Rs.10k. The overall process took 2 months and there was a delay by the executive who was a bit lethargic in approach.

The process has taken a very long time to complete and there was no necessity to proceed for such long steps.The collection of documents was not under the sink.I got the better rate offered for the home loan through the HDFC LTD and they have to work on time which will be my suggestion.

The time scale taken, was around one month for processing my home loan with HDFC LTD. HDFC ltd charged 9.45% interest rate and the processing fee was nearly Rs.11000. The maximum tenure they offered was sixteen years but i requested to extend till 20 years which was accepted by them. There was no guarantor required for the loan process.

My home loan process was good with HDFC ltd. They took nearly 10 days after completing the documentation. Interest rate charged was good but comparing with SBI bank it was little high. They charged insurance which was informed only at the end of the process. The loan process was done early but I tried to avail six months later but when I approached them it was like re applying for the loan. It would be better if the executives give the clear information.

Initially, I was a promised deadline of 25 days to complete the housing loan process, later they have extended the process up to 70days.The executives of HDFC LTD was not so responsive and they work like government staffs on the home loan application.The rate and charges applied was quite good.

The process of getting home loan was very short and it was less time consuming when I applied for this loan through HDFC LTD.The rate applied was less compared with other institutes.Their executives are behaving well towards customer related during the loan process.

It was all in a streamline with HDFC ltd, however there was some delay happened in disbursement for home loan due some reason. There was delay with some documents from the builder side due to which I was charged Rs.2500. They have collected one blank cheque for the security purpose for an amount of eight lakhs.

Rate of interest for the housing loan with HDFC limited was around 9.4% and the customer service was good one with them. The loan amount got disbursed within fifteen to twenty days of time and the processing charges were around 1% of the total capital amount. I dint face any drawbacks as such.

I was getting prompt reply for my queries with regards to my HDFC LTD home loan. Within 15 days the verification and documentation process was completed. They offer the maximum tenure period for the loan and there is also possibilities to extend the tenure. The rates were good when compared with others.

Certainly , I would say HDFC ltd is the best and it is very fast in processing the home loan.They hardly took seven days for the approval and for the disbursement they took totally 15 days. They offered nationalized bank interest rate as 9.45%. They were ready to offer 15 years tenure but I preferred to go for ten years only.

The representative from HDFC ltd came to collect the documents, but after that I have to follow with them for the disbursement. Initially, I was impressed by the service provided by him. The home loan process was well described and later I had opted for other benefits like insurance.

HDFC ltd took more than the excepted time like they took nearly two months. In one month period they completed the verification , reregistration process and also the documentation but after completing the paper work they took around 2 weeks to disburse the home loan amount.Interest rate offered was best in the market the processing fee was nominal but compared to sbi bank it is little costly.

I had an excellent experience of taking a home loan transfer from ICICI bank in the recent few weeks. The process was pretty smooth and the overall loan processing took about 15-20 days even after a small delay to get the remaining documents. The original rate of interest charged was 9.45% and for this top up the interest rate was 9.55% with no processing fee for the balance transfer and 5% for the top up. I took about Rs.9 Lakhs for 15 years.

Interest rate was pretty good with the HDFC limited for the housing loan, also it was competitive too. Processing charges were nil with them and the loan amount got disbursed after some delay like I assume it took around two months of time. There was one drawback with them like If I want to make the foreclosure then I need to make the payment through cheque along with three months bank statement.

Fortunately, HDFC LTD was able to process my housing loan with zero processing fee, as there was special scheme which was availiable at that time. Interest rate levied was around 9.45% for the housing loan with HDFC limited. Documentation procedures was done in a smooth manner and it all went as per my requirement.

HDFC Limited has offered services beyond their limit. It was a pleasant surprise as I am new to this institution. The executive came over to my home and collected the documents. He was very professional and friendly. I did not have the need to visit the branch. They had also taken the Demand draft by paying for it and later the cash was collected from me. I did not have to move out from my home even to take the photo copies. The executive done all. I simply sat back home and my home loan was processed. The rate of interest was good with comparison of other institutions. It was of 9.45%. The processing me was normal. I was not charged anything above and there was no hidden charges.

Though the entire process was smooth, there were a few steps which is missing. The executive had some personal reason which in turn delayed the process of taking loan. The charges applied by HDFC LTD was quite nominal. Except the time taken I have not faced any drawback with them in home loan process.

HDFC LTD , was able to complete the home loan process in a rapid speed of 12 days. The rate of interest was very good. It was of 9.65%. The processing charges were nominal as well. Customer satisfaction is very good. I got a tenure that suits me. I chose a tenure of 20 years. To conclude, overall it was a quick process.

The Home loan process with HDFC LTD was an awesome experience. They had offered a rate of interest of 9.4% on a floating basis. Initially the processing charges were not informed but later I was told the processing charges is Rs.7k which is nominal and will be deducted with my EMIs. The overall process was pretty smooth. I would say their representatives were very calm and co-operative. It was a peaceful process in all and it took just 15 days.

Interest rate was around 9.45% for the housing loan with the HDFC limited and the loan amount got disbursed after 1.5 months of time. Customer service was good one with the HDFC limited and I don't have any suggestion for them like I can say everything is going good as of now.

They could have processed it much earlier but the process was time taking for the home loan with HDFC LTD.The customer support offered was quite good but I would suggest it will be very good if they simplify the process of taking a home loan with HDFC LTD.

I had applied for the home loan in the month of February with HDFC limited. It was an average experience, as the rate of interest was fixed and good but their processing charges were 2% amounting to about Rs.8k. The loan tenure is 15 years. The loan does not work for a first timer as it did not meet the urgency. They had collected my documents at different intervals and it would have been good if they had mentioned the full list in the beginning itself.

HDFC Ltd offered me a good rate of interest and processing fee. It was of 9.40%. But the experience has not been very satisfactory. The executive initially informed me that the home loan disbursal would take a week. But it finally took a months time. Second thing was the executive had to leave and there was hardly anyone to contact. I tried contacting the customer care and they were not fast like the way they should have been. It was not a good response. I would recommend the institution for the rate of interest.

To start off, I would say that the whole process was very smooth. My documents were collected on time and step by step process was followed. They had given me a very competitive rate of interest. It was of 9.40%. The processing charges were also nominal. In a nutshell, I am very much happy with the service offered by HDFC LTD.

I am here to narrate my home loan experience that I had with HDFC LTD. The executives were very helpful, though my property is not in the location where I am. I was able to sign in the documents at the branch in my current location. I did not have to move to my native. I had a co-applicant option. It was my brother. The rate of interest was of 9.55%. I got the approval within 20 days. The process after that was not very easy. There was one document which was not available and the documents was submitted to the Legal team. The process from that team took more than three months to complete. Apart from this everything else was well.

This is my every first experience of availing a home loan from HDFC LTD. I have chosen a fixed rate of 9.55% for two years. After which it would be on a floating rate. I was also given a choice for the tenure, so I have chosen the tenure that suited me instead of going in for the maximum tenure. It would have been more better, if I was given a check list of documents needed, so I would have gone with everything to the bank. Because every time I visited the bank I was asked for another document. To sum up it was a good experience.,

Is simple terms, the process followed by HDFC LTD for the housing loan was superb. They are taking a month's time to complete the home loan process.The rate applied was nice and the payments date offered was also quite comfortable for the customer.

HDFC Ltd has given me a good response for the home loan I have taken from them. They came over and collected the documents on time. The process was smooth. I also loved the rate of interest was I was offered. It was of 9.55% (floating). Currently the rate if of 9.4%. The process took around one and half month. The institution has provided me the maximum tenure as well. It is satisfactory to me.

This is regarding HDFC gurgaon branch. They have worst customer service, manual token system in branch. All executives are overburdened with customers.Call center is pathetic. They don't know anything, they will check with branch executives and then pass on information.They do not part payments online, you will have to visit branch every time.

There are some key differences between HDFC LTD housing loan and other banks. Firstly, HDFC LTD offered an attractive rate of interest. Secondly, if the home is under construction, they had given a special option where in , if you make the payment, the amount would go towards the principal amount and the interest , thereby it helps one to reduce their principal outstanding as well the interest amount. On the other hand, the service that they offered was not up to the mark, where I was not informed about the list of documents before hand, rather the documents were collected in parts. Further, the process took about a month's time. To conclude it was an average experience that I had with HDFC LTD.

So, Initially I sent documents to HDFC LTD Nagpur for property in Pune. But they failed to understand my documents and could not approve it. But somehwere I had faith in HDFC LTD. I sent documents again to HDFC LTD Pune where property is situated. To my surprise, they approved loan in exact 5 days for 15 years for 1.2 cr. They only asked closure letter for my old loan and credit score from USA. There was very minimum communication involved as property was already approved by HDFC LTD. So, we are going ahead with disbursement and it took only 3 days after agreement was done. Only extra document builder required was POA from Indian Embassy. But overall it was smooth and painless. 9.45% ROI and only 10 K processing fees. Initial disbursement to builder was so quick.

I have home loan with HDFC limited and the interest rate was around 9.5%, which is floating based. Processing charges are nil with them because there was offer runs on that time. It took around twenty days of time to clear all the process.

HDFC LTD is the best institution for avialing the home loan. Their staffs update the customers in a timely manner and disburse the loan in a week time. I did not experience any sort of delay while taking my home loan with them. Interest rate was according to the market standards.

I have an ongoing home loan with HDFC Ltd. I did not gone through any sort of difficulties while disbursing this loan. My choice of property was a semi individual house and the interest rate offered was an acceptable one. Disbursement took 3 days.

My home loan is with HDFC LTD. The response was good throughout the process. But the process was delayed by a month. The rate of interest was of 9.55%. The processing charges were very minimal. There were banks offering a zero fee. Overall it was a good experience. Though not the best it is good.

HDFC LTD was very quick in processing the loan . They have excellent communication and clear information was given by the executive at the initial stage itself. I handed over all the papers to the executive so the process was simple. The amount was not disbursed immediately because it was planned to release according to the construction. I am very much comfortable with the interest rate and processing fee.

Home loan was processed within 10 working days by the HDFC limited. Interest rate was diminishing for the whole tenure of 25 years and the interest rate will be revised as per the RBI norms. The builder suggested me to take the home loan from HDFC limited.

I do have housing loan with the HDFC limited and the interest rate was around 8.75%. Now its around 9.75% as interest rate and the customer service is good. They have settled the amount in a single shot and the foreclosure charges are nil with them.

Honestly speaking, the institution asked me only a very few necessary documents for the loan process. There was no troubles in getting the loan. Being a home loan the verification process took some time and got disbursed in 15 days. To sum up , it was a wonderful experience.

When I decided to buy a property I chose HDFC limited to finance my home loan as they have a reputation of processing the application quite fast without any hassles. The rate of interest offered was 9% and the loan process took almost 40 days in all which is standard. I never faced any documentation or processing issues and it was quite a smooth experience. I got the first disbursal on 25th May. I directly approached the bank for the loan.

My request was placed online and I took a home loan from HDFC Ltd. Their response was perfect and I am happy about it. An agent from the bank named Shailendar kumar guided me though the entire process. Being a pre approved it got sanctioned within hours. I receive payment reminders and sms from them regularly.

The predominant reason for choosing HDFC LTD was I am holding an account with HDFC Bank. I decided to go for a home loan through HDFC Ltd. My property was actually a land and I constructed a home on it. Interest rate and charges were convenient for me. It took almost 5-10 days for sanctioning my loan.

When compared with other private sector banks, HDFC limited processed my home loan in a short time. Documentation was minimal and they have offered me the expected loan amount. And I would like to recommend them to my friends and relatives as they processed my loan in a short time.

The executives of HDFC LTD came to my place for documents pick up for my home loan process. Interest rate was 9.55% which was according to market standards. Actually there was a delay in my side as it took time to decide my property. Finally I got my loan in 7 days of time.

My home loan is with HDFC Ltd. The services and response has not been satisfactory. I was not happy with the process as well. After sanction they took two and half months to complete the loan process. The documents was not collected at one stretch, it was taken on a installment basis. The rate of interest was of 9.5%. The processing charges were normal too.

The process was very promptly handled by HDFC LTD related to my home loan.At that period of time there was no agents or third party to spoil the service.I was getting intimation about each step of loans and the process related to the loan from HDFC LTD.

The institution HDFCLTD sanctioned the loan at the right time. I had a very good experience while disbursing my home loan with HDFC Ltd. Interest rate was 9.4% floating for an EMI of 20 years. I chose a property in New Delhi that was under construction.

I have personaly walked in to the branch, when I decided to take a home loan from the HDFC Ltd and submitted all my documents to them. The verification process was done in a smooth manner. My loan got credited to my account in a month's time as there was delay from my side while confirming the property.

My first home loan was from HDFC in 2008 and the rates offered was 11.5% which was on par with other banks. They are very precise when it comes to giving the fine print about all the details. It may sound upfront or harsh but saves the customer from any hidden charges or information. They had even told me I would require a guarantor about 15 days in prior. Their process is streamlined and has great clarity especially regarding repayment options

I experienced a time lag due to financial year closing while disbursing a home loan from HDFC Ltd. But the bank helped me with providing hassle free services. The response and the customer support went hand in hand. And the executives made the process easy as they came to me and collected my documents.

HDFC LTD response was very good for my housing loan application. It took around fifteen to twenty days of time to get the loan amount to be disbursed like I got the first settlement disbursal . Interest rate was around 9.55% , which is floating based. Rather than the long disbursal time everything is fine for me.

Commencement of home loan process, started during the month of Feburary and got over only by April. The disbursal happened around 22nd of April. The overall loan process took 1.5 to 2 months. I felt that the executive was not co-operative and was either not knowledgeable or needs to co-ordinate better for the process. I got the photocopies of my documents just a week before the disbursal. I was offered an interest rate of 9.45% on floating basis for 25 years.

I got a fair response from HDFC LTD for the housing loan. It was a pretty smooth process and even though it being a home loan it took hardly 15 days. The executive named Vijay was a very co-operative and helpful person who co-ordinated everything. I was given a copy of the loan bond.The rate of interest offered was 9.55% which reduced to 9.45% before disbursal. The loan was offered on floating basis and for 20 years tenure. They charged me around Rs.9k plus tax as processing fees.

The Home loan with HDFC was a very easy process and I was offered an interest rate of 9.45% on a floating basis. The loan is of 180 installments and for a tenure of 15 years. There was no difficulties during the stages of the loan process and the executive Yogender was helpful enough. The loan applied was for Rs.11.7Lakhs and I have got the first installment, the next slot will be disbursed in July and the consecutive slot in August.

My second home loan was taken from HDFC LTD . The rate of interest this time was 10% on a fixed basis and the tenure of the loan was 20 years. The overall loan process from the documents collection till bout disbursal took 30-45 days. There was no inconveniences caused, but I felt their branch customer service is not up to the mark. They need to be more customer friendly and approachable.

The home loan from HDFC LTD was taken around 5 years back it was a good experience. I felt that the rate of interest that they charged me was around 10% was quite higher when compared with other market players. Their formalities are also quite lengthy and took about 30-45 days for the loan process. The loan was on fixed basis and it is for a tenure of 20 years. I prefer HDFC for their customer care as well as their net banking which is quite clear and convenient to check details regarding my home loan.

I went ahead with HDFC LTD, when I wanted a home loan as it was recommended by my family members. The rate of interest offered at the time was 10.2% on a floating basis from the beginning. I took this around 3 years back and the overall loan process took 10-15 days. They sent their executive home to collect the documents and it was quite smooth till disbursal. The loan tenure was 10 years.

HDFC LTD is very good in responding the customer and they act according to the customer wish. The loan amount got disbursed within a month of time and the interest rate is around 9.55%. Processing charges were around 10000 Rupees with the HDFC limited.

The home loan process was good at the initial stage of loan.It was not the same experience at the top up process.They have not fulfilled the commitment made to the customer.They took 25days to process the home loan in HDFC LTD which was a drawback about the institute.

As it was a good offer, I have given my consent for processing the home loan with HDC LTD. The rate of interest was more competitive. It was of 9.5%. The processing charges were pretty low. But the process took long time. After finalizing the documents, the loan was disbursed in 20 days.

It was a very good experience with HDFC Ltd for my home loan. I got a very good offer from them. The services and response was good. They communicated all through the process. The rate of interest was of 9.55%, it was normal. The processing charges was waived off. The process was completed within three weeks. Overall satisfactory.

I had visited the institution for the loan process, I had to wait for more than four hours. The loan was also delayed in one and half month. The rate of interest was normal. It was of 9.5%. The processing charges was high. My home loan is from HDFC Ltd. The services was good. The response was average.

Before 7 years, I had taken the home loan from HDFC limited. Entire loan process including documentation and verification was done within 10 days. Interest rate was 9.75 % at the beginning. As it is a floating interest rate it went to 10.25 % and substantially decreased to 9.65 % by this time.

The interest rate offered by HDFC LTD was inline with other banks. The process for the home loan was good with HDFC Ltd. The services was good. They completed the process within eight days. The rate of interest was of 9.55%. I do not wish to rate them on the processing fees as I have not compared it.

I have not finalized with the property as of now so I have not proceeded with the home loan with HDFC LTD.The response provided on the application was really good.I am not sure about the rates offered in the loan.I like the overall service given from HDFC LTD in home loan.

My home loan is from HDFC Ltd. The process was pretty lengthy. But I am happy with the services and response I got from them. I got the more benefits being a woman. The rate of interest and processing charges was normal. Overall it was a very satisfactory experience.

I had bought a property for which HDFC was financing the home loan as the builders had a tie up with them. Their rates of interest and charges were standard as per the market standards and was affordable. They took roughly about 2 weeks to process the loan and it was a hassle free experience as the builders co-ordinated well. What pleased me was the after experience, as the customer care extended by them throughout even after availing the loan is worth a mention.

I have borrowed funds from HDFC LTD for my housing loan. I have taken my home loan. It was completed as promised. The documentation was minimal too. The rate of interest was of 9.5%, which was very high when compared with other banks. The processing charges were high as well.

Documentation process was extremely good with HDFC LTD home loan. They took one month to disburse the amount there was little delay from my side. Rate of interest charged was 9.55% reducing and the processing fee was 0%. They hardly took 2 days for the property verification.

HDFCLTD managed to complete the entire process over the phone , where there is no need for me to visit the HDFC ltd as the executive visited the place and collected all the documents. Based on the cooperate service they offered the best interest rate of 12.5% and the other charges were just Rs.1200.If they could have reduce the interest rate it might have been great. My loan account is linked to the my internet banking so it is very easy to check.

HDFC LTD processed the home loan very nicely and the executive were cooperative but they took more 15 days for the normal disbursement time due to the insurance process. It would be great, if they keep insurance as optional rather than mandate, as most of the people are having insurance. On the other hand, I am completely satisifed with the interest rate and processing fee.

Most recently I have taken a home loan from HDFC LTD within 15 days but the documentation process was little hassle free as they were asking for the entire building papers. Interest rate offered was average but there was some discount on the processing fee. Loan documents were sent on time and they have also given the online facility to check the details.

HDFCLTD processed my home loan in a very good way. The staffs of the bank are very cooperative and the interest rate provided to me was of a minimum range. The verification process were done in a smooth manner and the disbursement took 10-15 days.

Home loan processing was smooth with HDFC Limited. The agent who interacted with me was very polite and efficient in handling my loan application. The entire loan process was completed within a week time along with the disbursal and I am quite satisfied with the process.

Home loan approval took more than 2 months for HDFC limited for approval. The executive who interacted with me does not have a complete knowledge about the loan process. It would be good if they avoid the communication gap in the loan processing.

Home loan disbursal was tedious with HDFC limited. There is a need for me to reach the branch often for every banking queries. As this is my first loan in my life time, I do not have a clarity of the loan process. It would be nice if they provide clarity for all charges upfront before loan processing.

I hope that I am the first customer to get the home loan disbursed from HDFC limited in a short time. After documentation, the home loan was processed within 7 working days. Interest rate quoted by them was floating and that too was with respect to the current market rate.

In the recent past, I have availed a home loan from HDFC LTD. As I am a privilege customer it was an excellent experience and the loan was processed without any hassles in about 30 days. The executive was very co-operative and very responsive. The rate of interest was 10.5% on floating basis for a term of 20 years. There was a Rs.10k charge as processing fee and after the verification, Rs.14-15k was charged at the time of purchase.

Interest rate with the HDFC limited was good for the housing loan and the processing fee is okay for me. Customer service and the response is good with them and the loan amount got disbursed to my account within seven days of time. Total tenure is around twenty years of time.

I availed a home loan from HDFC bank as I was staff there. I was given a preferential rate of 9.65% on floating basis from the beginning itself and even the processing fee was just 0.5% which is nominal. The term of the loan was 15 years and I had to just go once or twice to the bank. The processing was easy and I got an amount of 9 Lakhs sanctioned for a new property. The loan details is available on their website itself for easy access.

During 1990s I got the home loan interest rate was 22.5% in HDFC ltd but later it got reduced to 12% . In those days we have to struggle a lot to get the loan and have to visit the branches several times. But the people supported me well to get the loan.

My home loan was taken from HDFC Ltd. The services are good from them. The response was fast. The process was easy. I am happy with the services. The rate of interest was normal. The processing charges were normal too. When compared to other banks.

I am ok with the interest rate offered by HDFC LTD for the home loan., The impact of RBI according to the interest reach me after three months of time. Everything was smooth with them and they have given me the draft and I submitted it to the builder.

My home loan is with HDFC LTD. The level of services offered by them was very good. They were responsive. The process was completed on time. The rate of interest was normal. The processing charges was normal too. Overall a good experience and its fine.

Very pleased to say that, I have taken a home loan from HDFC LTD. . I am a co-applicant as the primary applicant was my father. They offered a floating rate of 9.75% for 25 years. The loan was taken in December and sanctioned in January.
