The positive aspects of ICICI Bank personal loan is the service and response as both are really good. Eventually, I dropped my plan of taking the home loan from ICICI Bank therefore, I did not proceed further with them.

I changed my plan to proceed with the ICICI bank home loan and postponed to take the loan next year.I received a call immediately from the bank and was given complete information about the documentation and process of the loan.The customer service was good.The interest rate is 9.45% per annum and the processing fee was Rs 10000 with the tenure of 30 years.ICICI bank did not have an option for free EMI payment with only the interest to be paid for the first year.I was generally looking for that particular offer.Its generally given when the house is in construction process.

I wanted a home loan initially and so I applied for ICICI bank on-line and received a quick response from the executive,I was informed in details about the documentation and registration fees.I am yet to finalize the property and take a decision to avail the home loan.I am satisfied with the response and customer service provided to me by ICICI bank.

No news nor any updates from ICICI bank, after I applied for the home loan through online. I did not receive any call for many days and so meanwhile I changed my plan to avail the home loan. I do not have any suggestion for ICICI bank because there was no communication with the bank.I might avail the home loan in future.

I received a cal from ICICI bank home loan once and they asked me about the details of the documentation and the bank executive said that he will call back later but I did not receive a call.I waited for for few days and then I applied for LIC home loan.I was offered 9.55% interest rate from ICICI bank.

I needed the loan very urgent so when I applied for ICICI bank home loan I did not get a cal immediately and after waiting for 2 days I applied for HDFC home loan.I directly contacted the bank and provided all my documents with interest rate of 15.75%.I do not have ICICI account.I received a call from ICICI bank later but I already applied with HDFC bank.ICICI bank website is good and would recommend to friends.

Nowadays, it is very tedious to apply for a home loan because of documentation. However with the help of ICICI it was very comfortable at that point of time when I took home loan from ICICI Bank. ICICI Bank Home loan experience was very good. Interest rate was very less when I applied it was 7 percentage. My Suggestion would be in comparison of other banks comparison like HDFC in today's scenario ICICI should reduce the Interest Rates.

ICICI bank did not return my call, after I applied for the housing loan with them . I called the bank multiple times but there was no proper response.I applied for India bulls and I availed the home loan from them and the process was quick they came and they collected all the documents and I got the loan in a week.I would suggest ICICI bank to be more responsible towards their customers.

During the intial phase, I had approached ICICI Bank for the home loan but opted out because, the amount that was sanctioned was too less to buy a flat.I was offered 30 lakhs with the interest rate of 9.45% per annum.I cancelled the plan as I did not want to get into litigation issues.I think the bank should conduct proper survey of the city or area before offering the home loan amount.The bank should offer home loan according to market value.

I am yet to finalize the property ,initially when I applied on-line and did not get a cal till 10 days and I did not have a clue whom to call.I did some follow-up calls and later I got a call from 2 to 3 people from the bank and informed about the documentation process and the interest rate was 9.45% per annum and was not informed about the processing fees.If I received a call at the right time I would have taken a property.The bank is good but needs improvement in communicating with customers at the right time.

I was willing to take the home loan from ICICI bank but when I received a call from the executive and they informed about the documents,there were few documents which i did not have, so I have opted out of the home loan and I am in the process of ac-curing all the documents and will apply once again with ICICI bank.The interest rate offered was 13.7% per annum with 5% processing fees.The bank has offered good service.

I lost interest in purchasing a home therefore, I did not proceed further with the process and I have cancelled my plan to buy a home. I received a cal from ICICI bank and they asked me all the formal questions but I told them, that I will avail the loan in future.I am very much satisfied with the customer service.

ICICI, bank did not provide me home loan because my property belonged to gram-panchayat layout with gated community.I informed the bank that the property is on gram-panchayat layout and they agreed and collected all the documents and then there was no callback.So after many follow-up the bank said that they cannot provide the loan.I am not satisfied and would suggest transparency communicating with customers.

I have a salary account from ICICI bank.I applied for home loan but the interest rate was similar to KOTAK bank.As there was already a home loan going on with KOTAK bank there was zero processing fees,So I opted out of ICICI bank and availed top-up loan from KOTAK.The ICICI bank executive were professional and offered their best support.

There was a financial requirement of 24 lakhs, but based on my eligibility criteria I am entitled to get only 21lakhs from ICICI bank. I was not interested as the loan amount was lesser than the value of the property.The bank informed me that if, I close the personal loan application then I would be eligible for a better amount. Therefore, I had applied for HDFC LTD housing loan . On the other hand, the overall experience with the ICICI bank was neat.

Presently, I have withdrawn the plan of taking the home loan from ICICI Bank. Their executives were making continuous follow up for the application .The rate applied was minimal and it is based on the market rates. I definitely reach them again, just in case if I am in need of the loan.

To begin with, I received a call from ICICI bank, they informed me to keep the documents ready and they will come and collect it from my home. But later, I changed my mind and informed the bank that I need some time to take the decision for getting the loan.The processing fees charges was Rs 12000. I planned to take the loan in future most probably from ICICI bank.

First of all, I want to start by saying that, I was looking out for a better loan amount from ICICI Bank for the home loan. Being a bank with 540 branches they can give more exciting offers and service to the customer where lesser branches banks gives higher eligible amount.

Its really interesting to work with ICICI Bank, as I had approached for ICICI bank for the home loan, later I had postponed it for a better offer. I got a call from the bank and informed about the list of documents to be submitted and also they informed me about the interest rate of 9.45% per annum and also about the some processing fees.The response and service is good and also the executive were very much helpful.

My first preference was ICICI Bank as I approached them first, I actually got a call from ICICI and, I had asked a couple of questions and they did not revert back. I waited for couple of days and then I opted out and as it was very urgent, So later I applied at HDFC LTD for the housing loan.Did not get any response and suggest that HDFC LTD should take more responsibility and do its work seriously and deliver better customer service.

I dropped the plan to avail home loan from ICICI, because the interest rate was high and subsequently applied for SBI home loan because the interest rate was low.The ICICI website needs to be improved as most of the time its out of service and we are not able to transffer funds.

The property which I was purchasing was actually funded by the IDBI bank by the first owner,So initially when I applied for ICICI bank,They informed me that it would be easier to avail the home loan through IDBI since the primary funding was done by the concern bank.ICICI bank supported and guided me with the process and they have good field knowledge,The bank executive were friendly and the service was good.

I applied for ICICI bank home loan through on-line but due to delay from the bank the property was sold out. I received a cal from the bank executive and requested him to come home and provide a detailed information about the loan process. But the executive send sms regarding the documents to be submitted and then there was no cal again. Probably, a quick response from bank could have bought me the property.

I applied for home loan and renovation loan in ICICI bank but I opted out because there was no option for the combined loan process.Since I applied on-line and received a cal after 4 days and the executive from ICIC bank did not except my proposal and said I need to wait for 6 months for the loan to be sanctioned.So i changed my mind and applied with LIC HFL.I suggest to add more home loan options with ICICI bank,But the overall experience was good and I am happy with the ICICI bank.

I applied for icici home loan through on-line portal but did not get any response from the bank,so i visited the bank directly and applied for home loan and the executive came the next day and collected the documents from my home.I have received a sanctioned letter.I applied for Rs 860000 and the interest rate was 9.45% per annum with 15 years of tenure.Comparatively charges are nominal and the bank is good and will recommend friends.

I got better offer from other bank so that was the reason for not proceeding with ICICI Bank in home loan.I felt the processing charges applied was on the higher side.ICICI Bank was not clear about the process norms towards the customer.The service offered was not a recommended one.

I was not requiring a home loan from ICICI Bank.They made a follow up calls 1-2times for the application being submitted.The rate applied was around 12.5% for the home loan.I may require the loan in future instance and take the service of ICICI Bank.

I was not requiring a home loan from ICICI Bank.They made a follow up calls 1-2times for the application being submitted.The rate applied was around 12.5% for the home loan.I may require the loan in future instance and take the service of ICICI Bank.

I have postponed the plan for getting home loan due to some personal reasons.The response offered from the bank end was quite timely.There is nothing to be altered in the process or norms of the bank in case of my home loan application with ICICI Bank.

ICICI Bank executives have not been on scheduled time for processing a home loan application.The customer support offered should be improved.I may not recommend the service of ICICI Bank in home loan application to future customer with the experience I hold.

It was a satisfactory experience from ICICI Bank in home loan application.They take long time for collection of documents to be place.There is no transparency in the information given.I would suggest it will be good if they have single point of contact for reaching customer.

The reason why I did not opt for ICICI home loan is because of limitation on the loan.I received a call from the bank executive and there was a cap on the loan amount so i was not interested for ICICI bank,Moreover there was too much of terms and conditions and the information was not shared completely.The loan amount offered did not suit my requirement.I availed the HDFC LTD home loan even though the interest rate and tenure was similar to icici but there was no cap for the loan amount,I have salary account with icici and the customer service was good and genuine.

The interest rate for ICICI bank was too high with, 15% per annual,I applied for 40 lakhs for 20yrs and the total amount with interest was 90 lakhs, So I opted out with icici and applied for sbi and its in process and I need to submit my IT documents with the sbi for further process.But overall service is good and received a call within 2hrs from the icici bank.

They are very slow in updating about the process for the customer.The details related to the loan was not projected in a correct manner.The rate applied was same like other banks and there is no variant applied.They can improve the process of home loan in ICICI Bank.

I was looking out for more options for purchasing the property, therefore I applied for ICICI home loan, then I changed my plan . I was satisfied with the service applied by ICICI Bank in home loan process.I have not finalized with the property yet and that was the reason for not proceeding.The rates applied in the loan was really convenient and recommended service to future customer.

I applied for icici home loan on-line but there was no response from there end and moreover my property was not finalized on time so thats why I postponed my plan .Furthermore, I applied for HdfcLTD housing loan and it was under process but I changed my mind because of some issue with the property. I applied for icici bank home loan but i did not get loan as the bank said that we do not give loan for this particular property.I applied for home loan from icici bank but received a cal after 4 days,I would have appreciated if the response was quick.The interest rate is low,no suggestions has to be shared for icici bank.

I initially applied for icici home loan and then i opted out because i got a good deal from competitive bank.The rate of interest for icici is also high comparatively ,Although the service is good and the documentation process is simple.I donÌ¢??t have any suggestions as of now for icici bank,but would recommend to friends.

Since my proprietor was dealing with other bank, I did not proceed further with ICICI Bank.The support offered by ICICI was really good and they made perfect follow up to the customer on the application status.I think communication is very important and the process was done in a perfect manner with ICICI related to home loan.

I have not finalized with the property in initial stage and that was the reason for not taking a loan from ICICI Bank.The service and response provided was good.They are cooperating with the customer in a very good manner for the home loan application being submitted.

I did not take the home loan from ICICI Bank because I had postponed my plan in buying the property. The rate of interest was very high. It was of 9.55%. The processing charges was high too. As there are banks waiving off the fee. The services and response was good.

There was a mismatch in the information provided by ICICI Bank and the executive .There was no transparency in the service offered from ICICI Bank realted to the home loan process.The rates and charges applied was quite good.I would suggest it will be good, if they explain their clients about their process in a very good manner.

I applied for icici home loan because i wanted to buy a flat and more-ever i wanted to know that how much loan amount can i get as based on my income,i opted out of the home loan optionbecause it changed my mind to buy the flat,I received a cal the next day by the icici bank and provided all the details and the response was very pleasing.They offered the tenure of 20yrs and also received special offers,I might avail the home loan in future.

I closed the home loan application with ICICI Bank due to my personal reasons. I got a response from them and they verified my details and provided the information I needed. I was also comfortable with the rate of interest. I did not discuss about the processing charges.

I have no clue on the rate of interest and charges offered, after I applied for a ICICI Bank home loan. I received a call once and I was informed that they would contact me back. But I received no calls from them. It was not very satisfactory experience and I am an existing customer of the bank.

In the recent past, I had approached ICICI Bank for the hom e loan. The response that I received from them was very good. I did not take the loan as I had to cancel my plan at that moment. The rate of interest was quite normal for me. The processing charges were nominal too.

I walked in to the nearest icici bank home branch., I was offered a very less processing fee. The first and foremost reason for not selecting ICICI bank was because of hidden charges. Initially, I applied for ICICI home loan but later, I got good offer from my builder as the processing fees was waived off for ICICI bank, it took around 7 to 8 days to get the loan amount. During the intial phase of my home loan application with ICICI Bank. It took a long time to get connected with the bank executive. To begin with, I would say that the response that, I received from the bank was not satisfactory when I approached ICICI bank for the home loan. It was much delightful service offered by ICICI Bank, as ICICI bank service was in a very friendly manner when I took the home loan in the year 2004. The people were very cooperative. Time duration taken by them was hardly ten days. The process was very speedy. Representative visited the place to collect the papers. All the payment was released very soon. But the post loan service was not satisfied.

My home loan is from ICICI bank. The services are good from them. They completed the process really fast. I did not have to visit the bank. The executive came over to my place and all the procedures was done. The only drawback is the rate of interest and charges is high when compared to other banks.

ICICI bank renders happy services to the customer, those who approach them for a home loan. The bank recommended me to add a co applicant for the process as in case of any unforeseen happenings the co -applicant would be able to take control on the loan ( for making the payment) . I took a property worth 1 crore after the bank had verified my assets i.e my collateral security.

During the home loan process, there was no proper response from the ICICI bank representative. Even after submitting my cheque. ICICI bank is asking for more documents but whenever my legal advisor approached him but he never picked the call. I would suggest that the executive, should pick the call when the customer calls. .

My home loan process is quite simple and convenient. Representative of ICICI bank came to my place to collect the documents. They work on the weekends also. They have offered the maximum tenure of 15 years. There was no requirement for the guarantor, but they have taken my wife as the co applicant.

I liked the way ICICI bank carried out my home loan process. Time duration taken by the bank was just ten days after completing all the paper works.Required documents was also less.Rate of interest charged was 9.5% and the processing fee was Rs.5000 which was nominal.

The loan against property that I availed with ICICI bank deserves full praise as my experience was pretty good. The rate of interest was 11.5% with a processing fee of 0.75% and within the first year was revised to 10%. I later took a top up on that loan again for 10% this time with a processing fee of just 0.5% which is quite nominal. The documentation delayed the processing which took 45 days the first time and for the top up the loan processing took a week.

My home loan is from ICICI Bank. The services were very good for this process. It was completed on time. They also given me a very good rate of interest. The charges were also normal. Overall it was a very good experience and am happy too with the whole process for the loan.

The service offered for the home loan was good by ICICI Bank.There is no difficulties in processing the loan.They have taken around 25days of time.They have not required much documents from the customer end for processing the home loan application being submitted.

ICICI bank always aims at delivering wonderful service with respect to the home loan application which is being submitted. The overall experience of ICICI Bank was recommended related to the home loan.

I have an ongoing home loan in the ICICI bank. The process of taking a home loan from ICICI is pretty simple. Their representatives contacted me and fixed my convenient time for docs pick up. The property that I chose was a flat. Overall the bank provided me with excellent services.

With ICICI bank I have a home loan . The rate of interest offered was 9.65% on a floating basis for 20 years loan tenure. The loan was sanctioned in about 7 working days which is really quick for a home loan. The overall process was very easy and smooth with no issues at all. The executive was quite helpful. The only concern was the insurance that was added on for which I had to pay Rs.5k.

It was a good experience with ICICI Bank related to the home loan process.The process was fast and follow up made was good.When I was filling the application many things were not disclosed.The processing charges were not transparent in the process.In case of application they should list out the things in a clear manner

They have taken long time for checking the property in the home loan process with ICICI Bank.I have just waited for 20days for this process alone.They do have two separate departments and there is no coordination with them.I would suggest it will be good if they have coordination in assisting for the customer for application.

I guess some obstacles were there, whilst processing my home loan with ICICI bank.They have taken long time to process the loan.The charges consumed on the process was also on the higher side.I would suggest it will be good if they provide a transparent service to its customers.

By April, I have applied for the home loan with the ICICI bank and it took around 21 days to get the loan to be disbursed. Interest rate was around 9.45% and the customer service was good one with them and the processing charges were nominal one with them.

Had an excellent experience with ICICI bank. As per the excepted time the amount was disbursed. Rate of interest charged was 9.45% and the processing fee was very nominal. Documentation process was simple. The executive provided door step facility for the loan process.

I did not approached the ICICI bank for the home loan were as the executive approached for the process so it went on very smooth. The ICICI bank executive Mr. Ashish Kumar was very helpful and he explained all the details about the home loan. I asked many questions to the him which was explained slowly and clearly. The documents was collected by him and in the single call they completed the verification.They were competitive in terms of rates.

Overall experience was good with ICICI bank, but I have to follow up for the loan documents and welcome kit as it has been one month since the loan has been disbursed. The insurance policy documents were also not sent. Still I unable to know the terms and conditions of the loan process.

Overall it was a very good experience with ICICI Bank and the service offered by them was good. The response was good throughout the process. The documents were collected on time. The rate of interest was of 9.55%. The processing charges were normal too.

My home loan application was processed through the builder and the service offered was better compared with HDFC LTD.They have taken 10-12days in processing the loan.ICICI Bank rates applied for the home loan are in the higher side which was a drawback.

I bank with ICICI bank for over a period of nine years , so I decided to go ahead with them to get the housing loan. The loan amount got disbursed to my account within a month of time. Later part everything happened in a very good manner.

My experience with ICICI Bank for the home loan is as follows. The interest rate offered was 9.4% on a fixed basis and the loan tenure was 20 years. They took about 2-3 weeks approximately to process the loan. The executives were co-operative and the loan process was simple and easy. The minor glitch was that, they had initially stated the insurance as an option and after signing the agreement had insisted on taking it. Later they slashed it.

I had undergone a lot of trials and tribulations during the entire home loan process of ICICI Bank. I was not informed in details about the charges. There were a lot of hidden charges taken. Nothing in particular about demerits. ICICI people had asked for an insurance but I did not take it as it is optional.

I postponed the plan of taking the home loan so the application was closed form ICICI bank. The interest rate offered was 9.7% and the processing was good. Customer service and response was good.They provide the best which is as per the customer expectation.

When I applied through online I was eligible for loan amount of 17lakhs but when I approached the ICICI bank directly they were ready to give 20lakhs. I think by considering my salary account they would have ready to offer 20lakhs. Actual processing charge is of 11k for home loan but I got discount of 50% so they just deducted 6k.

The property location was not under the coverage area of the ICICI bank so the home loan application was closed. Customer service and response was good. Interest rate and processing fees informed was nominal. Documents required for the process was very easy. They are very response able.

I had not taken the home loan from ICICI bank due to the documentation process as it was not completed and so that is the reason I had not taken the loan from this bank. The customer service offered by this bank was very good. The rate of interest charged was very high when compared to other bank.

Service of ICICI bank is good. Actually I had inquired the representative about bifurcation of EMI for home loan but I did not get it. I did approach the bank directly for home loan and got it done. ICICI bank is offering floating rate where customers can change it by later as fixed.

ICICI Bank housing loan process is very good and it is very fast. I managed to get this loan with in 2 weeks of time. I am an existing customer of ICICI Bank they have offered the preferential interest rate which is 10.5% there is no processing fee and I have submitted all my documents on time.

I tried applying for home loan with ICICI bank. Since my budget was not sufficient and I found the Interest rate was quite high with ICICI bank, I switched over to SCB for lower interest rate. The processing fee is normal. it would be better if ICICI bank reduce the interest rate.

Everything was good with ICICI bank. The interest rate I was told was10.25 for home loan which is fine.There was tie up with bank and the builders, so was some dispute amongst them hence did not go with Icici bank. I suggest that they should have a knowledge in what project they have and whether they are able to avail loan or not.

Due to the shortage of documents I post ponded the plan to avail loan with ICICI bank.Other wise the service and the response was good with Icici bank. Interest rate I was told 10.5% and the processing fee is normal as other banks. Now my property is finalized so I will be availing my home loan very soon.

I got the call very immediately from home loan with the ICICI bank.The responsiveness are really good with them.While in the call, they followed me multiple times.Unfortunately , I was not finalized the property, so I just postponed the plan.

By the last time I applied for the home loan with ICICI bank.The rate of interest is around 11% , but the property was not yet finalized for me, so I just postponed the plan.The service is really okay for me .
I received the call from the ICICI bank regarding the housing loan.The rate of interest was nominal is around 10.1% and 6000 Rupees is the processing charges.I am happy with their services

I got the call with the ICICI bank regarding about the Housing loan.The rate of interest is around 10.15% and am okay with that.They provided me with the good service and they made the call within a day of time.I can say its the quick response.

Due to bank norms, I did not avail home loan from ICICI bank. This was the only reson I dropped the plan. Other than this the service was good initially. No feed backs or suggestion as such. I feel ICICI is good.

I found that the interest rate is bit higher , it is 10.75 % with ICICI bank in terms of home loan, hence dropped the plan inorder to avail home loan with ICICI. I was not told about the processing fee. Other than this the service provided was good.

Actually I enquired about the home loan with ICICI bank, I was deal with some other bank hence switched over to other bank for lower interest rates. Icici offered 12% which is bit high, I feel that atleast 1% can be reduced.

Interest rate was 10.2% it is high for everybody. I feel that still it can be reduced. Processing fee is 5K, is a good amount normal as other banks. It was pretty good experience with customer service. I was not known what documents to be produced, dealer says something the agent from bank says something it was time consuming. It took more than a month hence the processing time can be improved other than this everything was good with ICICI in terms of home loan.

The customer service were proactive, calling many time with regard to my home loan. Actually I changed my mind hence did not go with ICICI bank. Interest rate can be little more cheaper , I see that other banks offers lower interest rate. It should be flexible and customized. Service was good. Excellent customer service of ICICI.

I am still searching for the property hence dropped the plan to avail the home loan with ICICI bank. I see that the interest rate is 10.15% which high when comparing to the other banks so I feel that this can be reduced. Even I had a good service provided by the customer service.

I had an ongoing home loan still with Hdfc LTD. I thought to transfer my loan to ICICI bank for lower Interest rate. But I found the Icici offers same Interest rate as Hdfc hence dropped the plan. Other than this, the service was good and the response was quick I was given all the details.

I am holding a housing loan with ICICI Bank its an ongoing loan. Everything was organized here. Only once they have come to my place for documents collection. Did not get call from the customer service of ICICI bank with regards to my home loan. The interest rate is around 9% which is very less. The processing fee is 1% which is good. I suggest the bank to improve in reducing their interest rates.....

I am having the home loan with ICICI bank.The rate of interest is around 11.5% and am not okay with that because I need the rate of interest like 9 to10%.Within 10 days the loan got processed.I am okay with them.

It was a good experience with ICICI Bank for the home loan I have taken. I did not take the home loan from this bank as I was not in the requirement of the loan at that time. The executive of the bank did not provide me with proper information in terms of the documentation works.

When I applied home loan through online for ICICI bank, they contacted me on time and no problem with them. However before going for procedures, I got offer from other source so I was supposed to close the deal with ICICI bank. Atleast they responded on time so very much satisfied. ICICI bank was quite helpful and cooperative but I don't like the services of executive where they failed to coordinate with me during the home loan process. My feedback is positive about ICICI bank as they served better during home loan process. I am bit dissatisfied with ICICI bank because they took almost two months to disburse the loan. Interest rate is 9.9% and tenure 11 years. Processing charge is nil but they collected 2800 as administrative charge and 300 for stamp duty charge.

People who dealt with me from ICICI bank did not fulfill the commitments that they made. After paying the processing charge, they took 20 days to settle the home loan amount. Before collecting all documents the executive asked me to pay the stamp duty charges, which is not at all good. I am very happy with the ICICI bank but not with the executive. Executive should be much knowledgeable about the products.

The home loan from ICICI Bank is good. It is a composite value loan I have taken from this bank. The processing was very fast as my loan got disbursed within 15 days. The branch was within my company campus and so it was easy convenient for me as well as for the bank to give loan.

The rate of interest charged by the ICICI Bank is very high. I had not taken the home loan from this banks as I had preferred to take from nationalized banks than the private banks because of the rate of interest. It would be nice if the rate of interest is reduced for the customers who provide proper documents.

I have a very good relationship with ICICI Bank and the services offered by this bank is good. I had not taken the home loan as there was a difference between me and the developer of the property and so that is the reason I had dropped the plan of taking the loan. I was not in the requirement of taking the home loan and so that is the reason I had dropped the plan of taking the loan from ICICI Bank. I am holding an account with this bank since 2006 and the service offered by this bank is very good.

It was a tough part to take home loan from ICICI Bank. I had not taken the home loan from ICICI Bank as they said that my salary was not sufficient to approve loan. I got a call from the customer service executives of the bank after 2 days I submitted the application online and on the first call they had told me that I was not eligible for the loan.

It was a very good experience with ICICI Bank for the home loan I applied. I had not taken the loan as my property was not finalized and so that is the reason I had dropped the plan of taking the loan. Apart from this everything else was fine and also the service calls from the bank was very good.

It was not a very good experience with ICICI Bank for the home loan I applied. I had only less documents with me as they were demanding for too many documents. The best part about this bank is they had called me up within the promised time.

It was a very good experience with ICICI Bank for the home loan I applied. It was an immediate response from the bank. I had not taken the home loan from ICICI Bank as my salary was less and for which they were not able to approve. Initially they had provided me feedback that they will approve the loan in two weeks. After a month they told they will not be able to approve due to the same reason.

I did not take the home loan from ICICI Bank as it did not come under the municipal limit and so that is the reason they had not approved me with loan. The response offered by the banks was good. Basically there are some limitation for this bank.

I had not taken the home loan from ICICI Bank at that point of time I was not looking for the property, I had initially decided to take the home loan but later the property did not turn up as I was looking out for. And so I had canceled the plan of taking the home loan.

I have taken my home loan from ICICI Bank. The response was very fast and excellent services offered by them. The loan was released the very next day. And I got a rate of interest of 9.9% and also 5K waiver on the processing fees.

I have a home loan with ICICI Bank before 14years and I didnÌ¢??t face any difficulty to complete the loan process.At the time of EMI payments it was really easy and smooth as well.The customer service behave really good towards the customer and I am attracted with the way they behave.The Interest rate offered was a floating rate and I felt its hard to pay when the rate fluctuates really high.

I am having the home loan with ICICI bank.It was the pre approved loan with them that was the first reason.The rate of interest is 9.90% and thats very okay for me.The partial payments are not applicable with on line features and thats the bad sign for them.

I have taken a home loan from ICICI bank with the interest rate of 9.9%. The disbursement was done within 15 days. Documentation was very easy. The service was given more than i excepted. For the loan approval amount of 7.5 lakhs the processing fee charged was Rs.15,000.I also recommended many of my colleague to take loan from ICICI bank.

it was a pleasure to deal with representatives.Response was up to the mark. patience and enthusiasm shown is great.technical team is really capable of dealing with problematic issues smoothly.no unnecessary paper work was needed .infact it was a pleasnt experience .thanks a lot ICICI BANK HOMELOAN TEAM.

I availed home loan from ICICI bank. I had a very bad experience in terms of home loan. Interest rate was 7.25% was normal. I feel that ICICI has to improve in all aspects. Apart from this they got to improve on customer service, processing fee, no transparency. I will not recommend any one to take home loan with ICICI.

The experience with ICICI bank during the process of my home loan was good as they disbursed the loan within 10 days. No much documents were required and they provided door step service. A single point of contact was allocated till the process was completed . Interest rate provided was least and the processing fees charged was Rs.6000 which was also very less. They are very prompt in response as once my extra amount was refunded as soon as i made them get noticed of it.

I am having the housing loan with ICICI bank for the last 3 years.Its very long process took around a month of time.They are just maintaining the dual policy like there is different in the rate of interest for old customer and new customer like new customer gets good offers.

I got the calls from ICICI bank.They done the good job with regular follow up.They provided the rate of interest as 11% thats fine.The tenure is around 6 years and they got the collateral documents for security purpose.The processing charges is little bit high with them.

ICICI Bank housing loan process is really good. I am very much satisfied with them its an on going loan. It is very smooth nothing specific about them. I am very much convinced with the rates. I did take home loan from ICICI bank a year back. As per the experience I had with ICICI, I feel that the customer service has to be improved. They should improve to guide the customers through out the process.And should learn how to keep up the service. Apart from this the customer service is good. The processing time was good and within 15 days my loan got disbursed.

I got the Home loan with ICICI bank.The documentation put me in tough level.They are not well versed with documentation.The rate of interest is 10.15% and that made me happy.Processing charge is very high around 15000Rs.They need to improve a lot.

I got this home loan from ICICI Bank as I got it transferred from my existing loan. A specific relationhship manager was assigned for my home loan and it was very professional. I was directed in every way also with what documents were needed. The fees were very low compared to other banks and the rate of interest was quiet reasonable too. It was around 9.85%. The bank took time for processing only because of the Government holidays which came in between.

I am an existing customer of ICICI bank. I took home loan from this bank. I had a very poor service from them. When I sent an email in enquiring of loan I got a very slow response. I got a response after 9 to 10 days. The executive whom the bank sent to me was not that knowledgeable. He was not aware of the process. I was treated as a stranger. Hence I feel that the executive should be more professional. They should aware of the process from start to end. Profession enough in terms of documentation. There should not be any hidden things. Also I feel that as I am an existing customer they should have atleast provided a good service and the processing fee can be waived off.

ICICI Bank housing loan process is fine. The rate of interest offered by them was very high which is 12% other banks are providing around 10.5% floating rate or otherwise 11% maximum. It was before 2 years back the RBI slashed the rates and I opted for rate switch for which I paid around rs 16000 the rate that was offered me to was 9.5%. After 6 months again there was a increase with respect to interest rate which is 12%.

I took home loan with ICICI bank. Customer service is very poor. I never got any information about the installment. they did not come to collect my cheque. Because of this the due date of Emi has exceeded. Later I went to the nearest branch and paid the Emi. So it would be much better if they respond properly.Apart from this I am okay with the interest rate and charges.

I have taken a home loan from ICICI bank and it has been 16 years completed. The process of the loan was very fast. Documentation part was easy and the charges were nominal. The customer support are quite informative and keep on updating on the new schemes.Still, i have not faced any issues with the bank regards my home loan.

I applied home loan with ICICI bank, I feel that the interest rate and processing fee is quite high compared to the other banks So It would be much better if they reduce the interest rate and processing as it would much helpful for other customers aswell.

I feel that the processing fee is higher so this has to be reduced. In terms of documentation they should have told me what are the document required. The communication should improve. I dint get calls from ICICI bank and the rate of interest that I was expected on that time around 9.5% .I would like to say at least ICICI can contact the customer and provide the response to them.In the same time SBI contacted me and I just went with them.

But they have debited Rs. 23750 from my account without my knowledge. I received the calls from ICICI bank about my home loan application.The rate of interest is same as like market rate and they responded to me very well.Unfortunately I dint finalized the property.They made the call very immediately and every part of their services are up to the mark.

Another main reason to quit from ICICI is because of my friends influence. More over the fees are on a higher side.

Fine experience with ICICI for my Home loan but the concern is the interest rate, as I was offered a Rate of Interest of 10.5%. At that time I wasn't ready to take the home loan that's why it could not process further. It would be best if the bank offers loans to less salaried persons also.

No problem with the ICICI bank but based on my eligibility I got high loan amount from the builderÌ¢??s tie up bank. Otherwise ICICI bank is good and they gave prompt reply. Rate is also like other banks but I did not check the processing charge for home loan.

It was quite before some months that I received the call from ICICI bank for my home loan.On that time the property was not finalized and there was the legal problem with that property.The customer service provided the full details regarding the loan process.

Five months ago I applied for home loan but I did not finalize the property so unable to proceed further. At present again I placed request and got approval for home loan. I got the calls from ICICI bank regarding home loan which I applied.They provided me with the rate of interest as 10.2% and am happy with that.,The customer service is really fine and nice to be queried and get resolved .They are having high value response.

For the amount of 30lakhs, ICICI bank just mentioned processing charge of 2000 and this is very good discount. ICICI bank kept their words and they sanctioned the amount that I asked for but unfortunately I unable to take home loan because I decided to stop the plan of loan.

I am satisfied with ICICI rather than HDFC LTD in terms of home loan. I got an instant follow up from the customer service. Interest rate and other charges applied are normal and less. Did not finalize the property when I got a call from ICICI executives from home loan and that is the reason to drop the plan. Mentioned charges were high. I was in the plan of taking the home loan before some months.Unfortunately my property was not finalized on that time.In the mean time ICICI bank executives approached me regarding the same and I asked the details like rate of interest , other details and am okay with that.I will use that for future purpose because I have the thought to deal with ICICI after I finalised my property.

Everywhere the rate of interest is similar so I did not find much difference in ICICI bank. My suggestion is that ICICI people need to understand customers requirement and should turn back to them immediately.

I got the calls from ICICI bank while I applied for the home loan.The rate of interest and everything is fine with them.They should ensure their follow up till the end.There is a lack of follow up because I dint receive any calls after I got the first call from them.Their customer service should be improved in all basis.

I availed a home loan with ICICI Bank and the process was very easy to get a loan.The loan was disbursed within a weeks time and I felt the customer service provided was average while getting this loan.The interest rate offered was around 13% which was a average rate offered.

I received the call from ICICI bank and the rate of interest was quite fine for me.They made the call at only one time after that they dint follow up.They need to improve the follow up of customer from end to end and the customer service should be educated.

ICICI people contacted me thrice for home loan and the rate of interest is down in the market. There was a delay in reaching customers. Due to some personal reasons, I have taken home loan in government bank so the deal got closed with ICICI bank. Would appreciate approach of ICICI bank.

Just I inquired the fee structure for home loan with ICICI bank at that time and I did not have requirement so postponed the plan of taking loan. Only concern is the rate of interest in ICICI bank on home loan so it should come down. I got calls from ICICI bank regarding my home loan application.The customer service is really good in all aspects like responding, resolving queries and all.In the mean time itself I got my loan already approved with India bulls so I just went with them.

Actually I had requested for plot loan but what I understand is that according to norms of ICICI bank they would not provide loan for plot. I got the call from ICICI bank for my home loan application .The rate of interest was quite okay for me and the response is also good from their end.But I just inquired about that for my future purpose.Anyway I have the thought of going up with them.

I got calls from ICICI bank for my home loan application but the rate of interest which is not suitable for me on that time.So I just postponed the plan to some extent.Their customer service and everything is fine with them and response is also too good.

Service was good and ICICI gave good support during home loan process. They just asked minimal documents and response was quick. I got offer of 10.10% interest rate. I got a call from ICICI bank with the rate of interest as 10.1% and that was good for me.At that time I dint finalized the property .I would like to go ahead with ICICI after I finalized the property because I can say they are providing good services.

I have matched interest rate with different banks but the rate is good in ICICI bank for home loan and they are giving loan for plot without lots of documents. It is easy way to avail loan in ICICI bank. Infact this is pre approved loan but still unable to take loan due to my personal reasons.

ICICI bank could reduce the rate of interest as for home loan it is bit high comparatively whereas rest of all seems to be good. It was really easy for me to get a home loan with ICICI Bank and the loan process was very simple as well.The customer service provided is really good and the charges offered was also less.The loan amount was disbursed within 15days and I feel the service was really fast.

I got a call from ICICI bank about my home loan.They provided the details like the rate of interest as 10% and am okay with that.In the mean time they told my cibil score is not matching their criteria so they rejected it.I would like to say that ICICI can have the cibil criteria to some extent rather than fully depending on it.

My experience with ICICI bank is of four years and on the same reason I applied for home loan. Executives gave all information and satisfied with that particular person. I dint received any calls from ICICI bank for my home loan.I expect the rate of interest would be around 14%.They have good approach in everything what I done previously with ICICI.They are delay in some process like documentation and that should be improved.

Recently I have taken a housing loan with ICICI Bank. The reason why I decided to take a housing loan with ICICI Bank is because I hold a salary account with them. I got the call with ICICI bank regarding my home loan which I applied.Everything went fine till they retrieve their processing charges and that was huge like 15,000Rs.I am happy with their service in every aspects irrespective of the processing charges.

I want to know the interest rate, charges and more information about home loan so applied with ICICI bank. Fact is that I actually yet to finalize the flat and would do this very soon and by sure come to ICICI bank. When I was inquiring the rate was 10.5% but now it dropped down to 9.9%, I guess.

Rate of interest is same as other bank but they approached me very late and they never contacted me again post one call. I matched charges with other banks for home loan but found that ICICI on higher side. ICICI need to reach the customer once they receives the request.

ICICI bank is good and glad to deal with them for home loan as response was fast. I actually havenÌ¢??t gone with them for loan because they approved only 45lakhs but my actual expectation was 50lakhs. I got shortage of 5lakhs so have taken loan in another bank by dropping plan with ICICI.

I got the call from ICICI bank regarding my home loan .They explained each and everything like rate of interest and other details.I am about to take up the loan with them and they asked me to ready with documents.But they dint came to collect the documents and all.I would like to say that the regular follow up should be done and customer approach practice should be improved.

I received the text message from ICICI bank regarding my home loan.The rate of interest was around 14% and that was okay for me.While compare with other banks like axis and all the rate interest was quite fine with them .Its the nice bank to be dealt.

I received calls from ICICI bank peoples with rate of interest as 10% around and its not bad for my home loan.They are having the good customer service and good response towards any queries.The reason why I didn't take the hom loan is I dint finalize the property yet.

I received the call from ICICI bank for my home with rate of interest as 10.15% that made me to go ahead with them.Unfortunately I just postponed that plan due to my personal reasons.While it comes to the part of customer service , response they are meant of them.

ICICI bank executives rang me regarding about the home loan and they provided the details like rate of interest as 15% and am okay with that.I dint finalize the property yet so only I asked them to hold the process for some time.Aspects other than my side everything is fine with them like customer service, response , follow up is good.

I took home loan from ICICI bank before 4 months. Interest rate is good one they offered me 10.25%. My friend suggested to take a home loan from ICICI Bank. The service provided by the bank is good. Initially there was some difficulty in the documentation part but later it got cleared.The total loan amount got transfered to my account within 20-25 days after the submission of the documents.

I had a very bad experience with ICIC bank while approaching for the home loan.The thing is that there were many people from the same apartment which i bought, had taken the loan. I taken an Home Loan for ICICI Bank . It is very fast for the processing the loan. My application got processed within 48 hours after the documents submission. The loan amount got transfered within 7 days to the account .Interest rate and processing feeds are nominal as other banks.

I have taken home loan from ICICI bank and very happy with the service. The were so fast that they processed the loan within 4 days after the documents submission. The ICICI bank Representative also worked during the deepvali holidays as they known that we are in the emergency. Rate of interest charges was 10.25% and it has also been reduced now. Processing fees was charges which was nominal.

I recommend that ICICI is best in services and cheaper also . They clarify all the point to the customer, i have a great experience with ICICI for processing the Home Loan and get the required Home loan with in a week because if ICICI did not process the loan before 28/04/2014 then i would have paid rs13500 to the DDA , I Am Thank full to ICICI Bank

Interest rate is similar to the market rate and I did not find much difference. I tried with different bank but they charged me in the beginning itself as service charge but ICICI bank executive clearly informed that they will not charge anything until & unless the loan is approved or denied. ICICI bank is good for home loan process.

I took housing loan with ICICI bank. Initially they were good, but I see that lot of charges applied by ICICI and the interest rate is also too high while compared to other banks. Definitely ICICI should work on it as I am not that much satisfied with ICICI. And they should improve in all other aspects aswell.

Disbursal was smooth but ICICI bank haven't provided the online kit yet as it is tough for me to track the details because now RBI has reduced the interest rate for home loan. As per the market rate ICICI bank gave the interest. There was no delay from the bank end however the delay from the builder made the application expire and I have re-applied though.

The home loan process was slow where the ICICI bank took time more than they committed to me initially. Other than the delay, rest of all were fine with ICICI bank and the interest rate is of floating. The pre closure and processing charges were nominal.

ICICI bank cooperated well and they delivered all the stuffs that I was actually looking for. Manager and all team members cooperated well in getting the home loan. While comparing to other banks interest rate is low but according to me it is bit high.

Absolutely satisfied with ICICI bank as my salary account is with them and got discount of 50% in processing charge. My earlier loan was with nationalized bank but while comparing to that I am getting amazing services from ICICI bank. Sales person came my place to collect all papers where it saved my time. The actual processing charge is of 0.5% for home loan but for me it is only of 0.25%. Really satisfied with the communication and got the loan for interest of 10.15% but now as per RBI guidelines now it dropped down.

I got it done the home loan for the lower interest rate and also got some discounts on processing charge as I paid only 6100. Satisfied with ICICI bank because customer support is very good and also easy to avail loan. Everything is fine from my side.

I have applied for loan 6 months back. They have raised so many queries for builder, for me. We have clarified to them on time but no communication received from bank. After 4 months bank deducted the 10000 for processing of loan without intimation to me. Later i was frustated & applied loan to SBI, they have processed my loan with in 20 Days & all the formalities closed.

I regret the day I choose ICICIBank Home loanspowered by Bank Bazaar. They seem to have some kind of beef towards Bank Bazaar customers and ensures royal screw at every opportunity. Be it, 1. Disbursal of cheque - multiple follow ups required to find out what my cheque status is.2. Wonderful technical team - who would work according to their own schedule with whims and fantasies.3. Unresponsive/Irresponsible managers: Actually, you would need to deal with their agents - their managers never communicate. Due to lack of space(it does not allow me to type further), I pause my review here. If I were to write my litany of woes, it would run pages.

I am holding a housing loan of ICICI Bank. Overall there is no issue or hassle there is no need for me to visit the Branch be it any work. I can get that fixed using phone banking or internet as they provide various modes to get in touch with them. I normally make the payment through online. The fore closure charges are 2% if I foreclose it . By default I am getting my certificate of interest to my mail id and by hard copy.

Since 2003 I have taken home loan in ICICI bank and in two years I pre closed it. They would have been charged something for pre closure but I did not notice it. The interest rate was around 9.5% when I started but it drastically increased to 15%. Customer service is not much appreciable. Committed things were fulfilled so happy on that.

In the start ICICI bank had contacted me on time but later post documentation process I did not receive calls and they made me to wait for three days thus went with other bank for home loan. ICICI is pretty fine in respect to interest rate and charges. Suggesting ICICI bank to contact customers as earlier without any delay.

Not really satisfied with the ICICI bank as response was not proper. This is balance transfer loan but documentation was not much good. The executive asked for paper that really not necessary and when I inquired the reason of the same, I did not get proper answer. Due to the issues that I said, it took two months to release the funds. Till now I havenÌ¢??t received welcome letter from ICICI bank in respect to home loan. No issues in interest rate as it is good.

I have salary account in ICICI bank and the home loan process was fast. Response that I got from the banks was quick. Mostly likely thing about ICICI bank is that the executive will never hesitate to answer customer queries. In respect to home loan the process was smooth. Fee structure are affordable where they provided as per the bank norms. Individuals of ICICI are very good and suggesting them to keep up the good work.

In respect to balance transfer loan the process was smooth and everything was done properly but when it comes to top up I am not satisfied. If I would have took the balance transfer and top up loan in the same time, would have saved interest rate and processing charge. After the process the executive informed that I could not take combine both in single time where the top up is available one post six months. Other than that ICICI bank done good job in respect to home loan but suggesting the executives to be more knowledgeable.

Really like the services of ICICI bank and they did good job in respect to home loan. Infact the home loan in under progress where need to receive the loan amount. Actually I have to clear some of the papers from my end and post which I would receive the amount. No that much happy in terms of processing charge because other banks are giving nil percentage where ICICI is charging something.

ICICI bank started well and they gave all kinds of information regarding the home loan. They were helpful in completing balance transfer loan but post documentation I had followed them to get the status of the application. I have not got the things that are promised by the bank initially. Actually I requested them to do balance transfer of three banks but they did it only for one bank. Interest rate of 10.2% is good deal.

ICICI bank is fairly good and I am existing customer for more than 15 years so much happy about their service. Interest rate 10.15% is common to other banks but the processing charge is slightly on higher side in respect to public sectors. ICICI bank is flexible in terms and conditions and they are not rigid. Document process was smooth but they have to reduce the processing charge for home loan.

Pleasant experience with ICICI bank and I got answers timely to my queries. Everything was transparent and without wasting time home loan got processed. ICICI have their own norms in interest rate where they are not negotiating the interest as per the RBI guidelines so suggesting the bank to negotiate immediately.

Good service from ICICI bank and even the interest rate is very good for home loan. In my case the offered interest rate is around 10.15%, which is of floating starting from first year. No amount been deducted for insurance. No clear idea about fore closure charge but it is nominal. On the whole the process was completed in two weeks of time.

It was a very good services offered by ICICI Bank for the home loan I took. The processing was quiet fast and also the customer service executive were helpful. Within 10 days my loan got disbursed. The best part is there was no processing fee charged for the loan. The documentation process was very smooth and it was only one time collection except for the few documents which was delayed by me.

This ICICI Bank housing loan was taken during the year 2005. Its basically an on going loan. The rate of interest offered by them was 7.75% fixed. The EMI is very much affordable . When ever I want I can get the statement of account online. Even if I visit the Branch they are ready to provide the statement at any point of time free of cost. They even come to my place if I am in need of their help.

My experience with ICICI Bank was disappointing for the home loan I have taken. It was a very bad services offered by the Bank and there was lot of confusion in the disbursement. The payments were not collected on time as there was some delay and was some interest was charged for it and the customer service executives was not responding well to my queries and they were not attending issues on time. Overall it was a mess and there is no proper response for even the existing customers.

For Home loan you can better prefer ICICI Bank because they are very fast in processing the it.They require a minimum amount of documents and I got my approval letter at the earlier stage itself.Coming to rate of interest they are little high because other banks they charge 10.1% but they they charged me 10.5%,fees and charges were also good.

Don't use home loan from icici bank they never reduce the home loan rate of interest and when you apply for the closer of home loan or shifting of home loan they will follow you since I have faced the same . SO AVOID ICICI BANK HOME LOAN. and one thing is fore sure if you take it you are going to give maximum rate of interest

The services were very prompt by ICICI Bank for the home loan I have taken. Initially there were some miscommunication happened between online team and bank but later got sorted out. The documentation process was very clear as all the information were explained very clearly. It would be nice if the time taken for verification of the property can be reduced as I feel it is taking much time for the executives from the Bank to visit the property physically which is delaying the process.

I have taken a home loan from ICICI Bank and the services provided by them was very good. The best part about the Bank is their fast processing and documentation. The customer service offered by them was good and also it was a good support provided by them. There was a timely update given on the application status and also their mobile app which is launched recently has got good features.

It was a good experience with ICICI Bank for the home loan I have taken. Their end point service is good and there is no regular follow up done as everytime I had to contact them and keep following them. The documentation process was not upto the mark as each and everytime they were demanding for new documents. There is no single points of contact as each time when I try reaching the executives I am being put to different executives. It would be nice if there is an dedicated executive alloted for each and every customers.

My experience was very worst with ICICI Bank for the home loan.My money has been deducted for insurance without prior intimation for which I was not interested for. I have applied for top up loan but still I havent received. In addition they charged me twice for the processing fees.

It was a good experience with ICICI Bank for the home loan. In the beginning there was a delay in the process as the agent who came to collect the documents was not that experienced. And there was also a change in the processing fee as the agent had collected extra charges for franklin for which there was no receipt provided by him.

My experience with ICICI Bank was really good for the home loan I have taken. The processing was really fast and documentation process was good as it got over within specified time. The services offered by ICICI Bank was good before the disbursement when compared to the service offered by them after the disbursement. The documents were collected from me on time but it took long time for them to provide the agreement papers.

Home loan process with ICICI bank was happened immediately and they were prompt in reverting. Service charges and processing charges are same to other banks. Pretty descent experience with ICICI bank. Starting of two years, the interest rate 10.1% is fixed and it will be floating in followed months. I got option for ten years of fixed but did not go for it.

It was a nice experience with ICICI Bank for the home loan I have taken. It took 20 days for my loan to get disbursed and I dont have to do anything as all the documentation process was taken care by the bank executive. I kept ready all the documents as told by him and he came and collected them on time.

Whatever the interest rate that mentioned at the initial stage for home loan that was not processed at the end of the day. At that period the offered interest rate was 12% which is floating for entire tenure. In respect to charge I did not find anything great in ICICI bank as generally other banks are providing the same.

I have taken a home loan from ICICI bank. The best part is that there was no processing fee and I had taken the loan on my spouse name. Before the documentation process the response was good but after the documents were collected there was no proper follow up and I had to contact them everyday. One drawback about the ICICI Bank is I get lot of calls in regards to credit cards, insurance which is very irritating.

I have experienced a bad process of credit card application from Kotak bank. They do not have any coordination among the staff. I got call from 3-4 executives for documents inspire of submitting it after 1st call. Then after approx 2 week I get a call again that they need document again as they had misplaced the earlier set. This is such a negligence shown by the bank. Secondly they offer me a card which is free for lifetime with credit limit of 200000. I got my card after a week of submitting document again. Now the limit I got was 50000 only and within a week without even using the card I get an invoice of 571 God knows for what. Wrong assurance just to sell your card will impact you very badly.

The process for applying for a LICHFL home loan is extremely simple. It will be better to shift the loan to some other bank like SBI or HDFC after 2 yrs to get a more competitive rate.I also feel that the charges associated with LICHFL home loans are very high. I was charged Rs. 10000 + GST for documentation, Rs. 500 + GST for CERSAI and Rs. 2000 for agreement between LICHFL and me. I would recommend LICHFL for the simple and user-friendly process. Dear All, Please Note that, if you take Housing loan with LIC the generally fix the rate of interest for first 2 years and after that when you actually move to floating ROI they increase it to based on agreement. Current ROI is decided based on LHPLR (which is 14.50%) minus x% (in my case its 2.75%), so after feb 15 (2 yrs later), they have increased it to 11.75%. Which is way too high. When I asked for reduction they asked for 1% + service tax as penalty and ROI will come down to 10.90% which is still high. So beaware as they are not bank, they are Housing finance company who does not operate with Base Rate.Thanks,Deepak

Unfortunately the PNB housing finance was unable to sanction the home loan for the particular location. Officers were straight forward in terms and conditions of the home loan. At the start they cleared whether they could process the loan or not and that I appreciate. Interest rate is reasonable.

Not that satisfied with PNB housing finance as they are supposed to follow but they failed to do that. Officer of PNB used to call me for several times and she was very good. Not satisfied with the document executive. Rate of interest 9.5% is good for home loan. Minimal in fee and charge.

I read a review on bank bazaar, on pnb Housing loan, and applied for my sister as well and as per the review said, truely amazing the loan got approved in just 5 days, and amazing rate of interest of just 9.95 fixed for 10yrs, very impressed, would recommend to everyone, thanks to bank bazaar i got to know about it

Got calls form PNB housing finance multiple times but due to high rate of interest I did not go with them for the home loan. I infact availed the loan at HDFC Limited as they offered me low rate than PNB housing finance. PNB has to go with the market in regards t the rate.

PNB housing finance is bit costlier than the other banks in rate of interest. Also they are not that aggressive in contacting the customers. Local executives are not that approachable. I have not submitted any documents to process the home loan. I had got only one call after that no response.

Lowest rate of interest in comparison to others. Nominal in processing charge. I infact dropped the plan as I relocated to different location. I am satisfied and if I have requirement for the home loan I try again with the PNB Housing Finance. They served me better.

Fee and charge is down than the private financial services. They are dealing better with the customers than any other banks. Second point is that the rate of interest is like other sectors. Good home loan rate. Basically the fee and charge is high for home loan. I am not a part of PNB housing finance but I am a customer of PNB bank. Overall the PNB is good. As the PNB financial service and bank can be linked together. I am overall happy with financial services.

One of colleagues has taken the home loan and he has very good experience with the PNB Housing Finance and he guided me. They have a very good relationship with the customers. PNB also very good bank in terms of Home loan. All the services are good. they are good in terms of communication part. They cleared my doubts an all. Initially they offered 9.75% but after the request they reduced it as 9.65%. Processing charges are reasonable only.

PNB Housing finance was excellent in their services. I have taken my home loan from them. They have supported and cooperated during each and every point of the loan process. I have taken my home loan from PNB housing finance. The services was good from them. The response was good. But the process for the loan was delayed. I got the loan within three weeks. The rate of interest was normal. The processing charges was also reasonable.

PNB Housing finance has offered 12 lakhs of the home and I feel it as very good than any other banks in the market. The home loan rate is about 17%, I believe. The loan procedures were simple and smooth. I could not recall most of the things as my father handled few things.

Within three days the PNB housing finance ltd sanction the home loan which was very early and on the demanding date of the builder they disburse the amount . They gave 9.70% interest rate which is fixed rate and the processing fee less of rs.7000.They approved more than 85% of the loan amount.

Though the interest rate is slightly high, the executive assigned to me reduced most of my work in processing the home loan. I just handled the documents and signed the papers. Once i applied for the home loan from PNB Housing finance the next day the representative came and collected the documents. Within six days the loan was sanctioned. Interest rate charged was 9.60% and processing fee was nearly Rs.10,000. Paper works were simple.

Before applying for the home loan the customer service was better but after an emi it is not up to the mark. Before starting everything was fine but now nobody is responding. Charge is normal at PNB Housing finance. If RBI reduce the rate they should apply it instantly to all the customers.

It was an average experience for my home loan with PNB housing finance. The services was good. But the response was average. The loan process took around two months. They also offered a average rate of interest. Likewise the processing charges was average too.

It was a good experience with PNB Housing finance. I have taken my home loan from them. The services was good. They collected the documents on time. The response was good. They processed the loan as well smoothly. The rate of interest was reasonable. The processing charges was a bit high.

I had a home loan with a private bank and i wanted to transfer the loan to PNB. I lost my piece of mind from day 1 of the processing. The worst thing is that I had to pay Rs.1200 for every day from oct 14 - jan 15 as penality to my previous bank due to the delay in service. PNB does help you in making you a full time beggar...
