With this home loan, Interest rate is not promised as what they had committed earlier, they were keep on changing up the interest rate and was not communicated too. They must value the existing customers of the bank, rather than where the new customer gets attractive interest rates. As they don't want to lose the customers, they are very responsive.

I applied for the housing loan with standard chartered bank i had a very disappointing service with this bank on the customer service there was no propers response from them and the customer service executives need to be educated more on the how to handle customers the overall banking service needs to be improved.

I tried to approach HDFC for home loan, they are very good as usual as I am holding an account with them, they were co-operative and they are approachable however in case of home loan I was not that comfortable with them the reason being I was not offered a home loan as it was for a mere residential land it would be have been if they revise their plans and try to offer a loan for residential land also.

I have a account with Standard Chartered Bank and am really happy to deal with them because they are mind blowing in terms of their customer service ,instant response and their online portal seems to be too good.I strongly recommand SCB to my friends and colleague.

bank: STATE BANK OF BIKANER AND JAIPUR
review: I got home loan with State bank of Bikaner and Jaipur because my builder have tie up with them. Interest rate is around 9.55% and the customer service is not much good, also they have taken much time to complete the process. I would like to suggest that they should have the single window clearance to resolve all issues.

bank: STATE BANK OF BIKANER AND JAIPUR
review: The experience of taking the home loan from State Bank of Bikaner and Jaipur was a nice experience. The process was completed as per my need. The rate of interest was very much affordable. It was of 9.65%. They took a month to complete the whole loan process. Documentation was also minimal. The processing charges was a bit high.

bank: STATE BANK OF BIKANER AND JAIPUR
review: The experience of taking the home loan from State Bank of Bikaner and Jaipur was a very satisfactory affair. The rate of interest offered was 9.55% which was quite affordable and the same as promised initially and was on a fixed rate basis. The processing fee was Rs.6k and their process was hassle free and quite good. I did not face any issues whatsoever till the disbursal.

bank: STATE BANK OF BIKANER AND JAIPUR
review: My hold loan is with State bank of Bikaner and Jaipur. It is a government sector back. The process was very long. It took almost four months. They offered a low rate of interest. It is was 8.25 % (floating). They did not charge a processing fee. The services are too slow from them. It was not satisfactory.

bank: STATE BANK OF BIKANER AND JAIPUR
review: State bank of Bikaner and Jaipur services is good in terms of home loan. I got a very good tenure period compared with other banks and even a good loan amount received. Interest rate is 10.25% with no processing fees. The relationship officer Mr.Shekawath was quite friendly and helpful. Overall I liked the services.

bank: STATE BANK OF BIKANER AND JAIPUR
review: State Bank of Bikaner & Jaipur Housing Loan : I went to the branch directly and i met the branch manager name Mr D K Malik who took the initiative and completing the whole process and the executives response was also good. The processing and the documentation was very simple. The whole process got completed with in twenty days.

Currently I have my home loan running with State Bank of Hyderabad and this was taken before 6 years. I would term my experience aS awesome, as the loan was processed too quick. I applied for it in the morning and got it by the evening. The interest rate offered was 9.25% and they did not charge me any processing fee as well which was excellent.

I have a home loan with State Bank of Hyderabad which I took 2 years back.They offered 10.25% interest rate on floating basis with no processing charges. The loan tenure is 20 years and I had a life insurance policy which they did not mention during discussion for which I had to pay Rs.20k. I faced some issue with their net banking for about 8 months and it was an average experience overall.

The service provided was quite average with State bank of Hyderabad related to the home loan process.They have taken around 6months to complete the process.They take much time on the verification and processing of the loan.In my home town there is a facility of using this bank only so that was the reason for taking the loan.

Taking a home loan from State Bank of Hyderabad is a hassle free experience. Being a government one the bank is very good and offers a nominal interest rate. It was within a week my loan got disbursed. I am happy with the loan process and would definitely suggest this bank to others.

I recently took a home loan from State Bank of Hyderabad and I am quite happy with the entire process. Customer care executives delayed in responding me. Whereas the interest rate was competitive in the bank. Loan disbursement was within a week and I got the amount I required.

State Bank of Hyderabad is taking a very less time to disburse to home loan .Rate of interest charged was 9.75% and there was no processing fee only documentation charges was there which was nominal. They required only simple documents for the process.

It was an quiet good experience with SBH Bank. They offered me an Home loan. I got loan approved within one or two days. Disbursement also they dint took much time it was within a week. I have taken it from SBH, last year only and they offered 9.8%interest rate.

Based on my salary account I approach SBH for an Home loan which was last 2 year ago. But the thing is they required lots of documents. Also I did not received response from Nellore branch so, I dropped my plan of taking loan from them. They should consider their account holders.

State bank of Hyderabad is giving 9.7% interest rate for the home loan on the reducing basic. The processing time they took to disburse the amount was four to five days after the documentation process. The branch manger came for the verification. The process was very smooth.

Actually this is a pre approved home loan and that is under progress. The rate is less than private bank. State Bank of Hyderabad has organized one stall at my company premises and there I visited the manger for the home loan. Than the private banks, public sectors has standard policies.

In the initial days of loan processing State Bank of Hyderabad took a long time to process the application. We reached the branch many times for documentation. They offered me floating interest rate foe home loan. I would suggest them to provide separate service desk over the phone.

Managers of this bank are amazing and they are very aggressive. We can directly call the managers on their mobile as they revert instantly. Though the rate comes down the State Bank of Hyderabad is charging the same rate as they are reducing that, which is my concern. Rate is 10.25% for home loan.

The rate of interest offered by SBH was quite exhortant the rate of interest was floating. I was not informed about the rate of interest in the first place. I am getting timely communication. It would be great the staff responds well. The staff is not good , their contact numbers were incorrect and I am unable to connect with them.

SBH was not ready to offer the housing loan as mine was a group home. As the length of the service was very less and they did not provide any service to me and they were willing to offer loan for the individual only. Interest rate offered by them was good and the processing fee was medium.

I have a home loan from State bank of Hyderabad. The builder organized everything. I did not have to do anything much. It was hassle free. The whole process took around 15 days. They have a certain policy where they release the money stage by stage. I was okay with that kind of payment.

My Home Loan was processed by State Bank of Hyderabad after 3 months I applied for the loan. Documentation was very complicated and took lot of time. Interest rate offered to me by State Bank of Hyderabad is slightly higher than Sate Bank of India. I would not recommend State Bank of Hyderabad for Home Loan.

My experience with SBH bank of not satisfactory as they kept on asking for the unnecessary documents every second day due to that they delayed the process for 30 days.; They never give the proper response towards the application status.Comparing with hdfc and sbi bank they are not cheapest in the charges.

I took a home loan from State bank of Hyderabad the process went to very smooth as the building owner already have the loan with the same bank.Interest rate offered was around 10.25% and the processing fee was Rs.16,000.

Interest rate offered for my home loan was 10% from the State bank of Hyderabad which was the best part and i like the most they not charged the processing fee for the loan amount. Documentation was very easy and we can get loan from them whenever we are in need. They complete the process in one month.

I got the home loan with the State Bank of Hyderabad.I took this before 4 years.The rate of interest was 9% as floating on that time.I paid around 20000 Rupees as EMI by initially and now I am paying around 7000 Rupees as EMI.Within 2 weeks of time I got the loan.The documentation was really fine with them and they asked the papers which are very necessary.I can say its very good.

The Services offered by State Bank of Hyderabad was awesome for the home loan .I had enjoyed a better service from this bank and it didnÌ¢??t take more than 5 days for the loan to get disbursed. The chief manager of the bank had come home and collected all the documents and I had to only sign the paper work. The best part about the bank is even the senior officials of the bank take good care of the customers.

SBH Housing loan process is fine. Within a span of 20 to 25 days of time I got the loan. Rate of interest offered by them was 10.5% processing fee charged by them was very less. It is an on going loan and I have got the title deeds of the property on time and its perfect in its own way.

State bank of Hyderabad provided the home loan for me with good rate of interest of 10.10% and am happy with the rate of interest .They provided me with good tenure time of 178 installments and still the relationship between me and bank is going good.Its fine banking.

I have taken a home loan from State Bank of Hyderabad and it was absolutely good. The customer service executive were transparent in all the details when compared with public banks and private banks requires only less documents. There are lot of documents to be submitted when it comes to home loan.

I am holding a housing loan with SBH. One of my friend named Prasad he is a Manager there through him I have taken this loan. Documentation process was very simple and easy. They took around 10 to 14 days of time to process the request. The interest rate offered by them was 10.25% and the processing fee charged by them was 5% of 25 lakhs which was around rs 8000.

State bank of hyderabad was very good when I applied one home loan from them with their affordable interest rate. Its like rural banking with quite good benefits . Compared with other banks they are offering very low interest rates. Documentation was quite same as other banks. Once documentation was cleared the loan will approved . I dont find any difference between nationalized banks and private banks

In 2004 I had availed a home loan from SBH. It was very easy for me to avail the loan as I was holding a salary account with SBH. I think there was a slight delay in documentation however they disbursed my loan within 10 days of time. They offered me an interest rate of 10.75%. It would be better if they respond very well to their customers.

I am a savings account holder of SBH for the past 13 years. I had availed a home loan in the year 2009. I had no difficulty in availing the loan because of my savings accounts. I had directly visited the branch and submitted my documents for a home loan. After 1 month of processing they disbursed my loan at a rate of interest around 9%.

I am currently waiting to find out the right property and I have everything ready from SBH on the loan part. I have submitted all the documents and they are ready to offer the loan at anytime. Their normal processing time is 10 days only. Rate of interest and the processing fees are very good. They are also giving more offers than private banks.

The processing fee and other miscellaenous charges were relatively too high with SBI with respect to my housing loan. On the other hand, the interest rate offered by them is the best in the market. SBI took around a month's time to provide the loan.

I wished to stay away from SBI after approching them for the housing loan. The reason being SBI promised a turn around time of 30 to 45 days to process my housing loan . However, I was in need of the loan urgently. It was at the same time HDFC ltd promised that they can process the loan within 15 days and I found the latter option impressive therefore I switched over.

From my perspective SBI charges less for stamp duty and their processing fee is pretty normal. The only pitfall was I was expecting the loan to be disbused from my nearest branch , due to some other internal reason they have trasnferred my loan to another branch which is far off from my place which I dont like it. I am yet to visit the branch if I happend to visit the branch then, it would be a difficult task for me.

SBI is very stringent when it comes to the bank norms especially when it comes to dcoumentation as they were very rigid and they were not flexible in terms of documentation. Post disbursement it is visa versa, a customer does not have pay any attention as everything would be taken care by SBI automatically. For example, applying of new rate when there is a fall in rate.

The whole process was on time with State bank of India. My home loan is from them. The services and response was also good all through the process. It was convenient and I did not face hassles. The rate of interest was of 9.45%. It was very much reasonable. The processing charges was also normal.

I could say that SBI needs an improvement in every way. They need to improve in their process, their response to the customers. I have taken my home loan from them and the process was very slow. There is no response either through mail or phone and I need to walk in to the branch for every single requirement and it would take two hours. I have already given the ECS but still I keep getting messages that the ECS is rejected. I got the information that my loan has been disbursed, but the funds got released to me after two months from the date I got that disbursement message. I had to pay the interest without getting the money. The only thing I felt good about the bank is they are more secure, because even the private banks are offering the same rate of interest like them.

Exemplary service offered by SBI on the home loan application. Everything was well scheduled. I need not have to wait for long time to get the things done.The service can be more appreciated if the query raised was addressed in an immediate manner.

SBI executives are not cordial to the customer.They are not understanding the situation and giving a proper solutions.They offer better rates compared with a private bank.Charges and other categorization are also good.They dont have a standard operation procedure and the executives does not have a sound knowledge about the products.

The home loan from State bank of India was a time consuming process. They took around two months to complete the process. The best was the rate of interest. It was of 9.45%. The processing charges was average. It would be better if there is an improvement in the services and a faster process would be better.

I had to face a number of challenges with SBI upon taking my housing loan with them.The thing that went wrong with SBI was the Branch. I was assigned a branch which is 60 kms away from my home branch. I had been asked to visit the branch a number of times and every time I visit the branch I had to pay rs 1000 excess. I was not assigned a relationship Manager in the first place. Over and above that, I dont have an access to online account. Every time, I had to drop the cheque and follow a traditional way of banking.

I have gone through a lot of trials and tribulations when I took the housing loan from SBI. The process started in the month of January and I got over in the month of June. It was heptic and there was a lot of delay. They kept asking for different set of documents time and again every time when I contact them. One good thing about them is the interest rate which was the best in the market.

Looks like the interest rate with the State bank of India is good for the housing and they have delayed for some time . They have told that they will charge pre-interest if they disburse the loan amount in the specified time period. Services and everything with the State bank of India is really good for me. I want them to stick with the process, so everything can be done immediately.

Experience was good with the State bank of India but the process was delayed for the housing loan , that was the only drawback. 9.45% was the interest rate and am happy with that, also the process is good with them. Disbursement got happens after three months of time only when I applied. I would like to suggest that they need to speed up the process.

Disbursement got happens after some time with the State bank of India and that was the only drawback. Interest rate was around 9.45% with the max gain offer. Processing charges were around 10000 Rupees with some taxes. I would like to suggest that State bank of India need to complete the process as fast as possible.

Follow up with the State bank of India for the housing loan was really good and the interest rate was around 9.45% but initially they have stated it was around 9.35%. Disbursal got happens after forty five days of time. Process is slow one with State bank of India, there they have to improve.

Dont be suprised, If I say that my housing loan was disbursed by SBI within 3 days. Infact SBI was able to process my housing loan with in 3 days. I guess the project was approved by the said bank also I was able to produce all the relevant documents within a span of 2 days. I never felt that I will get such a wonderful service from SBI and the credit goes to the Manager named Padmini.

I have taken my home loan from State bank of India. The bank can be recommendable for the rate of interest and charges they offer. But not for the process. They are very slow. They have taken two and half months to complete my loan process. The rate offered was around 9.45% and the charges was normal. They have not updated me any details as well through the process.

SBI was contradicting their own statement, Initially I was promised a zero processing fee for my housing loan, later in the due course once after my loan got finalized I was shocked to see a processing fee of rs 11500. When I inquired about the same I was told that it was because of Bank norms and the offer ( zero processing fee ) is no longer in existence. In fact I had applied for the loan well in advance just that the disbursement has taken some time.

The notable feature of SBI is the service with respect to home loan. The executives who came over were knowledgeable and they explained to me the details of the loan and also the list of the documents needed, which was helpful. The process was also completed on time and as per my requirement. The rate of interest was of 9.5%. The processing charges was a bit high. Good experience overall.

State bank of India has worked really good in terms of home loan.The process was easy and it was completed at the right time. The processing charges should made zero or a lesser fee. But they have charged around 15K which was way to high. The rate of interest was good. It was of 9.4%. Overall it was a smooth process for the home loan

I had initiated my Housing loan request in the month of December during the year 2014. In fact, I was trying to take over my balance that I had with IDBI to SBI. It took about 6 months of time for the process to get completed. I had also applied for a top up loan which was also not approved till date and it was kept on hold for no reason. Basically they are slow in processing the request.

State bank of India is really good and they have done all the process while it comes to home loan. Every time I have to proactively raise the queries and resolved. Property valuation and some other technical things are really works good. Still their process is lengthy, also they have provided max gain account which really brings down the burden of the customers.

SBI have provided the max gain account for my housing loan and that was the reason why I have chosen SBI. Customer service is good with them and I am pretty okay with this. They have done the disbursement at the earliest. Interest rate is very competitive amongst the nationalized and private sector banks.

I always prefer State Bank of India for any credit process and that made me to go ahead for the housing loan also. Interest rate is quite normal only for my housing loan. There was some issues with repayment schedule and that made the disbursal delayed to a a week of time. Processing charges were nil with them, I guess.

I would say SBI did not meet my expectation when it comes to housing loan. My requirement for my housing loan was around 25 lakhs however SBI was offering me around 18.5 lakhs only. Further they did not provide any other facilities on top of that therefore I dropped it.

The response was not that great when it comes to SBI housing loan. As I was getting a better response from HDFC LTD I decided to stay with them. It was me who had to follow with SBI rather than the bank contacting me. They are taking a lot of time to respond to the customer's need, good if they work on that . In short, I would say that they are not customer centric.

It has been a good experience with State bank of India. I have taken my home loan from them. But they have too much of documentation. The process s also pretty lengthy. I was happy with the rate of interest and charges. It was a rate of 9.55%. It would be better if the process is made more simpler.

SBI took almost a month's time to respond, otherwise I would say that their response is very poor with respect to home loan. However, when it comes to rates they have offered 0.5% lower than HDFC LTD. Probably because, I had approached them late, as when my process was about to get completed with HDFC LTD , HDFC LTD itself has lowered its rate. Nevertheless, SBI is one of the trusted banks which ONE CAN RELY on.

My home loan from SBI Bank has been a very lengthy process. It took almost two months for me to get my loan. They are very less in taking responsibility. Every time I had to call and check. They also not goo at timings. They fix a time for appointment and not maintain it. At the time of giving me the cheque. They gave it through a third party agency. I had scheduled an appointment with the other bank as I was transferring my loan to give them the cheque. The third party took more than three hours which made me reschedule the appointment only because of the delay. The rate of interest was of 9.4%. The processing charges was high as well, as I had to see to the MOD charges which is normally applicable by the bank. They have also not deducted the EMI yet. When I contact the customer care they asked me to contact the bank. When I contact the bank, no one responds back.

The first and the best part about SBI housing loan is the partial payment option. It was not a heptic process. The charges are very minimal and it is very transparent. They informed about the set of documents in the initial phase itself. I have got the cheapest deal in the market when compared with other nationalized bank . More than all, I have taken the loan with NIL or ZERO processing fee which I admire the most in them.

I had faced some sort of hassle whilst my home loan was processed with SBI. They took around three months of time to process my loan though I submitted my documents within two days at the initial process. The rate of interest was not a big difference when compared with other banks. I got a rate of 9.4%. The processing charges was average too. Though I have asked them to take the insurance on a monthly basis along with my EMI as the deduction is also happening. I still keep receiving messages that I have not paid for the insurance. The bank is also pretty far from my place to keep visiting it often.

My recent experience of applying for a home loan with SBI is good, as their service is good overall. But, the process could be completed more quicker if keep the list of documents required at the initial stage so the customer arranges for the same and submits it than to ask for each document during the process which causes delay. The rate of interest was the best. It was around 9.4%. The processing charges was normal, but it could have been more transparent in the beginning instead of giving last minute surprises.

SBI took some time to disburse the home loan and that's the major drawback and the interest rate is fine for me and there were absolutely no issues on that. Customer service of State bank of India needs to improve. Processing charges were nil for me because of some offers but they have charged something for legal purpose too.

I got a good offer on the rate of interest and processing charges from State bank of India for my home loan. The rate was of 9.45% and the charges was waived off as per the scheme I went in for. The bank needs improvement on their customer services. As they are still doing things manually and a customer has to be present physically at the bank. They are in to a lot of paper work. It took them around 20 days to complete my loan. SBI is great in providing good rates. Need to improve in process and manual interventions

I choose State bank of India to get the housing loan because the interest rate is lesser one. Customer service of State of India really works very good. The loan amount got successfully disbursed within ten days of time, also the processing charges were debited from my loan account , finally it got credited back to my account after long follow up. I feel really good with State bank of India.

My home loan is from State Bank of India. The process has not been satisfactory as the agents were not proactive in finishing the process though I had been following up with them constantly. I would wish to recommend this bank only for the rate of interest. It was of 9.4% and the other benefits with regards to the part payment options. The processing charges was also higher when compared to other banks.

SBI has actually deviated from its time scales. Processing is a bit lengthy when compared with other banks. As other banks are taking much lesser time to process the housing loan. One good facility which I like the most with SBI, was the MAX GAIN option which is very much useful to the customers.

The process was very smooth with SBI Bank. I have taken my home loan from them. They helped me through every step. The only issue I had with them was about the processing charges. They promised me that it would be a zero processing fee. But finally they charged me for it. The rate of interest was of 9.45%.

State bank of India has attractive interest rates on their home loan. But the time taken for the process is too lengthy. They took more than one and half month to complete the process and I had to behind the manager to complete it on time. The rate of interest was of 9.35% as there was a discount on the rate being a woman. There were no discounts on my processing charges.

Ideally speaking, SBI should have processed my housing loan within 7 days, but SBI has actually delayed in processing my loan. The agent who was dealing with me was not very clear about the rules and regulations. They came up with different things every time when I contacted them. Eventually, when I reached the branch directly I got a very good response, it was that at time the bank officer confirmed that the loan could have been processed with in 7 days.

SBI was very quick in responding whenever any query was raised. I had a requirement of 28 lakhs and the same amount was approved. The rate of interest was of 9.40% for the tenure of 25 years. The processing charges was also normal.. The services and the response provided by them was good.

Unlike, other banks SBI did not ask for more documents it had asked for very minimal documents. SBI has offered the cheapest interest rate in the market and even the legal documents which was required by SBI was prefect. Also the calculation part what they have provided is very simple there is no hidden cost and I did not face any challenges with the EMI calculation.

My home loan was successfuly disbursed by SBI, I am happy with the services they provide throughout the loan process. Everything was on time and I also got the loan amount that I required. The rate of interest was a affordable rate. I got a rate of 9.45%. The processing charges was normal for me too.

SBI was so flexible, as they were able to process my housing loan based on my requirement . It was a very good experience with them. The rate of interest was of 9.45%. It am very much comfortable with the rate. The processing charges was also normal and reasonable to me.

My home loan was with SBI . The services offered by SBI was very good. Their process needs to be appreciated, as it is completed on time and it was without any difficulty. The rate of interest charged was around 9.36%. The processing charges was very much affordable and reasonable.

Experience of using this site is wonderful. Got very good information regarding loan etc. But response of the loan provider is very slow. Instant chat of the bank representatives would have been much better option if it is provided. Any how over all experience is good

The reason why I had chosen State bank of India. was there are lot of branches in Kerala. Rate of Interest offered by State bank of India is very reasonable when compared with other banks. Bank executives gave the accurate information. The best part of State bank was the loan approval which was done very fast within one month.

Its a lengthy process from SBI Bank in case of home loan application.The list of documents required was also more from the bank end.The payment date applied was good.I would suggest in case of emergency customer need to proceed with a private bank instead of moving with government concern.

The approach of the customer executives from SBI home loan process was quite good.They take a weeks time for responding on the application being submitted.In case of balance transfer made they take around 5500Rs for the home loan process as charges.

SBI Bank was not sure about the documents required for processing the loan.It took long time for them to give a update about the same.They are promoting their other products through the loan call and trying to sell them.This experience may not recommended to future customer.

The loan process was long in initial stage but later it was completed.They took time for the documentation.The rates applied was really common and the service provided was also recommended to future customer.It will be good if SBI work on the documentation based on home loan.

SBI took a very long time to complete the documentation procedure, when it comes to the home loan process.The rates and charges applied was quite basic with the bank. I would suggest it, will be really good if they work on the customer support and time taken for completing their process.

The lending rates offered by SBI is 9.4% , it is the interest rate offered for the home loan with the State bank of India and it took around three months of time for the loan amount to get disbursed. Processing charges were nil with them and the customer service is all right, also they were not clear with the documentation process.

I choose State bank of India to get the housing loan because its the leading nationalized bank. The interest rate is around 9.70% and the customer service is an average one. The loan amount got disbursed to my account within a day of time. I want the executives of bank need to take care of the customer in the keen manner.

I FILED AN APPLICATION IN BEGINNING OF FEBRUARY 2015 AND THE LOAN GOT DISBURSED IN END OF APRIL 2015. MOREOVER, THESE PEOPLE FORCED US TO TAKE A SBI HOME LOAN PROTECTION INSURANCE THOUGH IT WAS NOT MANDATORY. VERY RUDE AND UNINFORMED STAFF. THEY SAID THEY WOULD DISBURSE THE LOAN IN 15 DAYS FROM THE DATE OF APPLICATION AND DELAYED THE PROCESS WITHOUT ANY REASON.

SBI bank took long time to disburse home loan. I registered in Jan 2015 but they initiated in Feb 2015 and in month of May 2015 they disbursed the amount which was too long process. The only advantage is that the interest rate is good with them. They should decide the time line for the initiating the process and complete it within a short span of time so that it will be good.

SBI, was in need of less paper works and the list related to the documents where asked in the initial stage itself.The repayment procedure followed was also very simple.Its quite difficult to contact their executives, I would suggest them to work on it so that it, would be easy for the customers to get in touch with the bank.

9.5% is the interest rate as of now for my housing loan with State bank of India and the customer service is best one with them. I can say that they are not charging anything as hidden. I can say that they are very transparent. Processing charges are nominal one with them.

Pre - submission the process was well organized, as the representative took care of entire the process it was good until the disbursement of the home loan, post-submission there was no response from them for that same purpose I had to visit the bank. I would say that the executive must coordinate with the customers till the process gets completed. In terms of the interest rate and other charges SBI is the best.

A speical thanks to SBI executives as very much co operative. Within 20 days the entire process was completed and the home loan amount was disbursed. Interest rate charged was 9.4%and the processing fee was 0%. Documentation process was little hassle which can be made flexible so that it would be good.

SBI bank home loan process was very smooth. Documentation and verification process was hassle free.Only once I visited the bank to get the final disbursement. Entire process was completed within one week. After the papers completion the amount was disbursed next day. Interest rate charged was 9.4% which is little high compared with the banks but the other charges were quite reasonable

Begin the nationalized bank they made to visit the bank for all the process of home loan there was not even one point of contact. We have to approach different people for the formalists and I have to visit the bank twice to complete one work. The reason I choose them for home loan because they have lesser interest rate .It would be good if SBI bank have start having a smart people.

Overall process was good with SBI bank but disbursement was not as per my expectation as they took around three weeks to release the payment for the home loan as the staffs were taking there own time to verify the document and complete the formalities. During the approval they offered 9.4% interest rate but later there was a decrease in the rate as per th RBI rule but it has not been reflected but the processing fee was great.

The overall home loan process was good with SBI.I There is no hurdles in the loan steps happened.The list of documents which the bank require from the customer can be much clear in the initial stage itself.Customer need not visit them twice if they give all information at one time.

Executives of SBI does not have the required information handy nor they were not very clear in delivering the information. On the other hand, within a week's time the home loan was disbursed after giving all the documents which was quite fast.Paper works are very fast. It would be great if they have a back up team to take care of the process so that the customer can avoid visiting the bank frequently.

It was a good experience with SBI related to the home loan process.The process was done beyond customer expectation. The process was very fast especially the documentation was done in a very clear manner.Now the system have changed because previously customer need to wait for long time.

The time taken to complete the home loan process with SBI was very long .Customer needs to visit them for document submission.They dont have executives for collecting documents from customer end.The support offered from customer care can be modified.

The experience was nice with SBI bank since I was having all documents in hand for the home loan process.They have taken long time for the response.The rate applied was around 9.85% for the home loan.They have taken some processing fee added with other cost as well which was on the higher side

It was a not a good experience with SBI Bank related to the home loan process.The process got delayed and they are making too much of follow up on the application being submitted.I would suggest it will be good if the speed up with the process and try to complete the loan like other bank timing.

It was very good experience with SBI bank related to the home loan process.The response time taken was delayed from the bank end.They have taken around 1.5months time to complete the loan process from SBI Bank.The support offered to the customer was quite good.

With in a span of 2 months SBI managed to provide home loan . During the disbursement there was some issue but it was not a deal. Rate of interest charged was 9.50% and the processing fee was 0%. Documentation and verification process was simple.

I was often calling SBI to get the status of the application. In terms of the home loan process if we visit the private banks the process will be smooth but it makes much time with SBI bank as they follow all the process which is skipped by the private banks. With regards to the interest rate SBI is best.

My home loan application with SBI Bank have not processed through.It takes long time for their process to be completed.There is no clear communication between their employees itself.In any case customer executives will be able to get the idea about the app from ref# but here they are not able to give the information after ref# have been provided.

Shortly , I will be changing banks, as I am dissatified with the service offered by SBI for my home loan. The executive of the bank are not professional and they dont have the knowledge about the process because of there un professionalism I have to submit the documents in spite of having a pre approved loan. Myself and my husband ran behind the bank to get the amount also I did not get proper feedback.

Initial response with SBI bank was good during the process of home loan. They sanctioned the loan very fast and the partial disbursement was done very quickly but when I went for the full disbursement the people in the organization did not guide me properly because of which I have to visit many people. It would be great if they have single window transactions.

I applied for the home loan in February but got the disbursement in April 2015 through SBI cap security which is the substitute of SBI bank because of which we have to visit the regional bank office very time. During approving the loan they offered 0% processing fee but while disbursement process they charged processing fee which is not accepted.

It was a good experience with SBI related to the home loan process.I felt the process was quite slow with them.The rate applied was better compared with other bank service.They have taken more than a month time for the processing this home loan from SBI end.

Luckily, SBI has offered the lowest interest rate for me. The rate was of 9.5%. The processing charges were waived off. But the only drawback is that for every thing I need to visit the bank. For a document submission or anything else. They do not have convenient timings too. I need to take off from my work to complete the bank work. The process for the loan took around 20 days.

The process took some time related to the home loan completion with SBI Bank.The confirming authority was not polite to the customer.They were forcing customer to get the Insurance related to the loan product.The charges applied in the home loan was also high.

In other banks the loan will be approved within 10days but here they are taking around 25days time for approval.Compared with other banks the rate offered was less with SBI Bank.They also have provided the options of prepayment in customer flexibility.

It was a long process with SBI Bank related to the home loan application being submitted.They are not transparent with the customer in case of the loan process.They require new documents each time.Cross selling of Insurance was also handled in the home loan process.

Rate of interest was around 9.45% for the home loan with the State bank of India. Processing charges were applicable and the documentation procedures were not transparent with them. There are no follow up with them, also I really can say that they need to be more transparent to the customers.

The overall home loan process with SBI was good. The rate of interest was 9.5% initially and later changed to 9.4% which was really good. I however felt they had some communication gap or co-ordination issues between their document collection and screening departments. The documents were collected on time and though I was told no processing fee later I was told it would amount to approximately Rs.11k . As I hardly had time to pay the amount to the builder I did not take that up.

It was an average experience with SBI Bank for the home loan as there was lack of clarity. They made me run around at the last minute for documents and I also had to make payments as per the process. There was not much of sufficient information on time. The rate of interest was of 9%. The processing charges was waived off.

Once I registered for the home loan online I got the called from the SBI cab securities were the executives were not knowledgeable about the process because of which the disbursement took around four months. Other than that the executive of the SBI direct bank were very good and supported for the process. Rate of interest was the less compared to the market and the processing fee was 0%.

I have taken my home loan from SBI Bank.The bank is good overall. But I would not say that the services was very amazing from the executive. However he helped me a lot in the process like the document collection. The rate of interest was good. It was of 9.5%. I was told that it would be a zero processing fee if the process was completed on time and that I would be charged if the process was delayed. Finally I got charged for around 11K.

SBI bank home loan process is very fast but I delayed to take the loan because they were not approving the required loan amount but later they sanctioned the needed amount. Maximum tenure period offered was 30 years. Rate of interest charged was 9.45% and the processing fee was Rs.12,000. Being the nationalized bank they have the simple paper work.

The initial approval was done in about 2 weeks during my home loan process with SBI. The executive was quite supportive and the documentation was hassle free. The disbursement was slightly delayed on my end as I took some time to collect the cheque around April end. The interest rate quoted was 9.5% but came to 9.4% after the recent revision. The processing fee was waived off and I paid Rs.3.5k for legal charges. The first set of disbursement took a complete day due to technical issues and although I wanted Rs.20Lakhs I applied for Rs.22 Lakhs to be on the safer side & it got approved.

SBI bank is good to avail the home loan but the only issue is that they do not give the clear information as we have to visit the bank for any queries. They should be more customer oriented than bank oriented. Processing time and interest rate is good. No guarantor required for the loan process

At that time State bank of India was lesser one while compare with other banks, also they have provided around 90% of the cost of the property as principal. Customer service is nice one for me and the executive from the State bank of India helped me a lot to get this process to be done. The loan amount got disbursed to my account within a month of time because of some documentation issues.

The home loan process with SBI can be termed as fair enough and though there was a slight back and forth delay that happened, I would not hold it against them. They took about 3-4 weeks to process it. The interest rate is 9.55% and the processing fee was waived off. They did charge Rs.4k for the legal formalities and verification. The response from the agent in terms of sanction of loan was good and timely. I got 90% of the loan disbursed in April. However I assumed that typically a loan account would be opened and I can track it but there is no response apart from mail responses. The communication is a challenge.

It was not a very satisfactory experience with SBI Bank. I have taken my home loan from them. I only preferred the rate of interest of the bank. Initially it was of 9.55% (floating). Currently it is of 9.35%. I do not understand why they had to double up the processing charges. I ended up paying about 35k. The services and response has not been professional and not customer friendly. They feel they are like God to customers. The process was lengthy too. It took around 20 days.

State Bank of India is a good choice for a home loan given their trustworthiness and stature in the home loan market. The interest rate was 9.5% floating rate for 20 years. The overall process took around 1.5 months which was normal as there were small delays in documentation as well as I was out of station for a week so could not collect the cheque. Its joint loan with my father. Initially the processing fee was not mentioned but later we were informed it was Rs.11k.

It was a easy process with SBI Bank for the home loan. The services are good. They been responsive too through the process. It was completed on time and I did not face any hassles. The rate of interest was of 9.55%. It was high when compared with other banks. The processing charges was high too. Overall good.

My experience was commendable with SBI . Since the project was already approved by SBI. I did not face any kind of hassles. It was completed within 15 days. The rate of interest was of 9.55%. The processing charges were normal as well. Overall it was pretty satisfactory.

I had applied twice with SBI Bank for a home loan. The first time the application got cancelled as it crossed the validity period. In the first instance I was informed for a rate of interest of 9.55%. I was also charged a processing fee of 6500. The loan amount was of 40 lakhs. The second time I applied I got a rate of interest of 9.35%. But the charges was much. I was charged 11500 initially and later I had charges for 1st Legal and second legal fee and many more charges as well. I was charged totally on both the instances a fee of 35K in total. After I submitted the documents the second time, it took two months to complete the process. I got the loan amount on the limitation scheme of 33 lakhs. After that additionally they gave me a flexi term plan and I was finally given 39 lakhs. On the flexi term plan I would pay only the interest for the first three years. After which the EMI amount would be increased and I would be paying the principal and interest for the following three years.

Interest rate for the housing loan with State bank of India was around 9.5%, which was floating one. The loan amount got disbursed to my account within 1.5 months of time. Customer service and everything was good with them and the documentation process was good one with them.

The lending rate for my housing loan was around 9.45% and the customer service was fine with the State bank of India. SBI disbursed the loan amount to my account within 1.5 months of time . They are very good in providing response and the processing charges were around 9000 Rupees.

SBI bank is ethical banking without any hidden charges but the process is lengthy. I had to visit the bank to complete the formalities. I preferred to go with them they are giving less interest rate and processing fee for the home loan and also stick on there commitment. If we miss the due date there they will give one month grace period.

I truely recommend the services of SBI because of their low rate of interest they offer and for their process. Until a customers documentation is good and until the builders authentication is positive they do not provide the loan. The rate of interest was of 9.25% on a flexible basis. The processing charges were very minimal.

After the land survey was completed with SBI the loan was disbursed within a week's time. Even they collected minimal documents as per the bank norms for processing the loan. State Bank of India executives are very prompt in providing loans in a short time.

SBI Bank has good rates on their home loan products. I applied for a loan from them. They made me come to the bank so many times to submit various documents. The process went on for 25 days and finally my loan was not approved by the bank. They do not have much of a processing fee, but they have the stamp duty fees. It has not been a satisfactory experience with the bank.

SBI taking very long process time, if you are clear from all due then also you need 2 months from loan apply to disbursement. They are not giving reply about status.Lots of call and follow up needed.Processing staff are not well, disbursement staff is co-operative.Their agents and SBI team leader are not clear about documents requirements.If you need small loan then take from private bank.

9.35% as the rate of interest for my housing loan with the State bank of India. Response is okay with them because they are government subsidy like I have to approach them. Documentation process is good and the processing charges were very nominal with the State Bank of India.

Unlike other banks where other banks does not follow RBI guidelines. Where as SBI is line with RBI guidelines. I have taken my home loan from SBI bank. The services has been excellent. They been responsive all through the process. They gave me a good offer. The rate of interest was of 10.4% on a floating basis. The processing charges was waived off too. The best about the bank is when ever RBI changes the rule, it reflects immediately in the bank.

I entered in to contract with the builder, as I had applied for a home loan with State Bank of India. Being a public sector bank, the process is time consuming but apart from that it is the best one in the market and it is very much recommendable. They offered me an interest rate of 10.15% with a nominal processing fee. It was easy documentation as the builder mediates at every stage.The overall process took around 2 months.

State Bank of India was my choice for home loan since they are very transparent and do not have any hidden charges or clause. The interest rate offered was 9.5% on a floating basis. The loan follows the fixed rate till 3 years and then shifts to floating. The processing fee is 0.25% which is very nominal and the only drawback is that the processing takes almost 2-3 weeks. I took a loan of Rs.25Lakhs for a new property. They top their class when it comes to rates.

State bank of India took around 3 months to process my home loan application. As I feel secure in taking the loan with nationalised bank, I waited patiently during the processing. But it would be nice, if they reduce the turn around time in processing the home loan.

Highly secured to transact with SBI, as they are to the point therefore, I had taken my home loan from State Bank of India in the year 2007. The loan tenure is for 20 years and they had provided 80% of the funding. The interest rate given was a competitive one as which was 12% on a floating basis. It took about a month roughly for the loan to get processed including the documentation and verification process.

I do have housing loan with State Bank of India and the interest rate is good with them. I can say that they have charged me around 9.5% as floating interest rate. The loan amount got disbursed within ten days of time and they have made the single shot payment to the builder. Documentation process was quite good with State Bank of India.

The SBI would be the best option for home loans ... they follow each and every process.. legal verification, techincal verification by visiting to your property and submit a copy of the same to buyer for future reference. the response from the bank would be quick and satisfactory... the rate of interest would be best among the other competitors..

Overall the service rendered by SBI bank is really good for the housing loan. The response is good. The only drawback is there is no online application. I had to go over to the bank and submit my documents. I have taken a home loan and it has been a good experience. They offered a very reasonable rate and the processing charges were normal.

My feedback for SBI home loan would be good expect for the formalities. I have taken my home loan from them. The process was delayed because of their extraordinary formalities. But I am happy as they offered me the loan amount I was needing of 28 lakhs. They also reduced the rate of interest from 9.6% to 9.30%. The processing charges was normal too.

It was few years back I took a home loan from State bank of India. The bank is overall good and the process of getting loan from them is quite lengthy, as I got the loan disbursed after 10 days. But the documentation process was done properly and the staffs of the bank answered my queries well.

I have to change my review after I actually experienced the unprofessional and lazy approach of the bank during the reimbursements. The customer care takes the request, but the bank closes it without resolving the issue providing a phone number that does not exist. You cannot call them. You need to walk in to the bank for every small thing and the Manager talks as if he is your boss. They also don't read the forms completely. The disbursement processes are incompletely executed.

Good process and immediate response would be the two best words by which I could describe my experience in taking a home loan from State Bank of India. The bank asked me for only less documents and it was a floating rate of 10% rate informed to me.

My home loan is from SBI Bank. The services was average. The response is average. The process was completed in four days. The provided a good offer. The rate of interest is good. The processing charges were very nominal and reasonable. The best of all, they have provided a over draft facility. What ever extra is paid I can withdraw it.

I am using this bank service for quite some time now.I have taken a Home loan with SBI Bank.The customer service provided was average and they have taken more than a month's time to process the loan process.Charges applied was around 0.5% as the processing fee.

I do have the home loan with the State bank of India and interest rate was around 11% on that time. Processing charges were average with them. I expect them that they need to assist the customers in pro active manner. The loan amount got disbursed within couple of months.

I have also taken a home loan with SBI and I am happy with the service provided.They have not applied any additional charges in the loan process.They have taken around a weeks time to complete the process.The rate offered was around 9% in the year 2004-2005

Customer care service should be smart enough to address the relevant queries. If not have sufficient information then need to take more time and then respond. Need not waste time of customer. I would appreciate if they are going to provide adequate options.

Interest rate was nominal in State Bank of India when I took a home loan from them. It took almost 10-15 days to get my loan . I found that there were lot of formalities involved while taking a loan from them. The overall process was not so simple.

They are good they make a follow up to the customer related to the home loan application.They are taking around 4-5days max related to the home loan .Most of the documents they track from the customer database itself.They dont apply less charges for processing and no charges for preclosure.I feel SBI Bank is approachable related to the home loan process.

I have taken my home loan form SBI Bank. The services are average. The response was average too. It took almost two months for them to process the loan. But once it was sanctioned I got the funds fast. They offered a reasonable rate of interest. It was of 9.5%. And the processing fees was low too.

I approached the SBI bank for the home loan. I visited the place with all the required documents but the processing time is more than one month. We have to follow them till process get the completed. Interest rate charged was best in the market. I was not charged any processing fee.

I had availed a Home loan from State Bank of India. The interest rate offered was 9.5% with no processing fee. The documentation was tedious but it gets approved and disbursed in 3-4 days as in my case if you have all the documents in place. It was a smooth and easy process.

I have taken a home loan from State Bank of India around 2-3 years back. The processing and documentation was pretty easy and smooth since my salary account is with them. The rate of interest offered was 9.5% with a processing fee of Rs.12,000. The processing including disbursal took about a month.

I do have the housing loan with the State Bank of India and the interest rate is very good with them. Response is an average one with them because they might belongs to government subsidy. The loan amount got disbursed within a month of time.

I have heard State Bank of India has a name for notoriety in their processing and clearance when it comes to any transactions. However I personally had a wonderful experience taking a max gain home loan. I got an interest rate of 9.55% and a processing fee of Rs.25,000. They have a current account associated with the loan and the interest is charged on the remaining amount which is very beneficial.

My home experience with sbi bank is very good. It has been more than five years i have not charged any hidden charges. During the processing the loan there was no proper response with regards to the query raised. The interest rate is good in terms of fixed or floating rate.

I took a home loan from SBI bank three to four years back. I had taken it to purchase a property in Hyderabad through the builder tie up. The processing and documentation was smooth and minimal. The customer service was very good and the executives were responsive. I was offered an interest rate of 10.5%.

I have a home loan with SBI bank. The interest rates offered were very competitive and I feel I did get the best deal. Customer service, follow ups and the overall experience was very nice. The only challenge I faced was the documentation process which did take some time.

They are not responding in a timely manner.Customer have to visit the bank for each update.They are taking around 2months time to complete the loan process.The rate offered was quite less compared with HDFC LTD.I may not recommend the service to others.

Experience with sbi bank was not good for the home loan. They processing is very TDS.Many agents are available those who need commission for the loan process . We are not able to deal with the bank directly . Without getting the approval for the loan i lost Rs.15,000. But they have good interest rate.

I am completely amazed by the processing of home loans by SBI as it was too smooth. I had applied from their mall branch and was running short of time in buying the property. I had filled up their forms on a Sunday and all formalities and necessary attestations were done immediately with a rate of interest of 9.5%. Follow up issues were sorted out perfectly in time as well.

The service provided was not good with SBI Bank regarding the home loan process.They don't know what is the process of the loan.The person who interacted was a branch staff but not having proper information.More documentation in the process.They took three months time to complete the overall process.

It was good experience with SBI related to the home loan process.The rate offered was high compare with the other banks .The rate offered was around 9.55% here with SBI Bank.The charges applied was high.I felt they have applied different charges then what was promised so I felt hidden charges are here.

SBI helped me for my home loan. Interest rate offered by the bank was 9.50%. The bank required more papers to process the loan but it all went smoothly. The representatives supported me and followed me well. The bank was also ready to offer the amount I asked for.

Positive comment about SBI is their interest rate for the home loan. It took a bit long time to get the amount but that is manageable. SBI provides a very good rate and processing charge. Suggestion for SBI, they can reduce the sanctioning time.

Very good rate of interest as the figure is 10.5%. Processing charge is high and they got completely around 20 to 30 thousand. The expected and requested amount been sanctioned to me four years ago. 20th is the emi date for this home loan. I am fine with SBI.

My home loan is from SBI Bank. The services are good from them. The response is good. The whole process was very smooth. It was pretty quick from them. They also offered a good rate of interest and a good processing charges. Overall it has been satisfactory.

SBI bank has been very good in their services. The response is good. I have taken my home loan from them. They provided a loan as per my requirements. The tenure was as per my need. The rate of interest was very reasonable. And the processing charges was waived off. The whole process took just 20 days.

I have applied for a home loan but it was not processed through SBI Bank.The process is lengthy and they are requirement more documents for the process.Taking long time to process the home loan.The rate were similar like other bank with SBI Bank.

SBI bank is good in terms of home loan. Actually their rate of interest part is very attractive. The thing is their procedure and verification part which was very lengthy. Response an all good and they try to resolved my queries. But their time taken was very long.

My home loan is from SBI Bank. The services was good. They were very quick in responding. They collected my documents in a day or two and processed the loan. I got the loan within a week and the Demand draft in the following week. The rate of interest was of 9.5%. The processing charges was waived off.

I am satisfied with SBI bank when I compare to Axis, Hsbc and Icici banks. SBI Bank offered me an home loan with lesser rate of interest. One more best thing is 0% processing charges. They have lots of formalities even though I am okay with them. But the thing is I just postponed my plan.

As I already have my savings account with State bank of India, it is easy for them to disburse the home loan. They are having a unique product called maxi gain, the customer can do a part payment. Adding to that, they are recalculating the interest rate on a regular basis.

As I was in a requirement for a home loan of 7 lakhs I went ahead and tried with State Bank of India. Rate of interest offered was of a market rate of 9.50%. I got a call back at scheduled time. I found the process was normal and it was also quite late.

SBI was wonderful and never faced any hurdles. Within 15 days they sanctioned the home loan. Really impressed with the follow ups that done by the SBI team. As soon the loan got sanctioned they updated me via mail and that seems too good. Loan documentation was very smooth and simple as document executive came to my office. They do respond timely.

SBI Bank people were very kind. I have given my all the details based on my Home loan. Even their manager also guided me well especially Mr. Manish. I am very much happy with SBI Bank. Every thing was happened within 5 working days it like wonder.

The process and procedure for getting a home loan with SBI bank was very long.They have applied a lesser interest for the loan but the process was very long.I feel every customer cannot provide the required documents in perfect manner for the home loan.

There are both positive and negative. 9.75% is the rate of interest and that is very less than the private financial services. SBI took a month to give the loan amount. The give home loan rate is floating range. Verification was very smooth and there was no trouble in getting the loan.

State bank of India process is very excellent while taking the home loan. They took only 1.5 months for the disbursement due to my delay in the process. Rate of interest offered was 9.75% and now it has been reduce as per the rbi rules. The other charges were nominal.

I have transferred my home loan to SBI Bank. The services are average from them. The process was not very smooth. It was a long process. But they have provided a good rate of interest. It is of 9.55%. The processing charges is very much nominal too. Overall a good experience.

When compared to other banks, the interest rate was comparatively low with State bank of India. The executive made a proper follow up and the loan was disbursed within 2 weeks. I would suggest the reduce the processing fee charged for the home loan.

Initial process take much time by sbi bank for the home loan but once everything is done it goes smooth and the scheme given for the loans are attractive. Rate of interest are good. Processing fee was average. Documentation process was quite heavy which takes much time because they are very strict .

Honestly speaking SBI Bank was really good in terms of Home loan. Easy to avail a loan from them if we have all the documents. All things were done it through my friend. All the services are very quick and I would say they improved a lot. Within 10 days they approved my loan.

SBI Bank offered me an Home loan with 9.55% interest. My friend suggested me to go with sbi bank. Its a public sector bank so, formalities are huge and they took more than 1month. Banking process an all good in SBI Bank. They did not charges me any thing for processing.

Sbi bank took more than one month for disburse the home loan which is very delay . Interest rate and processing fee charged were very low in the market. They have improve the response and customer service. We have to approach them for the status of the application.

My home loan is from SBI Bank. The services are good. It was a excellent experience. The loan was processed quickly. They also offered a very good rate of interest. The processing charges was normal too. Overall very satisfactory with the banking services.

I took the home loan processed by State bank of India in the year 2004. The executives took around 45 days to process the home loan. I felt that the response was not good from the executives. Hence I fore closed the loan and they never charged anything for fore closure.

My home loan is from SBI Bank. The services are good. The rate of interest is reasonable. But it would be better if the rate of interest is more negotiable. It took four weeks for the loan approval to happen. The whole process too three months. The processing charges was normal. Overall a good experience.

I had an experience with SBI bank in terms of Home loan. It was taken from them last 7 to 8 years back. I was happy with their service on that period and I never faced any issues with them. Rate of interest and processing charges an all good and I got lesser offers than others.

Rate of interest with the State Bank of India was around 9.5% which was floating. The services was slow for the home loan with the State Bank of India and the online track for the loan account was not yet activated.

SBI Bank took around 2months for disbursement. Bank people were not that much cooperative in terms of Home loan. Some of the staffs were good in SBI Bank but some of them were not that much good. They were bit slow in process and they need to speed up their work.

In 2009 I have taken one more Home loan from SBI Bank. That experience was good. That was my first loan so, their documentary part was huge. Other wise they were pretty responsive. SBI bank took around 1month for disbursement. They have charged 1% of processing charges.

SBI Bank is good in terms of interest part which was very lesser than other banks. Only thing is executive and he have some transparent also because of that miscommunication, my Home loan application got delayed. Other wise I received their bank officers are very helpful.

We can blindly believe on the sbi bank for the home loan process. They are clear with the paper works but they use to take little bit time for the approval.The customer service is excellent. Interest rate and processing fee offered are lowest in the market.They are recommended by most of the builder.

I approached them SBI Bank for an Home loan last 5 to 6 months back. They are providing long term tenure and also charges are very less. Good thing is, compare to other banks SBI Bank fluctuate the interest rate immediately according to the Rbi rules They were not good in terms of response. They have huge formalities so, I dropped my plan.

It took around 2 months for State Bank of India to process the home loan. Documentation were done as per the bank norms. I would suggest them to speed up the process in providing the loan to the customers. Response was pretty quick from the executives.

My home loan is from SBI Bank. After the documents was collected. The process took around two months. The executive was not very knowledgeable of the documentation. They collected around 20 times. And every time I checked with them they said it was on process. Finally I visited the branch and asked them for the AGM - Mr. Sinha contact number. After which only they logged in my file and disbursed the loan. The after loan services was not satisfactory too. I had a query about the ECS. They said they would get back. But they did not call back. So I had to visit the branch again and sort that out.

SBI bank people were very responsive but I never expected from their end. I heard that they are very slow in process but SBI Bank fulfilled my requrment and also they did my Home loan process fast. I did my balance transfer so, rate of interest offered by them was good and it would be better if they avoid that processing fees.

SBI Bank always good. I have an account with them. But their Home loan procedure was huge and also they did not consider it. My suggestion is their procedure should flexible for their customers. It would be great if they provide an Home loan for Bkatha property also.
