I took home loan in SBI. The processing time was really fast. Once my documents were collected very next day my loan got approved and by end of the day got my loan amount credited to my account. I availed this loan without any hassles. I am okay with the interest rates and charges applied. The only suggestion is, when ever I go to the bank to make any transaction I had to wait in queue for long time, so this has to be taken care.

I took my home loan with SBI and the whole process was slow for this loan. I got the loan on an interest rate of 10.25%. They need to improve a lot on their services to their customers. They need to be more responsive and fast.

The service provided by SBI was good while getting a home loan.The customer service was kind of poor since its a government Bank.They offered a less rate of interest and the loan process was really quick and I am happy about the same. I will recommend this Bank for home loan process.

Home loan interest rate in SBI is very low and it is best because I got it done for 10%, which is of floating rate. Paper works were maximum and they collected twice the papers. I cleared all my way but there was some delay from SBI so entire process got delayed. Processing charge is minimum.

I got the housing loan with State Bank of India bank for the rate of interest as 13%.The processing time is so long and it took around a month because there was the delay in the documentation process.The total tenure is 14 years.I am happy with them till now.

Within 1 week SBI bank disbursed my home loan. No much documents were required for the process of the loan.They offered the interest rate as per the market rate as 10.1% and waived off the processing fee.The response was good toward my application status.

I have taken an home loan from SBI bank. The loan got disbursed within 15 days. They offered the loan with 9.9% of interest rate and waived off the processing fee. The documents were easy to provide for the process. Customer service is not so good as the private banks.

I am having the State Bank of India housing loan for the last 1.5 years.I am feeling good to have with them.The rate of interest is around 10.15%.The documents are really very straight forward.Within a maximum of 2 weeks the loan got disbursed.

I got the home loan with State Bank of India for the rate of interest as 9.75%.They are very transparent and there is no hidden charges.Within 15 days the loan got disbursed and there is very nominal documentation and zero processing charges.

I have taken a housing loan with SBI. I had a tough time with them where I have to run around to get my work done. SBI being a nationalised bank we cannot expect much from them. On the other hand their rates are descent which is 9.95%. Another interesting thing about SBI is as and when the RBI slashes the rates SBI would reduce it instantly. Its automatic as well. On top of all that, there is no need for me to pay anything to opt for the new rate. I have not take any property insurance as well.

I have taken a housing loan from SBI, as the builder has got a tie up with them. It was basically a hassle free loan. There is no need for me to take any special efforts also I am away from home town so I have opted for that. I have just signed the documents and I took the loan . Interest rate offered by them was 10.50%. Processing fee charged by them was nil.

SBI is even more good compared to HDFC LTD. The processing fee is free, there is no additional charges. The service provided by the Customer service is good. Interest rate is lower as per the market. After all the formalities and verification I got my loan amount within a week. it was a fantastic experience

Fee and charges on home loan is relatively less in SBI and they are not charging high however some charge been involved. Interest rate is par to the market but not very sure about the current status. Smooth in documentation process but I wonÌ¢??t say that whole process was convenient because every time customer have to visit their branch to submit the documents.

I took home loan with SBI. It was nice experience with them. I only dealt with an agent, I dint get a chance to interact with the customer service. Interest rate is normal which is 9.15%., the processing fee is good. Only minimum number of documents were collected. SBI just need to improve in processing time because it took 1 month for the loan to get disbursed.

State Bank of India provides very quick response towards any queries and all.They provided me the home loan with the rate of interest around10.15%.In case of documentation it took some time.Finally everything comes up with happy ending.

The home loan which I have taken from SBI is an awesome experience. Till now I havenÌ¢??t faced any issues with the Bank. They are very helpful and they helped out well even when I approached them during the lunch time and without any delay they got my things done efficiently. The processing was very fast and it took only 10 to 15 days for loan to get disbursed.

My processing was done very quickly, by an agent who was not an employee of SBI. He was evidently keen to oversell and misrepresented a bunch of points - 1. My margin letter clearly stated that I would need to pay a down payment of 26% of the value of the property. I questioned him about it and he said I would only need to pay 20% for the loan sanction, not mentioning that they would stop releasing subsequent amounts and hold me to ransom until I paid the remaining 6%. I have had a disbursement stuck for 6 months now because I was told too late to put together the funds. Loan value is less than 75 Lakh. 2. I did not get the benefit of lower rates inspite of being a woman or buying a green home - currently im paying 10.4% while my husband pays 10.25 for a property bought at the same time. Customer care has been nonexistent and its like talking to a wall - the agent disappears for months at a time without communication on disbursements. My builders are livid. Im transferring to HDFC.

State Bank of India provided the home loan for me with rate of interest as 10.1%.They provided the 80% of the loan what I asked for.They gave the tenure as 15 years and I completed 8 months.Its really a good experience and processing charge also very low as 3400Rs only.

This was way back in 2006-2007 wherein I decided to purchase a house and on my dad's insistence and the lower interests lured me to SBI. I was disappointed by the conservative staff which was like an elderly home and they hardly could connect with me, forget reassuring. They demanded so much paperwork from a guy who was purchasing his 1st home and needed more of guidance than instructions. Finally , an agent helped coordinate with IDBI

Being a government the SBI took only 1 week to process my Home loan. No much documents was collected just the legal papers where asked for the process of the loan. A good follow up was done by the bank customer support and it was very easy for me as the bank is near to my home.

I took home loan with State bank of India. The paper work was very lengthy. When I am in need of money , It took over a month for the loan to get disbursed. I am satisfied with the interest rate. but the charges is pretty high. I would like ti suggest that It could be better if the could reduce the interest rates and Customer service should be really helpful when a customer is really in need.

My experience with the home loan was great. They approved the loan application within 2-3 days and just waiting for the amount to get transfered to my account. Excellent service is provided by the bank. The rate of interest is 9.95% comparatively normal. Processing fees is 6500 which is ok as the base rate will remains the same whenever there are changes in the reserve bank and the emi amount will not change.

SBI providing the home loan with very low rate of interest at 12% and also its floating .After some time the rate of interest got reduced at 10%.I can day the documentation was quite takes time.If you keep patient with that you will get good interest rates with SBI where other private sectors cant do.

I have applied a home loan from SBI. It was a balance transfer from LIC to SBI. I have provided every papers required by SBI for loan processing. One fine day the official contacted me and informed me that the land type where building is constructed is SHALI (Agricultural Land) and that needs to be converted. The building was constructed in 2009 and already 3 loans are running for this apartment, one is from Teghoria branch and one is from Shvrapooli branch. They denied me loan saying that the land type is agricultural. Sales executive was very good. She approached RM for approval by preparing a deviation as already 2 loans are running, but no one listened to her. Even she approached to DGM Law with no success. I would request everyone to verify, the land categorization if it is Residential or Agricultural. In west bengal, you can verify it at banglarbhumi.com

I have taken a home loan from SBI. I was pretty happy with the service offered by the customer service executives. There was delay before the approval. The documents asked by the Bank was more as it was for a home loan and also the verification took a long time. It took nearly 2 months for the loan to get disbursed.

I was holding a home loan from State bank of India. The service offered by the Bank is very good. I had to visit the Bank personally and submit all the documents. The processing was fast and good. The best part is the rate of interest was very less when I had taken the home loan before 6 years. There was no much of verification.

SBI housing loan is one of the best. Interest rate offered by them was around 9.5% floating rate. The processing fee charged by them was 0.5% . I have not been provided this maxi gain option or overdraft facility. I am getting correspondence from this bank regularly. I normally use Internet banking for making the payment.

I took home loan from SBI. Compared to the private banks SBI should improve in their service part. About the interest rate and other charges is normal and satisfied. The documentation process was too long. I would like to suggest SBI should improve in responding their customers and the service must be very fast .

Very Fast processing time. While taking loan ask for queries & only then they will clarify you. Otherwise they will not tell you or clarify your doubts. So always ask questions & get clarification. This bank is always preferred as very low ROI & that too on daily reduction rate.

I have taken a home loan from SBI Bank. It was a quick response by the customer relationship officers and the documentation process was very smooth and also the support is very good,. Since it was a approved project there was no processing fee charged for this card. One things which I didnÌ¢??t like was they had taken money for insurance which was not clearly explained to me.

Without SBI I would not have got a property at Bangalore. They processed my loan quickly within a short span of time, within 20 days of time I got the loan amount. They provide accurate information about the loan they calculated my eligibility, accurately and they have offered me the loan based on my salary. The property evaluation was done accurately and they offered me the maximum loan amount. also a special thanks to the Manager Kulkarni who helped me thorugh out the housing loan process.

I took housing loan from SBI I would say that Interest offered is very low compared to HDFC bank. I would like to tell that SBI should work on the service provided to their customers. Apart from that I would say that over all it is good..........

I took Home loan from SBI bank. Over all I would say it is perfect. I had good service from them. The interest rate and other fee charged is OKAY not bad. And I would like to suggest the SBI should work on following up their customers of any further information.

I have taken Housing loan in State Bank of India and their process is really good. The best part is their excellent communication. The agent of the bank was able to provide all the details and what ever problem arises they were ready to sort them out when contacted them. I got the disbursement immediately after submitting existing bills.

I have absolutely no issues with SBI Housing loan. Incase, of any rate change they immediately update so that I can switch over. However in my case the rate change did not happen so the interest rate and EMI remains the same. I am getting the statements on timely basis to my email id.

It was a easy process to avail this Home Loan with SBI Bank with the reference of builders. They helped in every process of the loan from application to approval. The verification process was very simple and the customer service was really good. The response which I got from SBI was good and the loan process completed within two weeks.

I am holding a SBI Housing loan and their process is really good. The best part is their excellent communication. The agent of the bank was able to provide all the details and what ever problem arises they were ready to sort them out when contacted them. Rate of interest offered by them was 10.21% which is the best in the market.

I feel SBI is the Best Bank in public sector and they are the best competitor for all other private and public banks as well. I felt the documentation process was very easy while availing this Home Loan. The best part is I got a Max gain account through SBI and I am really happy about this. The interest rate offered was very low and the processing fee were waived off.

I felt the customer service can be better other than that I had an awesome experience with the SBI Bank in the process of availing this home loan. The rate of interest is minimal and fees & charges were also nominal and I feel that is the best part of an government Bank. I will surely recommend this Bank to my friends and relatives.

I am very happy to take loan from SBI. I was amazed to see the processing speed. My loan was sanctioned in less than 5 working days. Documentation was done in a days time. No processing fees was charged and also they are giving facility of parking surplus amount in your account linked to home loan account. That surplus amount will be deducted from your outstanding loan amount resulting in less interest component, so lesser EMIs. You can later use that surplus amount to repay your home loan as well. Win-Win situation for customer.

Banking experience with SBI is good thus I have taken home loan. Interest rate is 10.1% and I think it is like floating rate. They gave insurance for this loan which is nominal. The loan process was fast but they kept me in hold for sometimes as they collected the documents for several times.

SBI Housing loan they need to improvise on the loan process. The documentation process is fine, they should inform the customer before hand. It would be great if they follow the turn around time. The best part about SBI is it has got Maxi gain facility where we can invest the amount and the interest will not be calculated for the deposit which has been maintained.

The rate of interests charges by SBI Bank is very less for my home loan when compared with other banks. I had taken this loan through my Father in law and so the process was easy for me. One drawback is I had to visit another branch to submit all my documents as they agent donÌ¢??t come and collect it from place. Overall compared with other banks SBI Bank is the best in providing their rate of interests charges.

Only reason to avail home loan in SBI is that the way of approach and method of circulation. Moreover the interest rate is less and it is figure of 10.10% which is on daily reducing balance basis. Whatever the things that were committed, fulfilled at the end of the day. I feel good about SBI.

I have taken a home loan with SBI sometime back. As I hold a salary account with them it was very easy to transfer money. Its was taken before 4 years and its closed successfully. Only reason to avail home loan in SBI is that the way of approach and method of circulation. Moreover the interest rate is less and it is figure of 10.10% which is on daily reducing balance basis. Whatever the things that were committed, fulfilled at the end of the day. I feel good about SBI.

SBI Housing loan is good, the interest rate and processing fee charged by them was good. There is no hassle in terms of interest rate. In case if RBI changes the interest rate they would immediately slash their rates and there is no need for me to inform them about the same they would reduce the rates pro-actively. There is no need for me to give instructions separately unlike other banks.

SBI is good in interest rate for home loan and partial payment is comfortable. Offered interest rate is 10.15%. According to me SBI is good but people are saying that they are very slow in processing.

The home loan from SBI Bank took a lot of time for the procedure to get completed and the time taken to provide loan was bit high. And also the volume of money offered by them is less compared to HDFC. The rate of interest charged by them is quiet nominal compared to others.

The customer service provided by SBI Bank was not that good for the home loan I have taken. The documentation process was good and it was very strong with the builder as they asked for lot of documents for validation. My experience with SBI for my home loan was good as they did not ask for any certificates in regards to building completion. Specific reason to choose SBI for home loan is nil processing charge and interest rate 10.15% is less than other banks. Actually customer can bargain the interest rate and as per that they would negotiate the interest rate. If customer have all documents ready, the process will be much smoother with SBI.

The customer service provided by SBI Bank was good for the home loan I have taken. It took a lot of time for disbursement but the approval of the loan took only 1 to 2 days. The response provided by the customer service executives was fast.

Initially I had a few problem with SBI in regards to interest rates for my home loan as the interest rate committed before was fixed and after it got changed to floating. The customer service provided by SBI was good for the home loan I have taken. I took a long time. One best part is max gain product which stands out compared to other banks. The rate of interest charged is very less and it is very transparent and clear cut in their information. Overall it is not customer oriented and needs more improvement on service.

The customer service provided by SBI was good for the home loan I have taken. My loan got disbursed within 9 days. The rate of interest charged by the bank is less for women. Very good service and loan process was on time. SBI is very good in internal status and they are transparent enough. Interest rate 10.15% for home loan is same in all the banks. Rate is floating and later due to RBI rules it may fluctuate. SBI is lacking in response so they have to respond on time.

Interest rate is good so I have taken home loan with SBI and processing fee is free. To get things done we have to wait for more than 1 to 2 hours because there are only skeleton staff in home loan department. Otherwise the executives are good. SBI took a month to approve the loan and the rate is 10.15%. Interest rate is fixed and no floating but according to RBI rules it would vary later.

SBI Housing loan is ok. SBI was insisting me to pay 20% of the down payment amount. They said that they can enter in to an agreement if only I pay 20%. They did not provide any alternative solution for that. However Customer service offered by them was really good. They were very much flexible as well. Mr Kulkarni was extremely good he was very much co-operative. Infact he was a disappointed as I did not avail a loan. The best part about SBI is they had this Smart home loan option where, they will link this savings account with home loan account. My experience with SBI Bank was good for the home loan I have taken. It took 3 weeks to process as there were some issues. The rate of interest charged is less when compared to others. It would be better if they improve their customer service.

I have a home loan from State Bank of India. In terms of customer service I am not really satisfied as I donÌÄå¢??t think there is a separate customer service department. The response provided by the State Bank Of India was quick for the Home loan which I have taken. The documentation process was upto the mark and I didn't face any difficulties except for the time taken to approve the loan. My loan was disbursed within a single meet and they contacted me on time and the customer service provided by them is good. I took home loan from SBI as it is a approved bank for home projects.

SBI is completely loyal but loan amount is very less as they sanction only 75 to 80%. SBI have their fixed norms so no one can involve in that. Suggesting SBI to minimize the processing time and they have send proper status of the application in timely manner. I have a home loan from State Bank of India. In terms of customer service I am not really satisfied as I donÌ¢??t think there is a separate customer service department. There is regular updation on the interest rates as other private bank fails to do. Documentation part is hectic as I had to visit the banks for nearly 5 times to submit the documents and the loan to get sanctioned.

Please do not apply from SBI. Their service is very very poor. The will take the documentation charges and legal charges before approval, but other bank doesn't do. And its is difficult to get approval. Lots of documents required to submit(even it is not required). Again depends on legal officer as they are giving to third party for verification, hence there are chances if we give bribe to them, they can approve. Please do not promote these. Ofcourse SBI's interest rate is low, but we will lose that amount in other way. When i approached other nationalized bank. They given very good service and approved in 10-15 days.

I transferred my home loan from ICICI Bank to SBI because ICICI interest rate kept on going upward and it never came down inspite of RBI reducing the rates. When i transferred my loan to SBI the number of years & principal amount payment was drastically reduced by paying same amount of EMI. Also loan processed and transferred by SBI was in flat 12 days which one can never expect from Govt Bank. So however appealing & you are charmed by Private banks in interest rate or services never get trapped in it & always go for Govt bank for Home loan

The tenor of my home loan is for 25 years and the interest rate 10.25% is floating for the whole period. Processing charge is minimal and can do partial payment at any period of time. There was a delay in processing my loan amount thus suggesting SBI to speed up the process as in my case they took one and half months.

It was very easier to avail home loan from State bank of India. As well as there was some reduction in interest rate due to some offer at that point of time. Processing was very simple and customer service team was pretty much helpful in completing all formalities.

With State bank of India, experience is quite ok as the processing time is too lengthy and that is the drawback. Services is too good and there are no issues and its hassle free process. Interest rate is 10.15% with nil pre closure charges.It would be better if the processing time could be made faster.

The deal I got it from State bank of India is very good and that was the main reason in availing home loan. They also provides option of balance transfer in quite attractive manner. Rate of interest is quite the same.

Personal experience with State bank of India is good. Their procedures, documentation is all nominal like other private banks, however the disbursement differs as it takes time. It is 10.05% interest rate charged which is competitive.

The reason why I have chosen SBI for the housing loan is because they are transparent. Documentation process was very smooth . They took less days to process my loan. I applied online for this housing loan and they contacted me within 2 days. Interest rate offered by them was 10.15% which is lesser than ICICI.

State bank of India did offer Maxi gain home loan which is additional benefit. There are no hidden charges and they are totally transparent. In this bank, Maxi gain is nothing but the rate of interest would be same as well as loan amount would be same.

SBI services in terms of home loan was good. It was hassle free processing and even documentation was pretty much ok. The charges was all quite reasonable and which was charged at the end of disbursal.

The services are satisfactory when I applied for a home loan in State bank of India. The also responded satisfactorily. The rate of interest was 10.15% and as I had a salary account I applied for the loan. There is no processing fees and the customer support is good. They informed that the loan will be provided within a monthÌ¢??s time which is good.

Hi,I had taken a HL from SBI and I am very satisfied with the service till now. It means that any illegal land/property will not get loan approval. Even the customer service has improved a lot in past few years.

Services is good however for receiving provisional certificate for tax benefits, need to visit the State Bank of India branch and submit the application which is hectic process. Other than this, there was no issues in terms of my home loan.

I am holding a housing loan with SBI. It is quite professional and they have helped me a lot. They are quite flexible as well. I only went to the Branch for signing the documents it only took 3 days of time.

My home loan got sanctioned in the month of October with State bank of India. I didn't face any difficulties in terms of processing and disbursal. They had charged lesser than other banks which is good. Executive who was assigned was not much approachable or responsive which is disappointing.

One of my friend has suggested me to take housing loan with SBI. SBI has got its own brand name so I blindly placed my trust in SBI and I have taken a housing loan with SBI. Off course, they have asked for many documents its still fine because builder requires such documents and it is collected for customer well being. SBI was offering better interest rate for home loan. Even there are no excess charges for processing. I had no reason of availing the loan as I don't have any related documents to the property.

I am holding a housing loan with SBI. It is not very easy to do correspondence with that Bank. I have to wait for a long time because I am not getting proper response from them on time. I find private Banks more responsible than SBI . Rate of interest offered by them is high and the duration is good . I have got the annexure only during the first month but not later.

Since my friend is working in State bank of India, I did visit this bank for home loan. Services were quite pleasant and the processing was quite easier and friendly. Added to it, my salary account is with this bank. Whatever demanded with them, I got it easily. One thing is the phone banking which is fully engaged as unable to reach them.

I took a loan of Rs. 8.5 Lacs in 2009 for SBI, Rajpur Branch and the rate of interest was only 8.5%. but for last 3 years they are charging interest @ 12%. I have visited several times in the branch but they are unable to explain the same properly. They just told me that the base rate of RBI has been increased. But I have confirmed from other bank that the base rate is 10.15%. In their advertisement they are still offering interest @ 10.10% which are nothing but making the customers fool. but after disbursement they are increasing the rate without intimating their customers. This is nothing but cheating.

Home loan services with State bank of India is pretty much fine. Services is not up to the mark however they provide standardized interest rate which is a plus point. Even there is a part payment option with 0% charges.

I am holding a housing loan with SBI. I need to do follow up with them. They only concentrate on high value customers. They don't focus more on a normal customer. Its a on going loan . The loan amount was disbursed on time . Its been a month now since this account is opened . I am expecting a better service from them.

I prefer State Bank of India for home loan as they are very thorough in terms of procedures as well as policy. Added to it, there is part payment option with 0% pre closure with nil processing fees. It floating interest rate however based on the market rate when it gets raised up, I have a choice of reducing by paying some amount.

There were no issues faced in availing home loan from State bank of India. I was happy about the response time as well as the rate of interest. The General Manager Mr.Nagappan Pillai as well as Sentil, Deputy manager who helped me a lot and guided me well. As I had a existing car loan with them, it was easier to go for home loan.

I got the home loan from State bank of India at a very low interest rate. Particularly, as the rate of interest was lesser, added to it even documentation was quite simple, hence I did get the home loan from State bank of India.Overall processing is good.

One should take a housing loan with SBI only. As its good in all the aspects. Good to hold a housing loan with a nationalised Bank. Firstly they offer less rate of interest. Secondly they offer very less processing fee.The response what they offer is better than a nationalized Bank and I am very much happy with them.

Home loan services of State bank of India is really good. Initial stage of the processing was little bit difficult however the processing was quite easier.Customer service team did helped me a lot. Rate of interest was 10.5% which is quite ok.

I have taken home loan from SBI loan account is linked with Max gain (OD) Account. I had surplus money for my daughter's marriage which I have parked in OD a/c. I can take out them as and when I need just like kept in saving a/c. And saving is @10.30%. (Interest = Total outstanding loan - Over draft amount)*10.30%). I am really benefited out of it. Thanks to SBI for such a great facility. Processing of loan is very smooth if you submit all the valid documents as listed.

I have taken a home loan at SBI. Ultimately, when I applied, they took around rs 4500 as a processing fee, the rate of interest charged by them is 10.1%. I have to visit the Branch to get my work done as they were not co-operative. They dont render proper service as well. So I have planned to get rid of them .

I opted for home loan from SBI bank as the provided me with a loan for purchasing land as well. The loan policy is that if the house is not constructed in 2 years then the loan is considered as a personal loan. The customer support is not so good which needs to be improved. They provide all the procedures to be followed in the online portal which is really good. I feel that there were regular follow ups I made for the approval of the loan but after which the process is relax-able.

The reason why I have rated SBI Housing loan as 1 is because, they are not all flexible, they are not approachable. The rate of interest charged by them is 11.90% and I have raised a complaint about the rates. I have raised multiple request its still the same and finally I gave up. Finally, I have planned to do a balance transfer from SBI and I ended up moving the loan from HDFC LTD to SBI.

I have taken a housing loan with SBI, although the sales part was not good and I have to visit branch couple of times unlike private banks where they get everything done at my home, after sales services were excellent. They have given detail about the terms and conditions and there were no hidden charges. After signing the agreement every thing went on well. Post sales especially, the servicing part was really good as they were able to provide each and every information what I require.They provided lowest interest rate, Icing on cake was they provided maxGain facility (I can deposit and withdraw additional cash on the account and won't pay any interest on the extra amount in the amount) without any additional interest. SBI Home loan is really good the interest rate are less they have good number of branches and the reason why I have gone with the other Bank is because although they offer good rate of interest they dont take any additional measures to satisfy the customer be it documentation or followup we have to follow that from our end which is time consuming and tedious and that is why I have swifted over to the other Bank

It was very easy for me to avail a home loan from SBI last month because of my friend who made the process simple & fast. Documentation was very easy & less. Processing was little delayed more than a month. I feel it is always better to go with nationalized banks rather choosing private banks. Rate of interest was good and the processing fee was quite less.

Initially, i was not interested to go with State bank of India as the process all would be slower but later then based on people's advice, i approached this bank for my home loan. The experience was totally different and i would say its fantastic. I was given a form, then submitted the documents and by 24th day i got my loan. The cost of taking the loan from this bank is also slower.

Last month I have received my home loan amount from SBI. It was overall a great experience of availing the home loan. Everything was smooth like documentation was much faster however the processing was little delayed upto 2 months due to some clarification in the documents. Rate of interest was fine.

Personal experience with the home loan was too good. As its a government sector, processing was all too slow and it almost took 3 months for disbursement. Documentation was more compared with private banks and i would say for each and every step, it was slower process. Even for ECS payment to be opted, we need to submit application.

It was a good experience of availing a home loan from SBI last month. Documentation was smooth and the loan was easily approved in 15 days. Being a government bank customer service needs improvement. I think the rate of interest is quite similar to other banks as well but I am still satisfied.

I was very keen to take a home loan from SBI as their interest rates are low, but later I dropped the plan of taking a home loan as their executives are ready to come to my place to collect the documents and I have to go all the way to the Branch to do is and the Branch staff does not have a clear picture about verification also and hence I am was not that interested with SBI

It was a good experience of availing a home loan from SBI last month. I didn't face any difficulty in availing a loan because of my friend who is an employee of SBI helped me to complete the loan process smoothly. Quite easy documentation and the processing time was just 10 -15 days. Best part is the rate of interest offered to me was very good compared to other banks.

I approached SBI because of its low rate of interest(10.15%) and being a floating one.I was also promised that processing fee would be waived off.I had submitted all my documentation on time and it took bank more than a month to disburse the loan amount.I was not updated about the status of my loan application and SBI loan agent were not that co-operative.I had to myself go to bank on weekends to get the things done and avoid penalty by builder(as builder had already provided me the demand letter).To summarize,I would say if you want low rate of interest then go for SBI,but be prepared to goto bank several times as SBI customer support team is not that proactive.

SBI Salary Account service is good, i am using from past 7 years, if there staff provide good relationship with us it will be great, response is good but it need to be more faster as there process is slow for any request, overall its good service but if they provide fast and quick response it will be really great.

It was good experience i had with State bank of India personal loan disbursement. Processing of the loan took almost 1 month which was quite long but verification was all quite fine. In terms of documentation, i received a good assistance from the executive and the follow up was to good.

I have 7 years of relationship with State bank of India salary account. I haven't faced any issues still now as it is a government sector. Transactions are quite smooth and net banking is too good. Only one thing need to get improved is cash deposit which takes such a long time to do and there are even charges which gets deducted.

I am serving in Central Government and a customer of State Bank of India since 1993. More of the staff of SBI ready to serve the customer always with smiling face, very good interest rates,I fully satisfied with the bank and I am very proud to say I am a customer of SBI- Thank u

I Am not fully satisfied with the service provided by SBI, they took a long time to approve my loan and follow ups were not done on regular basis. I personally had to approach SBI for every step. Even while applying for bank statements for loan process I was told to visit the SBI branch where i had account and executives did not let me to get bank statements from the nearby SBI Branch. Also the response was very poor for documents collection and loan quotes given by SBI was not flexible. Experience with bankbazaar was really good and the site was informative!

Lovely experience with SBI Home loan once after applying the home loan within one month I received it, I am throughly satisified because they have given me the best interest rate and nominal processing fee for which I am really grateful to them.

To start with I am extremely satisified with SBI as they are very fast in processing the request, once after its been applied with in 7 days they started to process the request, they are speedy when compared with other banks and that is why I have choosen SBI for my home loan.

I had a awesome experience with SBI home loan it took about hardly say one and half month for the loan to get approved and for the loan amount to get disbursed and there was no challenge with the interest rate and processing fee as everthing was perfect.

If you‰Ûªve ever had a firsthand experience with SBI then there is a good chance that you may have wondered whether its employees are trained for being rude & uncooperative or whether they are naturally talented. Almost every SBI branch, that I have come across, is plagued by such brash. SBI shouldnt stand for state bank of india it should be SLOW bank of india.I deposited a cheque on 2nd may and yet it hasnt been cleared as on 23rd of may.Just opening up a branch on every nook and corner isnt enough, having an effective and efficient management is something that they need.

SBI HL Process was good and customer service was perfect approval process took just 4 days only everything is perfect fully satisfied with service and response best thing is SBI staff came home and did all the formalities and approved the loan.

The House loan from State Bank of India is almost in the final stage of processing. I liked their overall services, there was a proper guidance from the bank executives regarding the documentation so it went good. As my property was already mortgaged with SBI, it was pretty easier in availing loan. All the verification took place within 2-3 days of time frame. I approached the Bank head office for the loan processing, so all the registration was done in a smooth manner.Am happy about the overall services provided by SBI.

SBI Home Loan overall compare to other banks best interest rate provide main advantage is there is no hidden charges. Satisfied with overall service i have no suggestions it was been excellent service there customer service was also very good.

My house loan from State bank of India got disbursed by last month. Processing of loan took around 15 days and i feel the documentation was not good. They asked for numerous documents which is not necessary but verification was done within 2 days of time. EMI charges are quite reasonable compared with other banks and its the best. I had only 0.25% processing charges which makes me so happy, overall am excited to have the service with SBI.

The best Home loan in market, they provide the lowest interest rate in the market, they have given an excellent facility where they have given a overdraft facility, where we can withdraw and deposit money in the account, transfer money from savings account to this account which is really good.

I was very much happy with the service they render in applying for the housing loan from Axis bank the processing and the documentation was very quick, the customer service executive was helping me from the day one till my loan amount got approved and the rate of interest is less when compared to other financial institution.

I was very much impressed with the service they render to me on applying the Housing loan from State Bank of India, the processing and the documentation was very smooth and the customer service executive name Mr Sandeep Sing who took the initiative from the day one till my loan amount got approved, the whole process got completed in two weeks, overall service was good.

State Bank of India I applied for the housing loan the processing and the documentation was very quick, the customer service executive was helping me from the day one till my loan amount got approved and the rate of interest is less when compared to other financial institution.

I applied for a Housing loan in State Bank of India the initial process was little slow, I was very happy with the Housing loan manager named Sanjay Chiddarwar from DN Nagar branch Mumbai. who was providing me the regular status on the loan till the loan amount got approved, the overall service was really good.

SBI Home loan is too good, their processing fee is very nominal, I was given a clear explanation about the home loan process, property registration and valuation happened on time and I am yet to receive the loan amount everything is fine expect for the customer support as I am unable to reach them quickly.

State Bank of India Housing loan the documentation was very quick and I was little disappointed with the late response but the end result was good and the customer service executive called Swaminadan he helped me in making the loan process very quick from the day one till the loan amount got credited, overall service was good.

I applied for a Housing Loan from State Bank of India, I would say they reduce the burden in documentation and little disappointing that the verification process got little delay, but the rate of interest was low when compared to other banks, over all the service was good.

SBI Home Loan is good, They are not very quick in processing the requested however the documentation procedure is very simple they helped me to find the best home registration process was very simple and Inspection happened on time to conclude their service is good.

SBI Home Loan service was very fast, the staff came gave the exact procedure and the loan got approved with in a span of 2 weeks the overall service is good. I am fully satisfied like to refer to family and friends to SBI Home Loan if I get an opportunity to refer.

SBI Housing Loan is good, they are offering 0% processing fee for the home loan, which is splendid their service is very good, their interest rates are compatible however they wont approve it if there is any missing documents or if its not up to the mark, otherwise their overall service is good.

State bank of India Home Loan offered me the best rate of interest, their interest is very low compared with other banks and their processing fee is quite normal. Their service is excellent, they gave me the next steps clearly. Its totally a hassle free process.

I have my home loan with SBI, issue with them is when the loan rates are changed they say that it is applicable only for the new customer and not for the old customers. Interest rates are very competitive and all the services provided by them are fine being a nationalized bank. It will be better if they give the privileges of new rates to the existing customers at least for those who pay ontime and being loyal.

SBI Home Loan is good, their customer service is good, the interest rate is compatible when compared with other banks their processing fee is good, emi is affordable. They explained to me about documentation procedure and their service is good.

State Bank of India is very old nationalized bank, i have chosen sbi for their reasonable rate of interest and charges are quite ok.SBI was good in terms of customer service and i haven't faced any problem with them......................

I got my home loan processed from SBI. Initially they took long time to process but later things were done smoothly.They charged very less processing fee and their legal clearance is very good. We blindly can trust the legal clearance of SBI an d the best thing with SBI is they provide zero % pre-closure / pre-payment charges.

SBI is good for loans,they gave me proper response and their processing fee and rate of interest is very less when compared with other banks.Another feature that i like with SBI is they have a scheme called Super Saver Scheme in which the interest payouts on saving account is high when compared with normal accounts. Worst thing with SBI is they force the customers to take insurance against the property for which the loan is taken.They must stop doing this as they cannot force any customer to apply for insurance.

SBI is very good for doing online transactions especially fund transfer. Their online portal is very secured and they send one time password every time whenever i do a fund transfer which is really good and safe. I have my saving account in SBI and transfer funds between SBI accounts are also easy and credit happens immediately. Whatever services they are providing are fine and customer service is normal.

I like State Bank of India for their atm facility and Rate of interest.Their documentation process was fine,even they are good in terms of benefits like 'green channel' its quite helpful instead of filling the form we can use this option for depositing money,account opening in online etc.....

State Bank of India credit card was good in terms of online shopping and their portal was easy to access with all relevant information.I chose SBI because of their lower rate of interest,emi option,etc... but i would suggest them to work on their customer service apart from that everything was quite ok.

I received good response from State Bank Of India, particularly audit of documents was correctly done and documents list shared pretty well in advance to me so the documentation process was very simple. Specialties of SBI are they have no processing fees & no pre-closure charges and my loan was processed at floating rate and was able to get the disbursement within 48 hours. SBI branch staffs were good and co-operated well for mu loan process.

I choose State Bank Of India because of their lowest rate of interest,but am pretty upset the way they respond customer and they have collected my document twice and processed home loan on a delayed manner otherwise am happy about their rate of interest and charges when compared with other bank in the market.

I use SBI Bank credit card at times of emergencies only. Features given by them are not almost like other banks and the best feature is the balance transfer & cash withdrawal option as the rate of interest charged is less.SBI's online services are good and the site is secured .Overall transacting with SBI is fine

SBI's customer support is not that much good. They charge annual fees and no waiver options are available like other bank credit cards. They have lot of formalities for everything which is annoying. They must improve their customer support. Since their response level was poor I had to close my credit card account and for that also i faced lot of problems when i requested initially for closure via phone banking. Later I approached the bank directly to close the credit card.

First i applied the home loan in axis bank but i did not receive call from them not sure why, later i approached SBI then i got the home loan...after applied within one month i got the loan. customer service response not good but interest rate is good.

I very happy with SBI services they have responded to me on time whenever i tried to contact them. they must improve their customer support team. I guess their interest rate is ok it would be nice if they reduce their processing fees. otherwise everything is good.

I tried to apply for this loan through other banks and was not able to get one. when i approached SBI they helped me effectively in getting this loan for me. to my surprise they processed my loan within 30days...i am very much satisfied in their interest rate as well

I have opened a new account in SBI recently.I approached SBI for saving account since being a nationalized bank.Rate of interest on loans are very low and my saving account request was processed within 15 days. SBI account is very useful and can be given as a reference when few organizations ask for same from the nationalized banks

Net banking Service of SBI is not so good.They must update their sites regularly and make it user friendly.Though a request for cheque book can be made online ,for collecting the same , I have to visit the branch as SBI sends the parcel by normal post and the post man is unable to deliver the cheque book and returns the same to the bank.It will be better if they send it via courier.SBI's rate of interest on loans are reasonable,comparative and attractive

I have my salary account with SBI and till now i have not faced any problem in my account.Their services are fine.With regard to credit card, they promised me that i will not be charged any annual fees as the card given to me was life time fee but they waived off the charges only for 2 years and from next years onwards they started charging which is bit worrying

SBI's customer service is satisfactory. I have my saving account with SBI for the past 7 years and got my account opened in my native place. For every transaction i need to visit my native place which i feel it as a very difficult process.It will be better if SBI brings a easy process to transact and thier customer service is satisfactory.

I am visiting the same branch for last 23years.The service offered was in a impressive way for the customer.They give discounts in interest rate for the customer.There is no additional charges applied by state bank of mysore in case of home loan application.

I have taken the Home loan form State bank of Mysore. Best part is, their interest rate. They offered me around 9.8%. Security level was good in SBM. Only thing is, There is no proper follow up and it would be great if they need improve their customer service.

I got my Home Loan from STATE BANK OF MYSORE in the year 2007. When I am planning to avail the loan I found SBM is the better option when compared with other banks. I made a pre closing payment on this loan with no additional charges. My uncle has recommended to choose this bank for my home loan.

Customer service of the public sector banks is very bad. the processing time taken by these banks is also long. But in spite of all these issues people incline towards these banks more, because of the interest charges and the trust. My Home Loan application was processed by State Bank of Mysore. No updates were provided from the Banks regarding the status. They took almost 2 months to process my loan application.

Getting a home loan from the state bank of mysore is a changeling part to me. They took 45 days for the approval for the loan. The charges are compartively less but they are very slow in the process. I visited the branch manytimes for the approval of the loan.

Earlier I have taken home loan with State Bank of Mysore and now recently I have taken for 15lakhs. Interest rate is high as other banks are giving less than State Bank of Mysore. I am holding a SBM housing loan. It is a nationalised bank so that wont charge more. It is a very good Bank. In spite of me being a private employee I have been offered this loan . The only thing is they are little bit traditional and they are old fashioned it could be better if they work on that.

SBM Home Loan everything is good with in 30 days they process the loan after submitting the documents, interest rate was around 10.03% it was quite less when compare to private banks. Documentation was also simple, processing fee and charges was normal this was my first experience i am quite satisfied with the service.

State bank of mysore was very good in all aspects. Since I am a goverment staff the procedure was very fast and simple. I offered by them was 10.25 % . Customer services are very good, There is no customer relationship manager like other private sectore banks. Its better to appoint to seperate relationship manager for home loans . I offered 35 lakhs. They have to be give some priorities to home loan

SBM Home Loan the gave convenient time, how much requirement i need they give, verification process was done in 15 days, interest rate was bit high 10.25%, they give us time it was convenient for me only one or two times i visited the bank remaining their staff came and did all the formalities, thing is the amount what i expected i did not got, the valuation of property got less, overall it was good the bank manager was good he co operated me well, processing fee was high it was 15k. Bankazaar.com i got all private banks call but i am looking nationalized bank, after 1 day when i applied other bank started calling which was good, their was immediate response from them.

SBM Home loan process was good. The response and service was really good. They processed the loan and documentaion in a correct way and there was a delay from my end due to which it was extended however they tried their level best to complete it and now everthing is fine.

I have opened saving account and locker facility in state bank of Mysore. Services provided by branch are nice and i get a very personalized service from them. My suggestion for SBM is to improve their online portal and they should come up with a mobile application soon.

Sundaram Finance tends to provide a good rate for the new customer also they should retain their exsisting customers by offering a better rate for their old customers too. Rate of interest for home loan is very high with sundram finance. I took the loan before eight years and they have not at reduced it but they are offering a good interest rate to the new customers. They are very good in processing the loan like the amount gets disbursed within one week.

Sundram finance process was very fast, when it comes home loan but the interest rate is high which is 10.5% . So I transferred the loan to other company. Maximum time they took to disburse the amount was just 15 days. Property verification was completed in 2 days.

My Home loan was taken from Sundaram Finance. Advantage is, they will give all the information and also provide letter also well in advance. I would say compare to other banks intimation part is best in this finance. Communication part also best.

Sundaram Finance provided me the list of required documents for the loan application. The home loan was approved within 1 hour of documentation. They are ready to disburse the loan amount immediately, but I took the loan from them after 5 months of approval!

My housing loan with the Sundaram Finance is super for me. I got the loan within week of time and the rate of interest was around 11%. I am happy with the service provided by Sundaram finance based on the home loan application.Its a easy way to get the loan.They have processed the loan within 15days of time and the interest rate applied for the loan was around 10.75% in this home loan.

Taken my Home Loan from SUNDARAM FINANCE which I already completed now. One of my friend has recommended me about this finance company and they have offered me 11.90% rate of interest. The interest rate offered by Sundaram housing loan was not competitive. The current interest rate is 10.4% where as HDFC Bank is charging around 9.8%. I have taken a Home loan with Sundaram Finance and I am searching a bank were I can transfer this loan.I am looking for a lesser interest rate than which was offered by Sundaram finance.They have provided a rate around 9.25%.I will not recommend about this finance to others.

Sundram housing finance is the best. The processing was one on time. They were able to provide loan within a span of one month. All the documents were ready. Interest rate offered by them was okay and processing fee is one and the same.

I have approached Sundram for the housing loan . It is very good they have offered loan at the right time. Its an ongoing loan. As my salary was less all the other banks refused to provide loan. Since my builder has a tie up with Sundram finance I took home loan from them . This is not upto the mark. There was no quick response. They should improve in customer service. Interest rate is normal as per the market. I had an average experience.

The processing fees was very less for the home loan from Sundaram Finance. Sundaram finance provided the home loan for me with good rate of interest.Myself and my co-applicant together took that loan.It took a week for processing and to be disbursed my loan amount.Anyways am happy with them and I dint bothered about that because those things were cared by my co applicant.

Sundaram housing loan process is fine, my feedback for them is not that good. I have contacted them once for availing a top up loan. However the executives took a lot of time to respond . The Home Loan from Sundaram Finance was a very smooth process. Initially I had approached through an agent who took much time and he kept postponing the dates. Later I approached the company directly and I submitted all the necessary documents and within 15 days my loan got disbursed.

I will say it was a wonderful experience for me to avail this home loan from Sundaram Finance. It Is One Of The Worst Finance ever, So Plz dont Trust Them , They move the coins intelligently , And their rules is very favorable to them, AM VERY MUCH SUFFERED FROM THEMIF YOU WANT ANY LOAN FROM THEM MEANS , DONT PAY ANY AMOUNT BEFORE THEY PROCESSING THEIR PROCESS

Through one of my family friend, I did approach Sundaram finance for home loan. The entire process went smooth. Interest rate is 10.25% with no pre closure charges. Even the customer service representative did guide me a lot and overall I felt excellent.

EMI date is 14th of every month, which is comfortable for me to make it. According to me fees and charges are nominal. The provided rate of interest 10.6% is bit high but no problem. Sundaram Finance has taken only a week to process my loan amount and I am satisfied with the approach of executives. One of my tenant recommended Sundaram Finance to me for a home loan. I had contacted them over the phone and told them about my home loan requirement. Sundram Finance Home loan they will be taking care of everything, interest rate 10.25% it was bit high, process was good, the documentation and approval it took 10 days only their was no disadvantage i feel, i did not go any where everything they did. Processing fee was bit high.

I was hesitated to take home loan with Sundaram finance, but in last 2 years , they had improved a lot. Only once visited the branch for collection of statements. Actually through my builder I have approached Sundaram Finance and got the loan. Now I have felt the rate of interest was bit high and currently moving with HDFC bank for a loan transfer. Sundram Finance they have taken my home loan its good the rate of interest is very good and customer service is good and they have given me 28 lakhs that is something special for me also they have given me a preferential rate of interest, they should have online as currently they dont have a on line banking its better if they can add on line banking

The processing of Home loan with Sundaram finance was quite fine and interest rate whatever they had offered is quite happy and sufficient. Overall processing is very fine and it was very minimal documentation. Verification was all fine and the EMI date provided is quite comfortable.

One year ago I have taken a Home Loan from Sundaram Finance a private concern. Documentation was very less and the loan process was quick & easy. I had no exposure to their customer service and I feel the rate of interest & charges were quite high when compared to other banks in the market.

I am very happy on receiving my housing loan from Sundaram Finance before 1.5 months. I feel the documentation was quite complicated and the processing time was too long comparatively to other banks. Syndicate bank executives are very much friendly with their customers and taking a great care of them. Their banking services are amazing. They have provided me with the capital of 5 lakh Rupees and I need to pay it for seven years of time. EMI will be deducted on time.

Syndicate bank, it is very good in terms of home loan. They have a very good customer service. Interest rate is marginally high still it is okay for me. Suppose customer have all the documents clearly the process would be very fast with Syndicate bank. From the time of documentation, the home loan disbursement happened in a month but other banks would take atleast 3 months. I am happy that I had bank bazaar representative call me twice, before the bank reached out to me however no proper response from the bank. I was contacted by 3 different people asking about the same. All said that they would call back. None of them did.

Union bank of India is of less branch in cities and in my place it is very small branch where only three of them are working and they are looking of everything. Overall it took a month time to get the sanction letter. As Union Bank being a public sector bank, they are not great in customer service. However I got the disbursement on time and rate of interest is satisfactory. For home loan customers can choose public sector banks like Union Bank of India.

Rate of interest is of 10% where it is less than other banks and charges are minimal for home loan in Union bank of India. Excellent customer support as it was smooth to deal with the executives. They introduced insurance as optional but really I was interested to take that thus opted along with the loan.

There are all options available in the portal and in a very simplified manner. one can easily explore the options and choose the best suitable option. The website also give all the required details of the product. Also multiple service options are there also.

The property I chose is in rural area where this bank was in a stage of providing home loan. Union bank of India did provide the loan amount which is lesser and the interest rate is lesser which is great. There are no excessive charges.

It was quite good service from Union bank of India, after submitting the documents with in few days they approved my loan. Interest rate was 10.25% it was normal in all banks, they charged .5% as processing fee. Best part is based on my request they showed me the statement of existing customer as how it works.

It was quite good service from Union bank of India, after submitting the documents with in few days they approved my loan. Interest rate was 10.25% it was normal in all banks, they charged .5% as processing fee. Best part is based on my request they showed me the statement of existing customer as how it works.

It was quite good service from union bank of india. Being a public sector bank they are very good. Within 2 days my home loan got processed . It was taken hardly 2 hours to process my documents in the system. Quite good interest rates. Overall it was very good

Union Bank Home Loan the process was very fast i got loan approval in 10 days and interest rate was 10.25% it was normal as other banks. Best part is total charges including processing fee is .05% which is comparatively less when compare any bank.

I am banking my HOME LOAN with UNION BANK OF INDIA with 9% as fixed rate. So far I don't have any issues with them . In simple hassle-free bank. Overall they are very good in the customer service and response for each anc every query. I am very much satisfied with them.

My personal experience was excellent with Union bank of India while applying the HOME loan. The customer service executives took the initiative in updating me on the status of the loan till my whole process got completed. The loan amount got credited to my account with in twenty days.

My father is having an account with Union bank of India. I had personally visited the nearest branch and submitted all the required documents for a home loan. After one month of processing they disbursed the loan. Response of Internet banking is very slow and the customer service really needs improvement. Rate of interest was 10.75% however the re-payment option is not good as other private banks.

That was fine with Union Bank of India. The only thing I am not corporate employee so they taken flat rate for my home loan . I am not sure of the customer service. They used to give the proper service. They have offered me whatever I have asked . They are effective to some extent.

BankBazaar web site is I would say that they are working towards to the meeting up the customer expectations and fulfilling their requirements its like Is Very Good and very best bank bazar is also helpful to all of our is take a good benifits to us

I chose this bank for the home loan and i was maintaining a good relationship, so it was easier to get the home loan. Processing, documentation was so simple and the executive was too friendly and helpful. It was MR. S.Indora who had helped me throughout the process and I would surely appreciate for his work. Interest rate is competitive and their on line banking is also fine.

I applied for the housing loan from Union Bank of India the processing and the documentation was very simple and it was very quick and the customer service executive Mr Rajesh who was very helpful for me in updating the status of the loan till my loan amount got approved and the whole process got completed in one month and the EMI was affordable.

Even the manager will call me, he will clear me very well. I need not visit the branch. Interest rate is quite OK but whenever increased, i get intimated about it. Processing, documentation was tough as it is a government sector compared to other banks and later it was easier. Through email, i get intimated about everything.

Union Bank Home Loan not much satisfied with service, their process is very slow, interest rate was good as per market price, i got loan in 2 months since documentation was more, branch service needs to improve, extra charges must be reduced, staffs must be more co operative with customers.

UNION Bank of India home loan is good, its the bank which does everything on behalf of me, they render excellent service, they have given the exact loan amount the interest rate is good, and the best part is they have not charged me for the processing fee itself and I got the sanction letter on time.

Even though I am an Government employee, UBI collected lot of irrelevant documents for the home loan application. I felt quite irritated with the documentation. The interest rate is 10.25% and that is fixed for the whole loan tenure. There are lot of obstacles and I am not satisfied with the services offered.

Before 3 yeas I took a home loan with United Bank of India. The offer was really good but they have to improve the customer service. They needed only few documents to process the loan. I got my loan sanctioned within a month. I have visited the branch many times, they respond well. The experience with them was okay.

I am having the Housing loan with United Bank of India.The rate of interest is really huge with them.What I find with them that the rate of interest was not reduced even there the Repo rate was reduced.This is a kind of product that is not etiquette to the customers choice.

I took the home loan with the United Bank of India.The rate of interest is around 9.9% and its fixed.In the sense like the dual loan.The things which impressed that everything got done within a week.I felt happy with them.

The services offered by United Bank of India was very bad for the home loan I have taken. In terms of communication and also in managing the loan account they are not good. Couple of months the EMI got debited from my account only but they state that it was from a different account. Basically there is no alerts or any sms about the EMI deduction as well.

Than any other government banks, United Bank of India is low in interest rate on home loan and they processed the loan in 15 days. In days they completed all legal formalities and two days for verification, one day for documentation. Processing charge was waived off. Interest offered on home loan is 10%.

The manager Sushil Kumar Chaudhary was really helpful in disbursing the home loan. My probation period in company was not completed and at the mean time as it got cleared, I had got the offer from this bank. Its 10.25% interest rate charged by United bank of India.

It was through my Chartered accountant I got the home loan from United bank of India. Rate of interest is quite far compared with other which was 10.25%. Processing charges 1%. I provided just the documents, everything was taken care by Chartered account and Bank executives were responsive. Good thing is they approved loan for me.

Really very much happy and nice experience with Union bank of India home loan services. I have a current account with this bank so it was easier.It was good. I got my proper communication and everything was fine. Interest rate and charges are fine.

At my home town branch the service provided by Vijaya bank was really good.They process home loan application in a simple manner.The delay happened but it was from my end and not bank.I remember they didnt apply any processing fee for the application.

The manager came my house to assist for the home loan and they work even in holidays. I asked for three lakhs but they ready to sanction ten lakhs. Interest rate is something 9% for home loan. No extra charges been deducted. Vijaya bank is helping so many people by giving loans. Though I completed the loan they give good response when I go to the branch.

Vijaya bank is the government organization bank so they have many documents required to sanction the home loan they took 5 month but the demanded amount was not given. Interest rate offered was 9.50% which has been more than year but it is flexible rate.

The loan process was very good.They are processing the loan in a very clear manner.The executive are very clear about the loan process.The documents required was quite simple to process.The interest rate applied was also quite less with vijaya bank

The rate of interest provided by Vijaya Bank in regards to Housing loan is very good compared to other banks. Everybody should be aware of the fact that they provide loan only for cost of the property and not for the construction cost. They were very helpful for the documentation process and it only took 4 days for the processing.

I have good credit history with the Vijaya bank and the mangers are very helpful for me. Employees in the lower level are not responding properly. I got the home loan for 6lakhs but they deducted 2600, which is heavy as it is 2.5%. Rate of interest is 13.5%.

My Home loan was taken from VIJAYA bank quite long back. But due to some personal issues I have not continued this loan with them. Also I sold my house to some other person where he has started paying the monthly EMI. Other than this there was no issues with the bank.

I have taken my home loan from VIJAYA bank for the tenure of 20 years. Mr. Shetty is the bank manager who helped me a lot in processing this application. Since it is an nationalized bank they do not have online services. The customer service team are very much supportive.

It is nationalized bank and I already have a current account with them. I took a home loan from vijaya bank. It was a good experience. I got a nominal rate of interest. They take care of everything. The bank people are really helpful. I got my loan in just 15 days. They provide good services.

I got the home loan with the Vijaya bank.The rate of interest was around 9.50% and its floating.The services are good with them.The processing charges are the average one.Their responsiveness and the continuous follow up was not there and they need to improve over there.

I have taken my home loan from Vijaya Bank only because I got a lower rate of interest, that was the only advantage of the bank.They need improvement on their customer service to the customers. I got my loan from Vijaya bank within four days of time.

I have taken a home loan from Vijaya Bank 10 years Bank. The services were good at that time as I knew many people form the Bank. But recently when I visited the bank the the services are not that good and they are not cooperative as before.

Vijaya Bank housing loan experience is really good. Whenever I visit the Branch they offer personalized service. No matter what doubts I have got, they will clarify within a short span of time on the spot. I got the interest certificate for filing the IT returns as well. The processing fee charged by them was hardly rs 3000.

Got my home loan from Vijaja Bank and nothing really special about there services. One of my colleague who is working there but in a different location actually referred me to this bank. But their services are very slow. I visited almost three to four branch and found very less staffs working there and this could be one of the main reason for the slow loan process. However their staffs were polite and sincere.

I was holding a Vijaya bank housing loan. The loan was cleared within 6 years. Interest rate offered by them was the best in the market at that point of time. There was no preclosure charges as well. I have repaid the complete loan amount they took hardly 4 days of time to close this loan and also I have got all documents pertaining to closure.

All the executives with Vijaya bank was so cooperative. Home loan services was so excellent and without any hassles, I had got the home loan. Disbursal was all pretty smooth and as of now, I feel satisfied with Vijaya bank.

I felt comfortable on interest rate as they provided 10.25%. From the time when I submitted application, the loan got sanctioned within 15 days. Loan got disbursed quiet earlier and satisfied with charges as well. Pre closure and part payment is there where possible post six months. Processing fee is bit high in Vijaya bank because they charged around 1.5%. On the whole I am satisfied with home loan process.

I personally visited Vijaya bank manager for home loan and though they being private bank the way of approach was recommendable. They credited loan amount in to my account as per my convenient and their performance was good. Manager was really good and satisfied my needs. Documentation process was smooth and paper works were minimal. Verification part was smooth where they came my place for it. Specifically for home loan they are offering rate of interest 10.25%, which is reasonable.

I applied 60 lakhs home loan with 10.30% as interest rates with Vijaya bank which was quite good. They need to improve on their customer service. Interest fluctuations was not as compared to other private banks. Entire process was long . Since its basically a secured loan they need to concentrate more on the customer service

Vijaya bank is a good bank where I got my home loan easily. Within a week, the loan was disbursed. The relationship manager visited my home and collected all the information. At that time, the interest rate is 8.75% and still there is a remaining balance to be paid. There are few charges which is been included.
